17 #include "Context.h"

19 using namespace helios;
20 
21 Context::Context(){
22 
23  //---- ALL DEFAULT VALUES ARE SET HERE ----//
24 
25  iscontextinitialized=true;
26 
27  sim_date = make_Date(1,6,2000);
28 
29  sim_time = make_Time(12,0);
30 
31  scene_radius = 1.f;
32 
33  // --- Initialize random number generator ---- //
34 
35  unsigned seed = std::chrono::system_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count();
36  generator.seed(seed);
37 
38  // --- Set Geometry as `Clean' --- //
39 
40  isgeometrydirty = false;
41 
42  currentUUID = 0;
43 
44  currentObjectID = 1; //object ID of 0 is reserved for default object
45 
46 }
47 
48 void Context::addTexture( const char* texture_file ){
49  if( textures.find(texture_file)==textures.end() ){//texture has not already been added
50  Texture text( texture_file );
51  textures[ texture_file ] = text;
52  }
53 }
54 
55 Texture::Texture( const char* texture_file ){
56  filename = texture_file;
57 
58  //------ determine if transparency channel exists ---------//
59 
60  //check if texture file has extension ".png"
61  std::string ext;
62  for( uint i=filename.size()-4; i<filename.size(); i++ ){
63  ext.push_back(filename.at(i));
64  }
65  if( ext!=".png" ){
66  hastransparencychannel = false;
67  }else{
68  hastransparencychannel = PNGHasAlpha( filename.c_str() );
69  }
70 
71  //-------- load transparency channel (if exists) ------------//
72 
73  if( hastransparencychannel ){
74  transparencydata = readPNGAlpha( filename.c_str() );
75  }
76 
77  //-------- determine solid fraction --------------//
78 
79  if( hastransparencychannel ){
80  size_t p = 0.f;
81  for( auto & j : transparencydata ){
82  for( bool transparency : j ){
83  if( transparency ){
84  p += 1;
85  }
86  }
87  }
88  float sf = float(p)/float(transparencydata.size()*transparencydata.front().size());
89  if( sf!=sf ){
90  sf = 0.f;
91  }
92  solidfraction = sf;
93  }else{
94  solidfraction = 1.f;
95  }
96 
97 
98 }
99 
100 std::string Texture::getTextureFile() const{
101  return filename;
102 }
103 
104 helios::int2 Texture::getSize()const {
105  return make_int2(int(transparencydata.front().size()),int(transparencydata.size()));
106 }
107 
108 bool Texture::hasTransparencyChannel() const{
109  return hastransparencychannel;
110 }
111 
112 const std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* Texture::getTransparencyData() const{
113  return &transparencydata;
114 }
115 
116 float Texture::getSolidFraction() const{
117  return solidfraction;
118 }

125  isgeometrydirty = true;

148 void Primitive::getTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] )const {
149  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
150  T[i]=transform[i];
151  }
152 }

154 void Primitive::setTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ){
155 
156  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
157  transform[i] = T[i];
158  }
159 }
160 
161 float Patch::getArea() const{
162 
163  vec2 size = getSize();
164 
165  float area = size.x*size.y*solid_fraction;
166 
167  return area;
168 
169 }
170 
171 float Triangle::getArea() const{
172 
173  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
174 
175  float area = calculateTriangleArea( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2) );
176  area = area*solid_fraction;
177 
178  return area;
179 }
180 
181 float Voxel::getArea() const{
182 
183  vec3 size(transform[0],transform[5],transform[10]);
184 
185  float area = 2.f*size.x*size.y+2*size.x*size.z+2*size.y*size.z;
186 
187  return area;
188 }
189 
190 vec3 Patch::getNormal() const{
191 
192  vec3 normal;
193 
194  normal.x = transform[2];
195  normal.y = transform[6];
196  normal.z = transform[10];
197 
198  normal.normalize();
199 
200  return normal;
201 
202 }
203 
204 vec3 Triangle::getNormal() const{
205  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
206  vec3 norm = cross(vertices.at(1)-vertices.at(0),vertices.at(2)-vertices.at(1));
207  norm.normalize();
208  return norm;
209 }
210 
211 vec3 Voxel::getNormal() const{
212  return make_vec3(0,0,0);
213 }
214 
215 std::vector<vec3> Patch::getVertices() const{
216 
217  vec3 Y[4];
218  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
219  vertices.resize(4);
220  Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
221  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
222  Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
223  Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
224 
225  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
226  vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
227  vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
228  vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
229  }
230  return vertices;
231 }
232 
233 std::vector<vec3> Triangle::getVertices() const{
234 
235  vec3 Y[3];
236  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
237  vertices.resize(3);
238  Y[0] = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
239  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
240  Y[2] = make_vec3( 1.f, 1.f, 0.f);
241 
242  for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
243  vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
244  vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
245  vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
246  }
247  return vertices;
248 
249 }
250 
251 std::vector<vec3> Voxel::getVertices() const{
252 
253  vec3 Y[8];
254  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
255  vertices.resize(8);
256  Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f);
257  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f);
258  Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f);
259  Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f);
260  Y[4] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f);
261  Y[5] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f);
262  Y[6] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
263  Y[7] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
264 
265  for( int i=0; i<8; i++ ){
266  vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
267  vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
268  vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
269  }
270  return vertices;
271 }

285 void Primitive::setColor( const helios::RGBcolor& newcolor ){
286 
287  // if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
288  // std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::setColor): Cannot set the color of individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
289  // return;
290  // }
291 
292  color = make_RGBAcolor(newcolor,1);
293 
294 }

300  // return;
301  // }
302 
303  color = newcolor;
304

311  return true;

350 
351 void Primitive::scale( const vec3& S ){
352 
353  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
354  std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::scale): Cannot scale individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
355  return;
356  }
357 
358  float T[16];
359  makeScaleMatrix(S,T);
360  matmult(T,transform,transform);
361 }
362 
363 void Primitive::translate( const helios::vec3& shift ){
364 
365  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
366  std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::translate): Cannot translate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
367  return;
368  }
369 
370  float T[16];
371  makeTranslationMatrix(shift,T);
372  matmult(T,transform,transform);
373 }
374 
375 void Patch::rotate( float rot, const char* axis ){
376 
377  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
378  std::cout << "WARNING (Patch::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
379  return;
380  }
381 
382  if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
383  float Rz[16];
384  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",Rz);
385  matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
386  }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
387  float Ry[16];
388  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
389  matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
390  }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
391  float Rx[16];
392  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
393  matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
394  }else{
395  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (Patch::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z." ) );
396  }
397 
398 }
399 
400 void Patch::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& axis ){
401 
402  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
403  std::cout << "WARNING (Patch::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
404  return;
405  }
406 
407  float R[16];
408  makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
409  matmult(R,transform,transform);
410 }
411 
412 void Patch::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& origin, const helios::vec3& axis ){
413 
414  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
415  std::cout << "WARNING (Patch::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
416  return;
417  }
418 
419  float R[16];
420  makeRotationMatrix(rot,origin,axis,R);
421  matmult(R,transform,transform);
422 }
423 
424 void Triangle::rotate( float rot, const char* axis ){
425 
426  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
427  std::cout << "WARNING (Triangle::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
428  return;
429  }
430 
431  if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
432  float Rz[16];
433  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",Rz);
434  matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
435  }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
436  float Ry[16];
437  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
438  matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
439  }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
440  float Rx[16];
441  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
442  matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
443  }else{
444  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (Triangle::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z." ) );
445  }
446 
447 }
448

451  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
452  std::cout << "WARNING (Triangle::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
453  return;
454  }
455 
456  float R[16];
457  makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
458  matmult(R,transform,transform);
459 }

488 }

490 void Voxel::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& origin, const helios::vec3& axis ){
491  std::cout << "WARNING (Voxel::rotate) - Voxels can only be rotated about the z-axis. Ignoring this call to rotate()." << std::endl;
492 }
493 
494 void Triangle::makeTransformationMatrix( const helios::vec3& vert0, const helios::vec3& vert1, const helios::vec3& vert2 ){
495 
496  //We need to construct the Affine transformation matrix that transforms some generic triangle to a triangle with vertices at vertex0, vertex1, vertex2.
497 
498  //V1 is going to be our generic triangle. This is the triangle that we'll intersect in the OptiX ray intersection program. We just need to pass the transformation matrix to OptiX so that we'll end up with the right triangle.
499 
500  //We'll assume our generic triangle has vertices
501  //v0 = (0,0,0)
502  //v1 = (0,1,0)
503  //v2 = (1,1,0)
504  //this needs to match up with the triangle in triangle_intersect() and triangle_bounds() (see primitiveIntersection.cu).
505  //Note that the matrix is padded with 1's to make it 4x4
506 
507  float V1[16];
508 
509  /* [0,0] */ V1[0] = 0.f;
510  /* [0,1] */ V1[1] = 0.f;
511  /* [0,2] */ V1[2] = 1.f;
512 
513  /* [1,0] */ V1[4] = 0.f;
514  /* [1,1] */ V1[5] = 1.f;
515  /* [1,2] */ V1[6] = 1.f;
516 
517  /* [2,0] */ V1[8] = 0.f;
518  /* [2,1] */ V1[9] = 0.f;
519  /* [2,2] */ V1[10] = 0.f;
520 
521  /* [0,3] */ V1[3] = 1.f;
522  /* [1,3] */ V1[7] = 1.f;
523  /* [2,3] */ V1[11] = 1.f;
524  /* [3,0] */ V1[12] = 1.f;
525  /* [3,1] */ V1[13] = 1.f;
526  /* [3,2] */ V1[14] = 1.f;
527  /* [3,3] */ V1[15] = 1.f;
528 
529  //V2 holds the vertex locations we want to transform to
530  //Note that the matrix is padded with 1's to make it 4x4
531 
532  float V2[16];
533  /* [0,0] */ V2[0] = vert0.x;
534  /* [0,1] */ V2[1] = vert1.x;
535  /* [0,2] */ V2[2] = vert2.x;
536  /* [0,3] */ V2[3] = 1.f;
537  /* [1,0] */ V2[4] = vert0.y;
538  /* [1,1] */ V2[5] = vert1.y;
539  /* [1,2] */ V2[6] = vert2.y;
540  /* [1,3] */ V2[7] = 1.f;
541  /* [2,0] */ V2[8] = vert0.z;
542  /* [2,1] */ V2[9] = vert1.z;
543  /* [2,2] */ V2[10] = vert2.z;
544  /* [2,3] */ V2[11] = 1.f;
545  /* [3,0] */ V2[12] = 1.f;
546  /* [3,1] */ V2[13] = 1.f;
547  /* [3,2] */ V2[14] = 1.f;
548  /* [3,3] */ V2[15] = 1.f;
549 
550  //Now we just need to solve the linear system for our transform matrix T
551  // [T][V1] = [V2] -->
552  // [T] = [V2]([V1]^-1)
553 
554  double inv[16], det, invV1[16];
555 
556  inv[0] = V1[5] * V1[10] * V1[15] -
557  V1[5] * V1[11] * V1[14] -
558  V1[9] * V1[6] * V1[15] +
559  V1[9] * V1[7] * V1[14] +
560  V1[13] * V1[6] * V1[11] -
561  V1[13] * V1[7] * V1[10];
562 
563  inv[4] = -V1[4] * V1[10] * V1[15] +
564  V1[4] * V1[11] * V1[14] +
565  V1[8] * V1[6] * V1[15] -
566  V1[8] * V1[7] * V1[14] -
567  V1[12] * V1[6] * V1[11] +
568  V1[12] * V1[7] * V1[10];
569 
570  inv[8] = V1[4] * V1[9] * V1[15] -
571  V1[4] * V1[11] * V1[13] -
572  V1[8] * V1[5] * V1[15] +
573  V1[8] * V1[7] * V1[13] +
574  V1[12] * V1[5] * V1[11] -
575  V1[12] * V1[7] * V1[9];
576 
577  inv[12] = -V1[4] * V1[9] * V1[14] +
578  V1[4] * V1[10] * V1[13] +
579  V1[8] * V1[5] * V1[14] -
580  V1[8] * V1[6] * V1[13] -
581  V1[12] * V1[5] * V1[10] +
582  V1[12] * V1[6] * V1[9];
583 
584  inv[1] = -V1[1] * V1[10] * V1[15] +
585  V1[1] * V1[11] * V1[14] +
586  V1[9] * V1[2] * V1[15] -
587  V1[9] * V1[3] * V1[14] -
588  V1[13] * V1[2] * V1[11] +
589  V1[13] * V1[3] * V1[10];
590 
591  inv[5] = V1[0] * V1[10] * V1[15] -
592  V1[0] * V1[11] * V1[14] -
593  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[15] +
594  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[14] +
595  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[11] -
596  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[10];
597 
598  inv[9] = -V1[0] * V1[9] * V1[15] +
599  V1[0] * V1[11] * V1[13] +
600  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[15] -
601  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[13] -
602  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[11] +
603  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[9];
604 
605  inv[13] = V1[0] * V1[9] * V1[14] -
606  V1[0] * V1[10] * V1[13] -
607  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[14] +
608  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[13] +
609  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[10] -
610  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[9];
611 
612  inv[2] = V1[1] * V1[6] * V1[15] -
613  V1[1] * V1[7] * V1[14] -
614  V1[5] * V1[2] * V1[15] +
615  V1[5] * V1[3] * V1[14] +
616  V1[13] * V1[2] * V1[7] -
617  V1[13] * V1[3] * V1[6];
618 
619  inv[6] = -V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[15] +
620  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[14] +
621  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[15] -
622  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[14] -
623  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[7] +
624  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[6];
625 
626  inv[10] = V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[15] -
627  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[13] -
628  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[15] +
629  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[13] +
630  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[7] -
631  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[5];
632 
633  inv[14] = -V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[14] +
634  V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[13] +
635  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[14] -
636  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[13] -
637  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[6] +
638  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[5];
639 
640  inv[3] = -V1[1] * V1[6] * V1[11] +
641  V1[1] * V1[7] * V1[10] +
642  V1[5] * V1[2] * V1[11] -
643  V1[5] * V1[3] * V1[10] -
644  V1[9] * V1[2] * V1[7] +
645  V1[9] * V1[3] * V1[6];
646 
647  inv[7] = V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[11] -
648  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[10] -
649  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[11] +
650  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[10] +
651  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[7] -
652  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[6];
653 
654  inv[11] = -V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[11] +
655  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[9] +
656  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[11] -
657  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[9] -
658  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[7] +
659  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[5];
660 
661  inv[15] = V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[10] -
662  V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[9] -
663  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[10] +
664  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[9] +
665  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[6] -
666  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[5];
667 
668  det = V1[0] * inv[0] + V1[1] * inv[4] + V1[2] * inv[8] + V1[3] * inv[12];
669 
670  //if (det == 0)
671  //return false;
672 
673  det = 1.0 / det;
674 
675  for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++)
676  invV1[i] = inv[i] * det;
677 
678  for( int i=0;i<4;i++){
679  for(int j=0;j<4;j++){
680  transform[ j+i*4 ] = 0.f;
681  }
682  }
683 
684  // Multiply to get transformation matrix [T] = [V2]([V1]^-1)
685  for( int i=0;i<4;i++){
686  for(int j=0;j<4;j++){
687  for(int k=0;k<4;k++){
688  transform[ j+i*4 ] += V2[k+i*4]*float(invV1[j+k*4]);
689  }
690  }
691  }
692 
693 }
694 
695 void Primitive::setPrimitiveData( const char* label, const int& data ){
696  std::vector<int> vec{data};
697  primitive_data_int[label] = vec;
698  primitive_data_types[label] = HELIOS_TYPE_INT;
699 }
700

702  std::vector<uint> vec{data};
703  primitive_data_uint[label] = vec;
704  primitive_data_types[label] = HELIOS_TYPE_UINT;
705 }

760 
761 void Primitive::setPrimitiveData( const char* label, HeliosDataType type, uint size, void* data ){
762 
763  primitive_data_types[label] = type;
764 
765  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
766 
767  int* data_ptr = (int*)data;
768 
769  std::vector<int> vec;
770  vec.resize(size);
771  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
772  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
773  }
774  primitive_data_int[label] = vec;
775 
776  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
777 
778  uint* data_ptr = (uint*)data;
779 
780  std::vector<uint> vec;
781  vec.resize(size);
782  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
783  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
784  }
785  primitive_data_uint[label] = vec;
786 
787  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
788 
789  auto* data_ptr = (float*)data;
790 
791  std::vector<float> vec;
792  vec.resize(size);
793  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
794  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
795  }
796  primitive_data_float[label] = vec;
797 
798  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
799 
800  auto* data_ptr = (double*)data;
801 
802  std::vector<double> vec;
803  vec.resize(size);
804  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
805  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
806  }
807  primitive_data_double[label] = vec;
808 
809  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
810 
811  auto* data_ptr = (vec2*)data;
812 
813  std::vector<vec2> vec;
814  vec.resize(size);
815  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
816  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
817  }
818  primitive_data_vec2[label] = vec;
819 
820  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
821 
822  auto* data_ptr = (vec3*)data;
823 
824  std::vector<vec3> vec;
825  vec.resize(size);
826  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
827  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
828  }
829  primitive_data_vec3[label] = vec;
830 
831  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
832 
833  auto* data_ptr = (vec4*)data;
834 
835  std::vector<vec4> vec;
836  vec.resize(size);
837  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
838  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
839  }
840  primitive_data_vec4[label] = vec;
841 
842  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
843 
844  auto* data_ptr = (int2*)data;
845 
846  std::vector<int2> vec;
847  vec.resize(size);
848  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
849  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
850  }
851  primitive_data_int2[label] = vec;
852 
853  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
854 
855  auto* data_ptr = (int3*)data;
856 
857  std::vector<int3> vec;
858  vec.resize(size);
859  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
860  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
861  }
862  primitive_data_int3[label] = vec;
863 
864  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
865 
866  auto* data_ptr = (int4*)data;
867 
868  std::vector<int4> vec;
869  vec.resize(size);
870  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
871  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
872  }
873  primitive_data_int4[label] = vec;
874 
875  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
876 
877  auto* data_ptr = (std::string*)data;
878 
879  std::vector<std::string> vec;
880  vec.resize(size);
881  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
882  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
883  }
884  primitive_data_string[label] = vec;
885 
886  }
887 
888 }
889 
890 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, int& data ) const{
891 
892  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
893  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) ) );
894  }
895 
896  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
897 
898  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
899  std::vector<int> d = primitive_data_int.at(label);
900  data = d.at(0);
901  }else{
902  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data " + std::string(label) + " for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not have type int." ) );
903  }
904 
905 }
906 
907 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, std::vector<int>& data ) const{
908 
909  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
910  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) ) );
911  }
912 
913  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
914 
915  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
916  std::vector<int> d = primitive_data_int.at(label);
917  data = d;
918  }else{
919  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data " + std::string(label) + " for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not have type int." ) );
920  }
921 
922 }
923 
924 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, uint& data ) const{
925 
926  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
927  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) ) );
928  }

931 
932  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
933  std::vector<uint> d = primitive_data_uint.at(label);
934  data = d.front();
935  }else{
936  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type uint, but data " + std::string(label) + " for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not have type uint." ) );
937  }
938 
939 }

1013  }

1016

1019  data = d;
1020  }else{

1162 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, int3& data ) const{
1163 
1164  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1165  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) ) );
1166  }
1167 
1168  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1169 
1170  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
1171  std::vector<int3> d = primitive_data_int3.at(label);
1172  data = d.front();
1173  }else{
1174  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type int3, but data " + std::string(label) + " for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not have type int3." ) );
1175  }
1176 
1177 }
1178 
1179 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, std::vector<int3>& data ) const{
1180 
1181  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1182  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) ) );
1183  }
1184 
1185  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1186 
1187  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
1188  std::vector<int3> d = primitive_data_int3.at(label);
1189  data = d;
1190  }else{
1191  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type int3, but data " + std::string(label) + " for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not have type int3." ) );
1192  }
1193 
1194 }
1195 
1196 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, int4& data ) const{
1197 
1198  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1199  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) ) );
1200  }
1201 
1202  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1203 
1204  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
1205  std::vector<int4> d = primitive_data_int4.at(label);
1206  data = d.front();
1207  }else{
1208  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type int4, but data " + std::string(label) + " for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not have type int4." ) );
1209  }
1210 
1211 }
1212 
1213 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, std::vector<int4>& data ) const{
1214 
1215  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1216  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) ) );
1217  }
1218 
1219  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1220 
1221  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
1222  std::vector<int4> d = primitive_data_int4.at(label);
1223  data = d;
1224  }else{
1225  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type int4, but data " + std::string(label) + " for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not have type int4." ) );
1226  }
1227 
1228 }
1229 
1230 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, std::string& data ) const{
1231 
1232  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1233  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) ) );
1234  }
1235 
1236  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1237 
1238  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
1239  std::vector<std::string> d = primitive_data_string.at(label);
1240  data = d.front();
1241  }else{
1242  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type string, but data " + std::string(label) + " for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not have type string." ) );
1243  }
1244 
1245 }
1246 
1247 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, std::vector<std::string>& data ) const{
1248 
1249  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1250  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) ) );
1251  }
1252 
1253  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1254 
1255  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
1256  std::vector<std::string> d = primitive_data_string.at(label);
1257  data = d;
1258  }else{
1259  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type string, but data " + std::string(label) + " for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not have type string." ) );
1260  }
1261 
1262 }
1263 
1264 HeliosDataType Primitive::getPrimitiveDataType( const char* label ) const{
1265 
1266  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1267  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) ) );
1268  }
1269 
1270  return primitive_data_types.at(label);
1271 
1272 }
1273 
1274 uint Primitive::getPrimitiveDataSize( const char* label ) const{
1275 
1276  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1277  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) ) );
1278  }
1279 
1280  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1281 
1282  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
1283  return primitive_data_int.at(label).size();
1284  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
1285  return primitive_data_uint.at(label).size();
1286  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
1287  return primitive_data_float.at(label).size();
1288  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
1289  return primitive_data_double.at(label).size();
1290  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
1291  return primitive_data_vec2.at(label).size();
1292  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
1293  return primitive_data_vec3.at(label).size();
1294  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
1295  return primitive_data_vec4.at(label).size();
1296  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
1297  return primitive_data_int2.at(label).size();
1298  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
1299  return primitive_data_int3.at(label).size();
1300  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
1301  return primitive_data_int4.at(label).size();
1302  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
1303  return primitive_data_string.at(label).size();
1304  }else{
1305  assert( false );
1306  }
1307 
1308  return 0;
1309 
1310 }
1311 
1312 void Primitive::clearPrimitiveData( const char* label ){
1313 
1314  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1315  return;
1316  }
1317 
1318  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1319 
1320  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
1321  primitive_data_int.erase(label);
1322  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
1323  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
1324  primitive_data_uint.erase(label);
1325  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
1326  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
1327  primitive_data_float.erase(label);
1328  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
1329  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
1330  primitive_data_double.erase(label);
1331  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
1332  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
1333  primitive_data_vec2.erase(label);
1334  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
1335  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
1336  primitive_data_vec3.erase(label);
1337  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
1338  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
1339  primitive_data_vec4.erase(label);
1340  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
1341  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
1342  primitive_data_int2.erase(label);
1343  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
1344  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
1345  primitive_data_int3.erase(label);
1346  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
1347  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
1348  primitive_data_int4.erase(label);
1349  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
1350  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
1351  primitive_data_string.erase(label);
1352  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
1353  }else{
1354  assert(false);
1355  }
1356 
1357 }
1358 
1359 bool Primitive::doesPrimitiveDataExist( const char* label ) const{
1360 
1361  if( primitive_data_types.find(label) == primitive_data_types.end() ){
1362  return false;
1363  }else{
1364  return true;
1365  }
1366 
1367 }
1368 
1369 std::vector<std::string> Primitive::listPrimitiveData() const{
1370 
1371  std::vector<std::string> labels(primitive_data_types.size());
1372 
1373  size_t i=0;
1374  for(const auto & primitive_data_type : primitive_data_types){
1375  labels.at(i) = primitive_data_type.first;
1376  i++;
1377  }
1378 
1379  return labels;
1380 
1381 }
1382 
1383 void Context::setPrimitiveData( const uint& UUID, const char* label, const int& data ){
1384  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1385  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (setPrimitiveData): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.") );
1386  }
1387  primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label,data);
1388 }
1389

1391  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1392  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (setPrimitiveData): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.") );
1393  }
1394  primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label,data);
1395 }

1698 
1699 void Context::setPrimitiveData( const std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<uint> > >& UUIDs, const char* label, const helios::int3& data ){
1700  for(const auto & j : UUIDs){
1701  for( const auto& i : j ) {
1702  for (const auto &UUID: i) {
1703  setPrimitiveData(UUID, label, data);
1704  }
1705  }
1706  }
1707 }
1708 
1709 void Context::setPrimitiveData( const std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<uint> > >& UUIDs, const char* label, const helios::int4& data ){
1710  for(const auto & j : UUIDs){
1711  for( const auto& i : j ) {
1712  for (const auto &UUID: i) {
1713  setPrimitiveData(UUID, label, data);
1714  }
1715  }
1716  }
1717 }

1719 void Context::setPrimitiveData( const std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<uint> > >& UUIDs, const char* label, const std::string& data ){
1720  for(const auto & j : UUIDs){
1721  for( const auto& i : j ) {
1722  for (const auto &UUID: i) {
1723  setPrimitiveData(UUID, label, data);
1724  }
1725  }
1726  }
1727 }
1728 
1729 void Context::getPrimitiveData(uint UUID, const char* label, int& data ) const{
1730  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1731  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPrimitiveData): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
1732  }
1733  primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label,data);
1734 }
1735

1883 HeliosDataType Context::getPrimitiveDataType( const uint UUID, const char* label )const{
1884  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1885  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPrimitiveData): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
1886  }
1887  return primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveDataType(label);
1888 }

1895 }

1898  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1899  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPrimitiveData): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
1900  }
1901  return primitives.at(UUID)->doesPrimitiveDataExist(label);
1902 }
1903 
1904 void Context::clearPrimitiveData( const uint UUID, const char* label ){
1905  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1906  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPrimitiveData): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
1907  }
1908  primitives.at(UUID)->clearPrimitiveData(label);
1909 }
1910 
1911 void Context::clearPrimitiveData( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, const char* label ){
1912  for( unsigned int UUID : UUIDs){
1913  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
1914  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPrimitiveData): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
1915  }
1916  primitives.at(UUID)->clearPrimitiveData(label);
1917  }
1918 }

2200 void Context::setObjectData( const std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<uint> > >& objIDs, const char* label, const helios::vec2& data ){
2201  for( const auto & j : objIDs){
2202  for( const auto & i : j ){
2203  for( const auto & objID : i ) {
2204  setObjectData(objID, label, data);
2205  }
2206  }
2207  }
2208 }

2270 void Context::getObjectData( const uint objID, const char* label, int& data ) const{
2271  if( objects.find(objID) == objects.end() ){
2272  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): objID of " + std::to_string(objID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
2273  }
2274  objects.at(objID)->getObjectData(label,data);
2275 }

2461 void Context::setGlobalData( const char* label, const int& data ){
2462  std::vector<int> vec{data};
2463  globaldata[label].type = HELIOS_TYPE_INT;
2464  globaldata[label].size = 1;
2465  globaldata[label].global_data_int = vec;
2466 }

2537 
2538 void Context::setGlobalData( const char* label, HeliosDataType type, size_t size, void* data ){
2539 
2540  globaldata[label].type = type;
2541  globaldata[label].size = size;
2542 
2543  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
2544 
2545  auto* data_ptr = (int*)data;
2546 
2547  std::vector<int> vec;
2548  vec.resize(size);
2549  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2550  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2551  }
2552  globaldata[label].global_data_int = vec;
2553 
2554  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
2555 
2556  auto* data_ptr = (uint*)data;
2557 
2558  std::vector<uint> vec;
2559  vec.resize(size);
2560  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2561  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2562  }
2563  globaldata[label].global_data_uint = vec;
2564 
2565  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
2566 
2567  auto* data_ptr = (float*)data;
2568 
2569  std::vector<float> vec;
2570  vec.resize(size);
2571  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2572  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2573  }
2574  globaldata[label].global_data_float = vec;
2575 
2576  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
2577 
2578  auto* data_ptr = (double*)data;
2579 
2580  std::vector<double> vec;
2581  vec.resize(size);
2582  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2583  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2584  }
2585  globaldata[label].global_data_double = vec;
2586 
2587  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
2588 
2589  auto* data_ptr = (vec2*)data;
2590 
2591  std::vector<vec2> vec;
2592  vec.resize(size);
2593  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2594  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2595  }
2596  globaldata[label].global_data_vec2 = vec;
2597 
2598  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
2599 
2600  auto* data_ptr = (vec3*)data;
2601 
2602  std::vector<vec3> vec;
2603  vec.resize(size);
2604  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2605  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2606  }
2607  globaldata[label].global_data_vec3= vec;
2608 
2609  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
2610 
2611  auto* data_ptr = (vec4*)data;
2612 
2613  std::vector<vec4> vec;
2614  vec.resize(size);
2615  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2616  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2617  }
2618  globaldata[label].global_data_vec4 = vec;
2619 
2620  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
2621 
2622  auto* data_ptr = (int2*)data;
2623 
2624  std::vector<int2> vec;
2625  vec.resize(size);
2626  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2627  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2628  }
2629  globaldata[label].global_data_int2 = vec;
2630 
2631  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
2632 
2633  auto* data_ptr = (int3*)data;
2634 
2635  std::vector<int3> vec;
2636  vec.resize(size);
2637  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2638  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2639  }
2640  globaldata[label].global_data_int3 = vec;
2641 
2642  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
2643 
2644  auto* data_ptr = (int4*)data;
2645 
2646  std::vector<int4> vec;
2647  vec.resize(size);
2648  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2649  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2650  }
2651  globaldata[label].global_data_int4 = vec;
2652 
2653  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
2654 
2655  auto* data_ptr = (std::string*)data;
2656 
2657  std::vector<std::string> vec;
2658  vec.resize(size);
2659  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2660  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2661  }
2662  globaldata[label].global_data_string = vec;
2663 
2664  }
2665 
2666 }
2667 
2668 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, int& data ) const{
2669 
2670  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
2671  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getGlobalData): Global data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist in the Context."));
2672  }
2673 
2674  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
2675 
2676  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
2677  std::vector<int> d = gdata.global_data_int;
2678  data = d.front();
2679  }else{
2680  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get global data for type int, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' does not have type int."));
2681  }
2682 
2683 }
2684 
2685 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, std::vector<int>& data ) const{
2686 
2687  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
2688  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getGlobalData): Global data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist in the Context."));
2689  }
2690 
2691  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
2692 
2693  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
2694  std::vector<int> d = gdata.global_data_int;
2695  data = d;
2696  }else{
2697  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get global data for type int, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' does not have type int."));
2698  }
2699 
2700 }
2701 
2702 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, uint& data ) const{
2703 
2704  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
2705  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getGlobalData): Global data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist in the Context."));
2706  }
2707 
2708  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
2709 
2710  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
2711  std::vector<uint> d = gdata.global_data_uint;
2712  data = d.front();
2713  }else{
2714  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get global data for type uint, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' does not have type uint."));
2715  }
2716 
2717 }
2718 
2719 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, std::vector<uint>& data ) const{
2720 
2721  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
2722  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getGlobalData): Global data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist in the Context."));
2723  }
2724 
2725  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
2726 
2727  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
2728  std::vector<uint> d = gdata.global_data_uint;
2729  data = d;
2730  }else{
2731  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get global data for type uint, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' does not have type uint."));
2732  }
2733 
2734 }
2735 
2736 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, float& data ) const{
2737 
2738  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
2739  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getGlobalData): Global data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist in the Context."));
2740  }
2741 
2742  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
2743 
2744  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
2745  std::vector<float> d = gdata.global_data_float;
2746  data = d.front();
2747  }else{
2748  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get global data for type float, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' does not have type float."));
2749  }
2750 
2751 }
2752

2764  }else{

3061 
3062 bool Context::doesGlobalDataExist( const char* label ) const{
3063 
3064  if( globaldata.find(label) == globaldata.end() ){
3065  return false;
3066  }else{
3067  return true;
3068  }
3069 
3070 }

3072 
3073 Patch::Patch( const RGBAcolor& a_color, uint a_UUID ){
3074 
3075  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
3076 
3077  color = a_color;
3078  assert( color.r>=0 && color.r<=1 && color.g>=0 && color.g<=1 && color.b>=0 && color.b<=1 );
3079  UUID = a_UUID;
3080  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH;
3081  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3082  texturefile = "";
3083  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3084 
3085 }

3112 
3113 helios::vec2 Patch::getSize() const{
3114  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
3115  float l = (vertices.at(1)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
3116  float w = (vertices.at(3)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
3117  return make_vec2(l,w);
3118 }
3119 
3120 helios::vec3 Patch::getCenter() const{
3121  return make_vec3(transform[3],transform[7],transform[11]);
3122 }

3136 Triangle::Triangle( const vec3& a_vertex0, const vec3& a_vertex1, const vec3& a_vertex2, const char* a_texturefile, const std::vector<vec2>& a_uv, float a_solid_fraction, uint a_UUID ){
3137 
3138  makeTransformationMatrix(a_vertex0,a_vertex1,a_vertex2);
3139  color = make_RGBAcolor(RGB::red,1);
3140  UUID = a_UUID;
3141  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE;
3142 
3143  texturefile = a_texturefile;
3144  uv = a_uv;
3145  solid_fraction = a_solid_fraction;
3146  texturecoloroverridden = false;

3149 
3150 vec3 Triangle::getVertex( int number ){
3151 
3152  if( number<0 || number>2 ){
3153  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getVertex): vertex index must be 1, 2, or 3."));
3154  }
3155 
3156  vec3 Y[3];
3157  Y[0] = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
3158  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
3159  Y[2] = make_vec3( 1.f, 1.f, 0.f);
3160 
3161  vec3 vertex;
3162 
3163  vertex.x = transform[0] * Y[number].x + transform[1] * Y[number].y + transform[2] * Y[number].z + transform[3];
3164  vertex.y = transform[4] * Y[number].x + transform[5] * Y[number].y + transform[6] * Y[number].z + transform[7];
3165  vertex.z = transform[8] * Y[number].x + transform[9] * Y[number].y + transform[10] * Y[number].z + transform[11];
3166 
3167  return vertex;
3168 
3169 }
3170 
3171 vec3 Triangle::getCenter() const{
3172 
3173 // Y[0] = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
3174 // Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
3175 // Y[2] = make_vec3( 1.f/3.f, 1.f, 0.f);
3176 
3177  vec3 center0 = make_vec3(1.f/3.f,2.f/3.f,0.f);
3178  vec3 center;
3179 
3180  center.x = transform[0] * center0.x + transform[1] * center0.y + transform[2] * center0.z + transform[3];
3181  center.y = transform[4] * center0.x + transform[5] * center0.y + transform[6] * center0.z + transform[7];
3182  center.z = transform[8] * center0.x + transform[9] * center0.y + transform[10] * center0.z + transform[11];
3183 
3184  return center;
3185 
3186 }
3187 
3188 Voxel::Voxel( const RGBAcolor& a_color, uint a_UUID ){
3189 
3190  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
3191 
3192  color = a_color;
3193  assert( color.r>=0 && color.r<=1 && color.g>=0 && color.g<=1 && color.b>=0 && color.b<=1 );
3194  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3195  UUID = a_UUID;
3196  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL;
3197  texturefile = "";
3198  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3199 
3200 }
3201 
3202 float Voxel::getVolume(){
3203 
3204  vec3 size = getSize();
3205 
3206  return size.x*size.y*size.z;
3207 }
3208 
3209 vec3 Voxel::getCenter() const{
3210 
3211  vec3 center;
3212  vec3 Y;
3213  Y.x = 0.f;
3214  Y.y = 0.f;
3215  Y.z = 0.f;
3216 
3217  center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
3218  center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
3219  center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];
3220 
3221  return center;
3222 
3223 }
3224 
3225 vec3 Voxel::getSize(){
3226 
3227  vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(1,0,0), ny(0,1,0), nz(0,0,1);
3228  vec3 n0_T, nx_T, ny_T, nz_T;
3229 
3230  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
3231  vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
3232  vecmult(transform,ny,ny_T);
3233  vecmult(transform,nz,nz_T);
3234 
3235  float x = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3236  float y = (ny_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3237  float z = (nz_T-n0_T).magnitude();
3238 
3239  return make_vec3(x,y,z);
3240 
3241 }
3242 
3243 void Context::setDate( int day, int month, int year ){
3244 
3245  if( day<1 || day>31 ){
3246  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setDate): Day of month is out of range (day of " + std::to_string(day) + " was given).") );
3247  }else if( month<1 || month>12){
3248  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setDate): Month of year is out of range (month of " + std::to_string(month) + " was given).") );
3249  }else if( year<1000 ){
3250  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format.") );
3251  }
3252 
3253  sim_date = make_Date(day,month,year);
3254 
3255 }
3256 
3257 void Context::setDate( Date date ){
3258 
3259  if( date.day<1 || date.day>31 ){
3260  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setDate): Day of month is out of range (day of " + std::to_string(date.day) + " was given).") );
3261  }else if( date.month<1 || date.month>12){
3262  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setDate): Month of year is out of range (month of " + std::to_string(date.month) + " was given).") );
3263  }else if( date.year<1000 ){
3264  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format.") );
3265  }
3266 
3267  sim_date = date;
3268 
3269 }
3270 
3271 void Context::setDate( int Julian_day, int year ){
3272 
3273  if( Julian_day<1 || Julian_day>366 ){
3274  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setDate): Julian day out of range.") );
3275  }else if( year<1000 ){
3276  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format.") );
3277  }
3278 
3279  sim_date = CalendarDay( Julian_day, year );
3280 
3281 }
3282 
3283 Date Context::getDate() const{
3284  return sim_date;
3285 }
3286 
3287 const char* Context::getMonthString() const{
3288  if( sim_date.month==1 ){
3289  return "JAN";
3290  }else if( sim_date.month==2 ){
3291  return "FEB";
3292  }else if( sim_date.month==3 ){
3293  return "MAR";
3294  }else if( sim_date.month==4 ){
3295  return "APR";
3296  }else if( sim_date.month==5 ){
3297  return "MAY";
3298  }else if( sim_date.month==6 ){
3299  return "JUN";
3300  }else if( sim_date.month==7 ){
3301  return "JUL";
3302  }else if( sim_date.month==8 ){
3303  return "AUG";
3304  }else if( sim_date.month==9 ){
3305  return "SEP";
3306  }else if( sim_date.month==10 ){
3307  return "OCT";
3308  }else if( sim_date.month==11 ){
3309  return "NOV";
3310  }else{
3311  return "DEC";
3312  }
3313 
3314 }
3315 
3316 int Context::getJulianDate() const{
3317  return JulianDay( sim_date.day, sim_date.month, sim_date.year );
3318 }
3319 
3320 void Context::setTime( int minute, int hour ){
3321  setTime(0,minute,hour);
3322 }
3323 
3324 void Context::setTime( int second, int minute, int hour ){
3325 
3326  if( second<0 || second>59 ){
3327  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setTime): Second out of range (0-59).") );
3328  }else if( minute<0 || minute>59 ){
3329  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setTime): Minute out of range (0-59).") );
3330  }else if( hour<0 || hour>23 ){
3331  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setTime): Hour out of range (0-23).") );
3332  }
3333 
3334  sim_time = make_Time(hour,minute,second);
3335 
3336 }
3337 
3338 void Context::setTime( Time time ){
3339 
3340  if( time.minute<0 || time.minute>59 ){
3341  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setTime): Minute out of range (0-59).") );
3342  }else if( time.hour<0 || time.hour>23 ){
3343  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setTime): Hour out of range (0-23).") );
3344  }
3345 
3346  sim_time = time;
3347 
3348 }
3349 
3350 Time Context::getTime() const{
3351  return sim_time;
3352 }
3353 
3354 float Context::randu(){
3355  return unif_distribution(generator);
3356 }
3357 
3358 float Context::randu( float minrange, float maxrange ){
3359  if( maxrange<minrange ){
3360  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (randu): Maximum value of range must be greater than minimum value of range.") );
3361  }else if( maxrange==minrange ){
3362  return minrange;
3363  }else{
3364  return minrange+unif_distribution(generator)*(maxrange-minrange);
3365  }
3366 }
3367 
3368 int Context::randu( int minrange, int maxrange ){
3369  if( maxrange<minrange ){
3370  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (randu): Maximum value of range must be greater than minimum value of range.") );
3371  }else if( maxrange==minrange ){
3372  return minrange;
3373  }else{
3374  return minrange+(int)lroundf(unif_distribution(generator)*float(maxrange-minrange));
3375  }
3376 }
3377 
3378 float Context::randn(){
3379  return norm_distribution(generator);
3380 }
3381 
3382 float Context::randn( float mean, float stddev ){
3383  return mean+norm_distribution(generator)*fabsf(stddev);
3384 }
3385 
3386 uint Context::addPatch(){
3387  return addPatch(make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec2(1,1),make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
3388 }
3389 
3390 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ){
3391  return addPatch(center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
3392 }
3393 
3394 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation ){
3395  return addPatch(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
3396 }
3397 
3398 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBcolor& color ){
3399  return addPatch(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
3400 }
3401 
3402 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBAcolor& color ){
3403 
3404  if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
3405  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addPatch): Size of patch must be greater than 0.") );
3406  }
3407 
3408  auto* patch_new = (new Patch( color, currentUUID ));
3409 
3410 // if( patch_new->getArea()==0 ){
3411 // throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Patch has area of zero.") );
3412 // }
3413 
3414  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3415 
3416  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
3417 
3418  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
3419  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
3420  }
3421  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
3422  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
3423  }
3424 
3425  patch_new->translate( center );
3426 
3427  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
3428  markGeometryDirty();
3429  currentUUID++;
3430  return currentUUID-1;
3431 }
3432 
3433 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const char* texture_file ){
3434 
3435  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
3436  std::string fn = texture_file;
3437  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
3438  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addPatch): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
3439  }
3440 
3441  addTexture( texture_file );
3442 
3443  auto* patch_new = (new Patch( texture_file, textures.at(texture_file).getSolidFraction(), currentUUID ));
3444 
3445 // if( patch_new->getArea()==0 ){
3446 // throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Patch has area of zero.") );
3447 // }
3448 
3449  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3450 
3451  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
3452  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
3453 
3454  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
3455  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
3456  }
3457  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
3458  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
3459  }
3460 
3461  patch_new->translate( center );
3462 
3463  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
3464  markGeometryDirty();
3465  currentUUID++;
3466  return currentUUID-1;
3467 }
3468 
3469 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const char* texture_file, const helios::vec2& uv_center, const helios::vec2& uv_size ){
3470 
3471  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
3472  std::string fn = texture_file;
3473  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
3474  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addPatch): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
3475  }
3476 
3477  if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
3478  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addPatch): Size of patch must be greater than 0.") );
3479  }
3480 
3481  if( uv_center.x-0.5*uv_size.x<-1e-3 || uv_center.y-0.5*uv_size.y<-1e-3 || uv_center.x+0.5*uv_size.x-1.f>1e-3 || uv_center.y+0.5*uv_size.y-1.f>1e-3 ){
3482  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addPatch): Invalid texture coordinates. uv_center-0.5*uv_size should be >=0 and uv_center+0.5*uv_size should be <=1.") );
3483  }
3484 
3485  addTexture( texture_file );
3486 
3487  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
3488  uv.resize(4);
3489  uv.at(0) = uv_center+make_vec2(-0.5f*uv_size.x,-0.5f*uv_size.y);
3490  uv.at(1) = uv_center+make_vec2(+0.5f*uv_size.x,-0.5f*uv_size.y);
3491  uv.at(2) = uv_center+make_vec2(+0.5f*uv_size.x,+0.5f*uv_size.y);
3492  uv.at(3) = uv_center+make_vec2(-0.5f*uv_size.x,+0.5f*uv_size.y);
3493 
3494  float solid_fraction;
3495  if( textures.at(texture_file).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
3496  const std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha = textures.at(texture_file).getTransparencyData();
3497  int A = 0;
3498  int At = 0;
3499  int2 sz = textures.at(texture_file).getSize();
3500  int2 uv_min( floor(uv.at(0).x*float(sz.x)), floor(uv.at(0).y*float(sz.y)) );
3501  int2 uv_max( floor(uv.at(2).x*float(sz.x)), floor(uv.at(2).y*float(sz.y)) );
3502  for( int j=uv_min.y; j<uv_max.y; j++ ){
3503  for( int i=uv_min.x; i<uv_max.x; i++ ){
3504  At += 1;
3505  if( alpha->at(j).at(i) ){
3506  A += 1;
3507  }
3508  }
3509  }
3510  if( At==0 ){
3511  solid_fraction = 0;
3512  }else{
3513  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
3514  }
3515  }else{
3516  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3517  }
3518  auto* patch_new = (new Patch( texture_file, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
3519 
3520 // if( patch_new->getArea()==0 ){
3521 // throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addPatch): Patch has area of zero.") );
3522 // }
3523 
3524  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3525 
3526  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
3527  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
3528 
3529  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
3530  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
3531  }
3532  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
3533  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
3534  }
3535 
3536  patch_new->translate( center );
3537 
3538  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
3539  markGeometryDirty();
3540  currentUUID++;
3541  return currentUUID-1;
3542 }
3543 
3544 uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2 ){
3545  return addTriangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1) );
3546 }
3547 
3548 uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2, const RGBcolor& color ){
3549  return addTriangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, make_RGBAcolor(color,1) );
3550 }
3551 
3552 bool edgeFunction(const helios::vec2 &a, const helios::vec2 &b, const helios::vec2 &c){
3553  return ((c.y - a.y) * (b.x - a.x)-(c.x - a.x) * (b.y - a.y) >= 0);
3554 }
3555 
3556 uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2, const RGBAcolor& color ){
3557 
3558  auto* tri_new = (new Triangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, color, currentUUID ));
3559 
3560 // if( tri_new->getArea()==0 ){
3561 // throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTriangle): Triangle has area of zero.") );
3562 // }
3563 
3564  tri_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3565  primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
3566  markGeometryDirty();
3567  currentUUID++;
3568  return currentUUID-1;
3569 }
3570 
3571 uint Context::addTriangle( const helios::vec3& vertex0, const helios::vec3& vertex1, const helios::vec3& vertex2, const char* texture_file, const helios::vec2& uv0, const helios::vec2& uv1, const helios::vec2& uv2 ){
3572 
3573  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
3574  std::string fn = texture_file;
3575  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
3576  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTriangle): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
3577  }
3578 
3579  addTexture( texture_file );
3580 
3581  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
3582  uv.resize(3);
3583  uv.at(0) = uv0;
3584  uv.at(1) = uv1;
3585  uv.at(2) = uv2;
3586 
3587  float solid_fraction;
3588  if( textures.at(texture_file).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
3589  const std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha = textures.at(texture_file).getTransparencyData();
3590  int2 sz = textures.at(texture_file).getSize();
3591  int2 uv_min( (int)lroundf(fmin(fmin(uv0.x,uv1.x),uv2.x)*float(sz.x)), (int)lroundf(fmin(fmin(uv0.y,uv1.y),uv2.y)*float(sz.y)) );
3592  int2 uv_max( (int)lroundf(fmax(fmax(uv0.x,uv1.x),uv2.x)*float(sz.x)), (int)lroundf(fmax(fmax(uv0.y,uv1.y),uv2.y)*float(sz.y)) );
3593  int A = 0;
3594  int At = 0;
3595  vec2 xy;
3596  for( int j=uv_min.y; j<uv_max.y; j++ ){
3597  for( int i=uv_min.x; i<uv_max.x; i++ ){
3598  xy.x = float(i+0.5)/float(sz.x-1);
3599  xy.y = float(j+0.5)/float(sz.y-1);
3600 
3601  bool test_0 = edgeFunction( uv.at(0), uv.at(1), xy);
3602  bool test_1 = edgeFunction( uv.at(1), uv.at(2), xy );
3603  bool test_2 = edgeFunction( uv.at(2), uv.at(0), xy ) ;
3604  uint test_sum = test_0 + test_1 + test_2;
3605 
3606  if(test_sum == 0 || test_sum == 3){
3607  At += 1;
3608  if( alpha->at(j).at(i) ){
3609  A += 1;
3610  }
3611  }
3612  }
3613  }
3614  if( At==0 ){
3615  solid_fraction = 0;
3616  }else{
3617  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
3618  }
3619  }else{
3620  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3621  }
3622 
3623  auto* tri_new = (new Triangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, texture_file, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
3624 
3625 // if( tri_new->getArea()==0 ){
3626 // throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTriangle): Triangle has area of zero.") );
3627 // }
3628 
3629  tri_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3630  primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
3631  markGeometryDirty();
3632  currentUUID++;
3633  return currentUUID-1;
3634 }
3635

3648 uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size, const float& rotation, const RGBAcolor& color ){
3649 
3650  auto* voxel_new = (new Voxel( color, currentUUID ));
3651 
3652  if( size.x*size.y*size.z==0 ){
3653  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addVoxel): Voxel has size of zero.") );
3654  }
3655 
3656  voxel_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3657 
3658  voxel_new->scale( size );
3659 
3660  if( rotation!=0 ){
3661  voxel_new->rotate( rotation, "z" );
3662  }
3663 
3664  voxel_new->translate( center );
3665 
3666  primitives[currentUUID] = voxel_new;
3667  markGeometryDirty();
3668  currentUUID++;
3669  return currentUUID-1;
3670 }

3722 void Context::deletePrimitive( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs ){
3723  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
3724  deletePrimitive( UUID );
3725  }
3726 }
3727 
3728 void Context::deletePrimitive(uint UUID ){
3729 
3730  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3731  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (deletePrimitive): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " not found in the context.") );
3732  }
3733 
3734  Primitive* prim = primitives.at(UUID);
3735 
3736  if( prim->getParentObjectID()!=0 ){//primitive belongs to an object
3737 
3738  uint ObjID = prim->getParentObjectID();
3739  if( doesObjectExist(ObjID) ) {
3740  objects.at(ObjID)->deleteChildPrimitive(UUID);
3741  }
3742  }
3743 
3744  delete prim;
3745  primitives.erase(UUID);
3746 
3747  markGeometryDirty();
3748 
3749 }
3750 
3751 std::vector<uint> Context::copyPrimitive(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs ){
3752 
3753  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_copy(UUIDs.size());
3754  size_t i=0;
3755  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
3756  UUIDs_copy.at(i) = copyPrimitive( UUID );
3757  i++;
3758  }
3759 
3760  return UUIDs_copy;
3761 
3762 }
3763 
3764 uint Context::copyPrimitive( uint UUID ){
3765 
3766  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3767  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (copyPrimitive): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " not found in the context.") );
3768  }
3769 
3770  PrimitiveType type = primitives.at(UUID)->getType();
3771  uint parentID = primitives.at(UUID)->getParentObjectID();
3772  bool textureoverride = primitives.at(UUID)->isTextureColorOverridden();
3773 
3774  if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
3775  Patch* p = getPatchPointer_private(UUID);
3776  std::vector<vec2> uv = p->getTextureUV();
3777  vec2 size = p->getSize();
3778  float solid_fraction = p->getArea()/(size.x*size.y);
3779  Patch* patch_new;
3780  if( !p->hasTexture() ){
3781  patch_new = (new Patch( p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
3782  }else{
3783  std::string texture_file = p->getTextureFile();
3784  if( uv.size()==4 ){
3785  patch_new = (new Patch( texture_file.c_str(), uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
3786  }else{
3787  patch_new = (new Patch( texture_file.c_str(), solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
3788  }
3789  }
3790  float transform[16];
3791  p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
3792  patch_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
3793  patch_new->setParentObjectID(parentID);
3794  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
3795  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
3796  Triangle* p = getTrianglePointer_private(UUID);
3797  std::vector<vec3> vertices = p->getVertices();
3798  std::vector<vec2> uv = p->getTextureUV();
3799  Triangle* tri_new;
3800  if( !p->hasTexture() ){
3801  tri_new = (new Triangle( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2), p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
3802  }else{
3803  std::string texture_file = p->getTextureFile();
3804  float solid_fraction = p->getArea()/calculateTriangleArea( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2) );
3805  tri_new = (new Triangle( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2), texture_file.c_str(), uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
3806  }
3807  float transform[16];
3808  p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
3809  tri_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
3810  tri_new->setParentObjectID(parentID);
3811  primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
3812  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
3813  Voxel* p = getVoxelPointer_private(UUID);
3814  Voxel* voxel_new;
3815  //if( !p->hasTexture() ){
3816  voxel_new = (new Voxel( p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
3817  //}else{
3818  // voxel_new = (new Voxel( p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
3819  /* \todo Texture-mapped voxels constructor here */
3820  //}
3821  float transform[16];
3822  p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
3823  voxel_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
3824  voxel_new->setParentObjectID(parentID);
3825  primitives[currentUUID] = voxel_new;
3826  }
3827 
3828  copyPrimitiveData( UUID, currentUUID );
3829 
3830  if( textureoverride ){
3831  getPrimitivePointer_private(currentUUID)->overrideTextureColor();
3832  }
3833 
3834  markGeometryDirty();
3835  currentUUID++;
3836  return currentUUID-1;
3837 }
3838 
3839 void Context::copyPrimitiveData( uint UUID, uint oldUUID){
3840  //copy the primitive data
3841  std::vector<std::string> plabel = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->listPrimitiveData();
3842  for(auto & p : plabel){
3843 
3844  HeliosDataType type = getPrimitiveDataType( UUID, p.c_str() );
3845 
3846  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
3847  std::vector<int> pdata;
3848  getPrimitiveData( UUID, p.c_str(), pdata );
3849  setPrimitiveData( oldUUID, p.c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_INT, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
3850  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
3851  std::vector<uint> pdata;
3852  getPrimitiveData( UUID, p.c_str(), pdata );
3853  setPrimitiveData( oldUUID, p.c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_UINT, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
3854  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
3855  std::vector<float> pdata;
3856  getPrimitiveData( UUID, p.c_str(), pdata );
3857  setPrimitiveData( oldUUID, p.c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
3858  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
3859  std::vector<double> pdata;
3860  getPrimitiveData( UUID, p.c_str(), pdata );
3861  setPrimitiveData( oldUUID, p.c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
3862  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
3863  std::vector<vec2> pdata;
3864  getPrimitiveData( UUID, p.c_str(), pdata );
3865  setPrimitiveData( oldUUID, p.c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
3866  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
3867  std::vector<vec3> pdata;
3868  getPrimitiveData( UUID, p.c_str(), pdata );
3869  setPrimitiveData( oldUUID, p.c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
3870  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
3871  std::vector<vec4> pdata;
3872  getPrimitiveData( UUID, p.c_str(), pdata );
3873  setPrimitiveData( oldUUID, p.c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
3874  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
3875  std::vector<int2> pdata;
3876  getPrimitiveData( UUID, p.c_str(), pdata );
3877  setPrimitiveData( oldUUID, p.c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_INT2, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
3878  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
3879  std::vector<int3> pdata;
3880  getPrimitiveData( UUID, p.c_str(), pdata );
3881  setPrimitiveData( oldUUID, p.c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_INT3, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
3882  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
3883  std::vector<int4> pdata;
3884  getPrimitiveData( UUID, p.c_str(), pdata );
3885  setPrimitiveData( oldUUID, p.c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_INT4, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
3886  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
3887  std::vector<std::string> pdata;
3888  getPrimitiveData( UUID, p.c_str(), pdata );
3889  setPrimitiveData( oldUUID, p.c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_STRING, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
3890  }else{
3891  assert(false);
3892  }
3893 
3894  }
3895 }
3896 
3897 Primitive* Context::getPrimitivePointer( uint UUID ) const{
3898  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3899  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPrimitivePointer): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.") );
3900  }
3901  return primitives.at(UUID);
3902 }
3903 
3904 Primitive* Context::getPrimitivePointer_private( uint UUID ) const{
3905  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3906  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPrimitivePointer): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.") );
3907  }
3908  return primitives.at(UUID);
3909 }
3910 
3911 bool Context::doesPrimitiveExist(uint UUID ) const{
3912  return primitives.find(UUID) != primitives.end();
3913 }
3914 
3915 Patch* Context::getPatchPointer(uint UUID ) const{
3916  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3917  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPatchPointer): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.") );
3918  }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
3919  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPatchPointer): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " is not a patch.") );
3920  }
3921  return dynamic_cast<Patch*>(primitives.at(UUID));
3922 }
3923

3925  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3926  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPatchPointer): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.") );
3927  }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
3928  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPatchPointer): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " is not a patch.") );
3929  }
3930  return dynamic_cast<Patch*>(primitives.at(UUID));
3931 }

3935  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPatchSize): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.") );

3969 helios::vec3 Context::getTriangleVertex( uint UUID, uint number ) const{
3970  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3971  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTriangleVertex): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context.") );
3972  }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
3973  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTriangleVertex): UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " is not a triangle.") );
3974  }else if( number>2 ){
3975  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTriangleVertex): Vertex index must be one of 0, 1, or 2.") );
3976  }
3977  return dynamic_cast<Triangle*>(primitives.at(UUID))->getVertex( number );
3978 }
