4020 std::vector<uint> Context::getAllUUIDs() const{
4021  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
4022  UUIDs.resize(primitives.size());
4023  size_t i=0;
4024  for( auto primitive : primitives){
4025  UUIDs.at(i) = primitive.first;
4026  i++;
4027  }
4028  return UUIDs;
4029 }
4030 
4031 void Context::addTimeseriesData(const char* label, float value, const Date &date, const Time &time ){
4032 
4033  //floating point value corresponding to date and time
4034  double date_value = floor(date.year*366.25) + date.JulianDay();
4035  date_value += double(time.hour)/24. + double(time.minute)/1440. + double(time.second)/86400.;
4036 
4037  //Check if data label already exists
4038  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4039  timeseries_data[label].push_back( value );
4040  timeseries_datevalue[label].push_back( date_value );
4041  return;
4042  }else{ //exists
4043 
4044  uint N = getTimeseriesLength(label);
4045 
4046  auto it_data = timeseries_data[label].begin();
4047  auto it_datevalue = timeseries_datevalue[label].begin();
4048 
4049  if( N==1 ){
4050 
4051  if( date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].front() ){
4052  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data, value);
4053  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue, date_value);
4054  return;
4055  }else{
4056  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data+1, value);
4057  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue+1, date_value);
4058  return;
4059  }
4060 
4061  }else{
4062 
4063  if( date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].front() ){ //check if data should be inserted at beginning of timeseries
4064  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data, value);
4065  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue, date_value);
4066  return;
4067  }else if( date_value>timeseries_datevalue[label].back() ){ //check if data should be inserted at end of timeseries
4068  timeseries_data[label].push_back( value);
4069  timeseries_datevalue[label].push_back( date_value);
4070  return;
4071  }
4072 
4073  //data should be inserted somewhere in the middle of timeseries
4074  for( uint t=0; t<N-1; t++ ){
4075  if( date_value==timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t) ){
4076  std::cout << "WARNING (addTimeseriesData): Skipping duplicate timeseries date/time." << std::endl;
4077  continue;
4078  }
4079  if( date_value>timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t) && date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t+1) ){
4080  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data+t+1, value);
4081  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue+t+1, date_value);
4082  return;
4083  }
4084  }
4085 
4086  }
4087 
4088  }
4089 
4090  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTimeseriesData): Failed to insert timeseries data for unknown reason.") );
4091 
4092 }
4093 
4094 void Context::setCurrentTimeseriesPoint(const char* label, uint index ){
4095  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4096  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setCurrentTimeseriesPoint): Timeseries variable `" + std::string(label) + "' does not exist."));
4097  }
4098  setDate( queryTimeseriesDate( label, index ) );
4099  setTime( queryTimeseriesTime( label, index ) );
4100 }
4101 
4102 float Context::queryTimeseriesData(const char* label, const Date &date, const Time &time ) const{
4103  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4104  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (setCurrentTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable `" + std::string(label) + "' does not exist."));
4105  }
4106 
4107  double date_value = floor(date.year*366.25) + date.JulianDay();
4108  date_value += double(time.hour)/24. + double(time.minute)/1440. + double(time.second)/86400.;
4109 
4110  double tmin = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).front();
4111  double tmax = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).back();
4112 
4113  if( date_value<tmin ){
4114  std::cerr << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries date and time is outside of the range of the data. Using the earliest data point in the timeseries." << std::endl;
4115  return timeseries_data.at(label).front();
4116  }else if( date_value>tmax ){
4117  std::cerr << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries date and time is outside of the range of the data. Using the latest data point in the timeseries." << std::endl;
4118  return timeseries_data.at(label).back();
4119  }
4120 
4121  if( timeseries_datevalue.at(label).empty() ){
4122  std::cout << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): timeseries " << label << " does not contain any data." << std::endl;
4123  return 0;
4124  }else if( timeseries_datevalue.at(label).size() == 1 ){
4125  return timeseries_data.at(label).front();
4126  }else{
4127  int i;
4128  bool success=false;
4129  for( i=0; i<timeseries_data.at(label).size()-1; i++ ){
4130  if( date_value>=timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i) && date_value<=timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i+1) ){
4131  success = true;
4132  break;
4133  }
4134  }
4135 
4136  if(!success){
4137  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (queryTimeseriesData): Failed to query timeseries data for unknown reason.") );
4138  }
4139 
4140  double xminus = timeseries_data.at(label).at(i);
4141  double xplus = timeseries_data.at(label).at(i+1);
4142 
4143  double tminus = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i);
4144  double tplus = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i+1);
4145 
4146  return float(xminus + (xplus-xminus)*(date_value-tminus)/(tplus-tminus));
4147 
4148  }
4149 
4150 }
4151 
4152 float Context::queryTimeseriesData( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
4153 
4154  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4155  std::cout << "WARNING (getTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
4156  }
4157 
4158  return timeseries_data.at(label).at(index);
4159 
4160 }
4161 
4162 Time Context::queryTimeseriesTime( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
4163 
4164  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4165  std::cout << "WARNING (getTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
4166  }
4167 
4168  double dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(index);
4169 
4170  int year = floor(floor(dateval)/366.25);
4171  assert( year>1000 && year<10000 );
4172 
4173  int JD = floor(dateval-floor(double(year)*366.25));
4174  assert( JD>0 && JD<367 );
4175 
4176  int hour = floor((dateval-floor(dateval))*24.);
4177  int minute = floor( ((dateval-floor(dateval))*24.-double(hour))*60. );
4178  int second = (int)lround( ( ( ( dateval - floor(dateval) )*24. - double(hour))*60. - double(minute) )*60.);
4179 
4180  if( second==60 ){
4181  second = 0;
4182  minute ++;
4183  }
4184 
4185  if( minute==60 ){
4186  minute = 0;
4187  hour ++;
4188  }
4189 
4190  assert( second>=0 && second<60 );
4191  assert( minute>=0 && minute<60 );
4192  assert( hour>=0 && hour<24 );
4193 
4194  return make_Time(hour,minute,second);
4195 
4196 }
4197 
4198 Date Context::queryTimeseriesDate( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
4199 
4200  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4201  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (queryTimeseriesDate): Timeseries variable `" + std::string(label) + "' does not exist.") );
4202  }
4203 
4204  double dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(index);
4205 
4206  int year = floor(floor(dateval)/366.25);
4207  assert( year>1000 && year<10000 );
4208 
4209  int JD = floor(dateval-floor(double(year)*366.25));
4210  assert( JD>0 && JD<367 );
4211 
4212  Date date = Julian2Calendar(JD,year);
4213 
4214  return Julian2Calendar(JD,year);
4215 
4216 }
4217 
4218 uint Context::getTimeseriesLength( const char* label ) const{
4219 
4220  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4221  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTimeseriesDate): Timeseries variable `" + std::string(label) + "' does not exist.") );
4222  }else{
4223  return timeseries_data.at(label).size();
4224  }
4225 
4226 }
4227 
4228 void Context::getDomainBoundingBox( vec2& xbounds, vec2& ybounds, vec2& zbounds ) const{
4229 
4230  xbounds.x = 1e8;
4231  xbounds.y = -1e8;
4232  ybounds.x = 1e8;
4233  ybounds.y = -1e8;
4234  zbounds.x = 1e8;
4235  zbounds.y = -1e8;
4236 
4237  for( auto primitive : primitives){
4238 
4239  std::vector<vec3> verts = getPrimitivePointer_private(primitive.first)->getVertices();
4240 
4241  for( auto & vert : verts){
4242  if( vert.x<xbounds.x ){
4243  xbounds.x = vert.x;
4244  }else if( vert.x>xbounds.y ){
4245  xbounds.y = vert.x;
4246  }
4247  if( vert.y<ybounds.x ){
4248  ybounds.x = vert.y;
4249  }else if( vert.y>ybounds.y ){
4250  ybounds.y = vert.y;
4251  }
4252  if( vert.z<zbounds.x ){
4253  zbounds.x = vert.z;
4254  }else if( vert.z>zbounds.y ){
4255  zbounds.y = vert.z;
4256  }
4257  }
4258 
4259  }
4260 
4261 }
4262 
4263 void Context::getDomainBoundingBox( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, vec2& xbounds, vec2& ybounds, vec2& zbounds ) const{
4264 
4265  xbounds.x = 1e8;
4266  xbounds.y = -1e8;
4267  ybounds.x = 1e8;
4268  ybounds.y = -1e8;
4269  zbounds.x = 1e8;
4270  zbounds.y = -1e8;
4271 
4272  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4273 
4274  std::vector<vec3> verts = getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID )->getVertices();
4275 
4276  for( auto & vert : verts){
4277  if( vert.x<xbounds.x ){
4278  xbounds.x = vert.x;
4279  }else if( vert.x>xbounds.y ){
4280  xbounds.y = vert.x;
4281  }
4282  if( vert.y<ybounds.x ){
4283  ybounds.x = vert.y;
4284  }else if( vert.y>ybounds.y ){
4285  ybounds.y = vert.y;
4286  }
4287  if( vert.z<zbounds.x ){
4288  zbounds.x = vert.z;
4289  }else if( vert.z>zbounds.y ){
4290  zbounds.y = vert.z;
4291  }
4292  }
4293 
4294  }
4295 
4296 }
4297 
4298 void Context::getDomainBoundingSphere( vec3& center, float& radius ) const{
4299 
4300  vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
4301  getDomainBoundingBox( xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4302 
4303  center.x = xbounds.x+0.5f*(xbounds.y - xbounds.x);
4304  center.y = ybounds.x+0.5f*(ybounds.y - ybounds.x);
4305  center.z = zbounds.x+0.5f*(zbounds.y - zbounds.x);
4306 
4307  radius = 0.5f*sqrtf( powf(xbounds.y-xbounds.x,2) + powf(ybounds.y-ybounds.x,2) + powf((zbounds.y-zbounds.x),2) );
4308 
4309 
4310 }
4311 
4312 void Context::getDomainBoundingSphere( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, vec3& center, float& radius ) const{
4313 
4314  vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
4315  getDomainBoundingBox( UUIDs, xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4316 
4317  center.x = xbounds.x+0.5f*(xbounds.y - xbounds.x);
4318  center.y = ybounds.x+0.5f*(ybounds.y - ybounds.x);
4319  center.z = zbounds.x+0.5f*(zbounds.y - zbounds.x);
4320 
4321  radius = 0.5f*sqrtf( powf(xbounds.y-xbounds.x,2) + powf(ybounds.y-ybounds.x,2) + powf((zbounds.y-zbounds.x),2) );
4322 
4323 
4324 }
4325 
4326 void Context::cropDomainX(const vec2 &xbounds ){
4327 
4328  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4329 
4330  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
4331 
4332  for( uint p : UUIDs_all){
4333 
4334  vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
4335 
4336  for(auto & vertex : vertices){
4337  if( vertex.x<xbounds.x || vertex.x>xbounds.y ){
4338  deletePrimitive(p);
4339  break;
4340  }
4341  }
4342 
4343  }
4344 
4345  if(getPrimitiveCount() == 0 ){
4346  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainX): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4347  }
4348 
4349 }
4350 
4351 void Context::cropDomainY(const vec2 &ybounds ){
4352 
4353  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4354 
4355  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
4356 
4357  for( uint p : UUIDs_all){
4358 
4359  vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
4360 
4361  for(auto & vertex : vertices){
4362  if( vertex.y<ybounds.x || vertex.y>ybounds.y ){
4363  deletePrimitive(p);
4364  break;
4365  }
4366  }
4367 
4368  }
4369 
4370  if(getPrimitiveCount() == 0 ){
4371  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainY): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4372  }
4373 
4374 }
4375 
4376 void Context::cropDomainZ(const vec2 &zbounds ){
4377 
4378  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4379 
4380  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
4381 
4382  for( uint p : UUIDs_all){
4383 
4384  vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
4385 
4386  for(auto & vertex : vertices){
4387  if( vertex.z<zbounds.x || vertex.z>zbounds.y ){
4388  deletePrimitive(p);
4389  break;
4390  }
4391  }
4392 
4393  }
4394 
4395  if(getPrimitiveCount() == 0 ){
4396  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainZ): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4397  }
4398 
4399 }
4400 
4401 void Context::cropDomain(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, const vec2 &xbounds, const vec2 &ybounds, const vec2 &zbounds ){
4402 
4403  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4404 
4405  size_t delete_count = 0;
4406  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4407 
4408  vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getVertices();
4409 
4410  for(auto & vertex : vertices){
4411  if( vertex.x<xbounds.x || vertex.x>xbounds.y || vertex.y<ybounds.x || vertex.y>ybounds.y || vertex.z<zbounds.x || vertex.z>zbounds.y ){
4412  deletePrimitive(UUID);
4413  delete_count++;
4414  break;
4415  }
4416  }
4417 
4418  }
4419 
4420  if( delete_count==UUIDs.size() ){
4421  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomain): No specified primitives were entirely inside cropped area, and thus all specified primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4422  }
4423 
4424 }
4425 
4426 void Context::cropDomain(const vec2 &xbounds, const vec2 &ybounds, const vec2 &zbounds ){
4427  cropDomain( getAllUUIDs(), xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4428 }
4429

4431  return OID;
4432 }

4435  return type;

4439  return UUIDs.size();
4440 }

4442

4444

4446 
4447 }
4448 
4449 bool CompoundObject::doesObjectContainPrimitive(uint UUID ){
4450 
4451  return find(UUIDs.begin(),UUIDs.end(),UUID)!=UUIDs.end();
4452 
4453 }
4454 
4455 helios::vec3 CompoundObject::getObjectCenter() const{
4456 
4457  vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
4458 
4459  std::vector<uint> U = getPrimitiveUUIDs();
4460 
4461  context->getDomainBoundingBox( U, xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4462 
4463  vec3 origin;
4464 
4465  origin.x = 0.5f*(xbounds.x+xbounds.y);
4466  origin.y = 0.5f*(ybounds.x+ybounds.y);
4467  origin.z = 0.5f*(zbounds.x+zbounds.y);
4468 
4469  return origin;
4470 }
4471 
4472 float CompoundObject::getArea() const{
4473 
4474  float area = 0.f;
4475 
4476  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4477 
4478  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4479  area += context->getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
4480  }
4481 
4482  }
4483 
4484  return area;
4485 
4486 }
4487 
4488 void CompoundObject::setColor( const helios::RGBcolor& a_color ){
4489  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4490 
4491  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4492  context->setPrimitiveColor( UUID, a_color );
4493  }
4494 
4495  }
4496 
4497  color = make_RGBAcolor(a_color, 1.f);
4498 
4499 }
4500

4502  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4503 
4504  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4505  context->setPrimitiveColor( UUID, a_color );
4506  }
4507 
4508  }
4509 
4510  color = a_color;
4511 
4512 }

4557 
4558 void CompoundObject::translate( const helios::vec3& shift ){
4559 
4560  float T[16], T_prim[16];
4561  makeTranslationMatrix(shift,T);
4562 
4563  matmult(T,transform,transform);
4564 
4565  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4566 
4567  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4568 
4569  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
4570  matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
4571  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
4572  }
4573 
4574  }
4575 
4576 }
4577 
4578 void CompoundObject::rotate( float rot, const char* axis ){
4579 
4580  if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
4581  float Rz[16], Rz_prim[16];
4582  makeRotationMatrix(-rot,"z",Rz);
4583  matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
4584 
4585  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4586  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4587  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rz_prim);
4588  matmult(Rz,Rz_prim,Rz_prim);
4589  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rz_prim);
4590  }
4591  }
4592  }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
4593  float Ry[16], Ry_prim[16];
4594  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
4595  matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
4596  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4597  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4598  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Ry_prim);
4599  matmult(Ry,Ry_prim,Ry_prim);
4600  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Ry_prim);
4601  }
4602  }
4603  }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
4604  float Rx[16], Rx_prim[16];
4605  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
4606  matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
4607  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4608  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4609  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rx_prim);
4610  matmult(Rx,Rx_prim,Rx_prim);
4611  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,Rx_prim);
4612  }
4613  }
4614  }else{
4615  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (CompoundObject::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z.") );
4616  }
4617 
4618 }
4619 
4620 void CompoundObject::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& axis ){
4621 
4622  float R[16], R_prim[16];
4623  makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
4624  matmult(R,transform,transform);
4625 
4626  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4627 
4628  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4629 
4630  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
4631  matmult(R,R_prim,R_prim);
4632  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
4633 
4634  }
4635 
4636  }
4637 
4638 }
4639 
4640 void CompoundObject::rotate( float rot, const helios::vec3& origin, const helios::vec3& axis ){
4641 
4642  float R[16], R_prim[16];
4643  makeRotationMatrix(rot,origin,axis,R);
4644  matmult(R,transform,transform);
4645 
4646  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
4647 
4648  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
4649 
4650  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
4651  matmult(R,R_prim,R_prim);
4652  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,R_prim);
4653 
4654  }
4655 
4656  }
4657 
4658 }
4659 
4660 void CompoundObject::getTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ) const{
4661  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
4662  T[i]=transform[i];
4663  }
4664 }
4665 
4666 void CompoundObject::setTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ){
4667 
4668  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
4669  transform[i] = T[i];
4670  }
4671 
4672 }

4677 
4678 void CompoundObject::deleteChildPrimitive( uint UUID ){
4679  auto it = find( UUIDs.begin(), UUIDs.end(), UUID );
4680  if( it!=UUIDs.end() ){
4681  std::iter_swap(it,UUIDs.end()-1);
4682  UUIDs.pop_back();
4683  primitivesarecomplete=false;
4684  }
4685 }
4686 
4687 void CompoundObject::deleteChildPrimitive( const std::vector<uint> &a_UUIDs ){
4688  for( uint UUID : a_UUIDs ){
4689  deleteChildPrimitive(UUID);
4690  }
4691 }

4762 
4763 void CompoundObject::setObjectData( const char* label, HeliosDataType a_type, uint size, void* data ){
4764 
4765  object_data_types[label] = a_type;
4766 
4767  if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
4768 
4769  int* data_ptr = (int*)data;
4770 
4771  std::vector<int> vec;
4772  vec.resize(size);
4773  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4774  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4775  }
4776  object_data_int[label] = vec;
4777 
4778  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
4779 
4780  uint* data_ptr = (uint*)data;
4781 
4782  std::vector<uint> vec;
4783  vec.resize(size);
4784  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4785  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4786  }
4787  object_data_uint[label] = vec;
4788 
4789  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
4790 
4791  auto* data_ptr = (float*)data;
4792 
4793  std::vector<float> vec;
4794  vec.resize(size);
4795  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4796  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4797  }
4798  object_data_float[label] = vec;
4799 
4800  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
4801 
4802  auto* data_ptr = (double*)data;
4803 
4804  std::vector<double> vec;
4805  vec.resize(size);
4806  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4807  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4808  }
4809  object_data_double[label] = vec;
4810 
4811  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
4812 
4813  auto* data_ptr = (vec2*)data;
4814 
4815  std::vector<vec2> vec;
4816  vec.resize(size);
4817  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4818  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4819  }
4820  object_data_vec2[label] = vec;
4821 
4822  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
4823 
4824  auto* data_ptr = (vec3*)data;
4825 
4826  std::vector<vec3> vec;
4827  vec.resize(size);
4828  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4829  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4830  }
4831  object_data_vec3[label] = vec;
4832 
4833  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
4834 
4835  auto* data_ptr = (vec4*)data;
4836 
4837  std::vector<vec4> vec;
4838  vec.resize(size);
4839  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4840  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4841  }
4842  object_data_vec4[label] = vec;
4843 
4844  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
4845 
4846  auto* data_ptr = (int2*)data;
4847 
4848  std::vector<int2> vec;
4849  vec.resize(size);
4850  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4851  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4852  }
4853  object_data_int2[label] = vec;
4854 
4855  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
4856 
4857  auto* data_ptr = (int3*)data;
4858 
4859  std::vector<int3> vec;
4860  vec.resize(size);
4861  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4862  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4863  }
4864  object_data_int3[label] = vec;
4865 
4866  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
4867 
4868  auto* data_ptr = (int4*)data;
4869 
4870  std::vector<int4> vec;
4871  vec.resize(size);
4872  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4873  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4874  }
4875  object_data_int4[label] = vec;
4876 
4877  }else if( a_type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
4878 
4879  auto* data_ptr = (std::string*)data;
4880 
4881  std::vector<std::string> vec;
4882  vec.resize(size);
4883  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
4884  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
4885  }
4886  object_data_string[label] = vec;
4887 
4888  }
4889 
4890 }
4891 
4892 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, int& data ) const{
4893 
4894  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4895  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4896  }
4897 
4898  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
4899  std::vector<int> d = object_data_int.at(label);
4900  data = d.at(0);
4901  }else{
4902  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type int."));
4903  }
4904 
4905 }
4906 
4907 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, std::vector<int>& data ) const{
4908 
4909  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4910  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4911  }
4912 
4913  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
4914  std::vector<int> d = object_data_int.at(label);
4915  data = d;
4916  }else{
4917  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type int."));
4918  }
4919 
4920 }
4921 
4922 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, uint& data ) const{
4923 
4924  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4925  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4926  }
4927 
4928  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
4929  std::vector<uint> d = object_data_uint.at(label);
4930  data = d.front();
4931  }else{
4932  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type uint, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type uint."));
4933  }
4934 
4935 }
4936 
4937 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, std::vector<uint>& data ) const{
4938 
4939  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4940  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4941  }
4942 
4943  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
4944  std::vector<uint> d = object_data_uint.at(label);
4945  data = d;
4946  }else{
4947  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type uint, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type uint."));
4948  }
4949 
4950 }
4951 
4952 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, float& data ) const{
4953 
4954  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4955  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4956  }
4957 
4958  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
4959  std::vector<float> d = object_data_float.at(label);
4960  data = d.front();
4961  }else{
4962  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type float, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type float."));
4963  }
4964 
4965 }
4966 
4967 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, std::vector<float>& data ) const{
4968 
4969  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4970  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4971  }
4972 
4973  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
4974  std::vector<float> d = object_data_float.at(label);
4975  data = d;
4976  }else{
4977  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type float, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type float."));
4978  }
4979 
4980 }
4981 
4982 void CompoundObject::getObjectData( const char* label, double& data ) const{
4983 
4984  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
4985  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
4986  }
4987 
4988  if( object_data_types.at(label)==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
4989  std::vector<double> d = object_data_double.at(label);
4990  data = d.front();
4991  }else{
4992  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Attempted to get data for type double, but data '" + std::string(label) + "' for object " + std::to_string(OID) + " does not have type double."));
4993  }
4994 
4995 }

5222 HeliosDataType CompoundObject::getObjectDataType( const char* label ) const{
5223 
5224  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
5225  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
5226  }
5227 
5228  return object_data_types.at(label);
5229 
5230 }
5231 
5232 uint CompoundObject::getObjectDataSize( const char* label ) const{
5233 
5234  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
5235  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectData): Object data " + std::string(label) + " does not exist for object " + std::to_string(OID)));
5236  }
5237 
5238  HeliosDataType qtype = object_data_types.at(label);
5239 
5240  if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
5241  return object_data_int.at(label).size();
5242  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
5243  return object_data_uint.at(label).size();
5244  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
5245  return object_data_float.at(label).size();
5246  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
5247  return object_data_double.at(label).size();
5248  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
5249  return object_data_vec2.at(label).size();
5250  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
5251  return object_data_vec3.at(label).size();
5252  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
5253  return object_data_vec4.at(label).size();
5254  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
5255  return object_data_int2.at(label).size();
5256  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
5257  return object_data_int3.at(label).size();
5258  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
5259  return object_data_int4.at(label).size();
5260  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
5261  return object_data_string.at(label).size();
5262  }else{
5263  assert( false );
5264  }
5265 
5266  return 0;
5267 
5268 }
5269 
5270 void CompoundObject::clearObjectData( const char* label ){
5271 
5272  if( !doesObjectDataExist( label ) ){
5273  return;
5274  }
5275 
5276  HeliosDataType qtype = object_data_types.at(label);
5277 
5278  if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
5279  object_data_int.erase(label);
5280  object_data_types.erase(label);
5281  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
5282  object_data_uint.erase(label);
5283  object_data_types.erase(label);
5284  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
5285  object_data_float.erase(label);
5286  object_data_types.erase(label);
5287  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
5288  object_data_double.erase(label);
5289  object_data_types.erase(label);
5290  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
5291  object_data_vec2.erase(label);
5292  object_data_types.erase(label);
5293  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
5294  object_data_vec3.erase(label);
5295  object_data_types.erase(label);
5296  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
5297  object_data_vec4.erase(label);
5298  object_data_types.erase(label);
5299  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
5300  object_data_int2.erase(label);
5301  object_data_types.erase(label);
5302  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
5303  object_data_int3.erase(label);
5304  object_data_types.erase(label);
5305  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
5306  object_data_int4.erase(label);
5307  object_data_types.erase(label);
5308  }else if( qtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
5309  object_data_string.erase(label);
5310  object_data_types.erase(label);
5311  }else{
5312  assert(false);
5313  }
5314 
5315 }
5316 
5317 bool CompoundObject::doesObjectDataExist( const char* label ) const{
5318 
5319  if( object_data_types.find(label) == object_data_types.end() ){
5320  return false;
5321  }else{
5322  return true;
5323  }
5324 
5325 }
5326 
5327 bool Context::areObjectPrimitivesComplete( uint objID ) const{
5328  return getObjectPointer(objID)->arePrimitivesComplete();
5329 }
5330 
5331 std::vector<std::string> CompoundObject::listObjectData() const{
5332 
5333  std::vector<std::string> labels(object_data_types.size());
5334 
5335  size_t i=0;
5336  for(const auto & object_data_type : object_data_types){
5337  labels.at(i) = object_data_type.first;
5338  i++;
5339  }
5340 
5341  return labels;
5342 
5343 }
5344 
5345 CompoundObject* Context::getObjectPointer( uint ObjID ) const{
5346  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
5347  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
5348  }
5349  return objects.at(ObjID);
5350 }
5351 
5352 uint Context::getObjectCount() const{
5353  return objects.size();
5354 }
5355 
5356 bool Context::doesObjectExist( const uint ObjID ) const{
5357  return objects.find(ObjID) != objects.end();
5358 }
5359 
5360 std::vector<uint> Context::getAllObjectIDs() const{
5361  std::vector<uint> objIDs;
5362  objIDs.resize(objects.size());
5363  size_t i=0;
5364  for(auto object : objects){
5365  objIDs.at(i) = object.first;
5366  i++;
5367  }
5368  return objIDs;
5369 }
5370 
5371 void Context::deleteObject(const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs ){
5372  for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs){
5373  deleteObject( ObjID );
5374  }
5375 }
5376 
5377 void Context::deleteObject(uint ObjID ){
5378 
5379  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
5380  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (deleteObject): Object ID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " not found in the context."));
5381  }
5382 
5383  CompoundObject* obj = objects.at(ObjID);
5384 
5385  std::vector<uint> UUIDs = obj->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5386  deletePrimitive(UUIDs);
5387 
5388  delete obj;
5389  objects.erase(ObjID);
5390 
5391  markGeometryDirty();
5392 
5393 }
5394 
5395 std::vector<uint> Context::copyObject(const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs ){
5396 
5397  std::vector<uint> ObjIDs_copy(ObjIDs.size());
5398  size_t i=0;
5399  for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs){
5400  ObjIDs_copy.at(i) = copyObject( ObjID );
5401  i++;
5402  }
5403 
5404  return ObjIDs_copy;
5405 
5406 }
5407 
5408 uint Context::copyObject(uint ObjID ){
5409 
5410  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
5411  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (copyObject): Object ID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " not found in the context."));
5412  }
5413 
5414  ObjectType type = objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType();
5415 
5416  std::vector<uint> UUIDs = getObjectPointer(ObjID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5417 
5418  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_copy = copyPrimitive( UUIDs );
5419  for( uint p : UUIDs_copy){
5420  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID( currentObjectID );
5421  }
5422 
5423  std::string texturefile = objects.at(ObjID)->getTextureFile();
5424 
5425  if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_TILE ){
5426 
5427  Tile* o = getTileObjectPointer( ObjID );
5428 
5429  int2 subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5430 
5431  auto* tile_new = (new Tile(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5432 
5433  objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
5434 
5435  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE ){
5436 
5437  Sphere* o = getSphereObjectPointer( ObjID );
5438 
5439  uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5440 
5441  auto* sphere_new = (new Sphere(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5442 
5443  objects[currentObjectID] = sphere_new;
5444 
5445  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE ){
5446 
5447  Tube* o = getTubeObjectPointer( ObjID );
5448 
5449  std::vector<vec3> nodes = o->getNodes();
5450  std::vector<float> radius = o->getNodeRadii();
5451  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors = o->getNodeColors();
5452  uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5453 
5454  auto* tube_new = (new Tube(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, nodes, radius, colors, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5455 
5456  objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
5457 
5458  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_BOX ){
5459 
5460  Box* o = getBoxObjectPointer( ObjID );
5461 
5462  vec3 size = o->getSize();
5463  int3 subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5464 
5465  auto* box_new = (new Box(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5466 
5467  objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
5468 
5469  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_DISK ){
5470 
5471  Disk* o = getDiskObjectPointer( ObjID );
5472 
5473  vec2 size = o->getSize();
5474  uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5475 
5476  auto* disk_new = (new Disk(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5477 
5478  objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
5479 
5480  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH ){
5481 
5482  Polymesh* o = getPolymeshObjectPointer( ObjID );
5483 
5484  auto* polymesh_new = (new Polymesh(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5485 
5486  objects[currentObjectID] = polymesh_new;
5487 
5488  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_CONE ){
5489 
5490  Cone* o = getConeObjectPointer( ObjID );
5491 
5492  std::vector<vec3> nodes = o->getNodes();
5493  std::vector<float> radius = o->getNodeRadii();
5494  uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
5495 
5496  auto* cone_new = (new Cone(currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, nodes.at(0), nodes.at(1), radius.at(0), radius.at(1),
5497  subdiv, texturefile.c_str(), this));
5498 
5499  objects[currentObjectID] = cone_new;
5500 
5501  }
5502 
5503  float T[16];
5504  getObjectPointer( ObjID )->getTransformationMatrix( T );
5505 
5506  getObjectPointer( currentObjectID )->setTransformationMatrix( T );
5507 
5508 
5509  markGeometryDirty();
5510  currentObjectID++;
5511  return currentObjectID-1;
5512 }
5513 
5514 std::vector<uint> Context::filterObjectsByData( const std::vector<uint> &IDs, const char* object_data, float threshold, const char* comparator) const{
5515 
5516  std::vector<uint> output_object_IDs;
5517  output_object_IDs.resize(IDs.size());
5518  uint passed_count=0;
5519 
5520  for(uint i=0;i<IDs.size();i++)
5521  {
5522 
5523  if( doesObjectDataExist(IDs.at(i), object_data) ){
5524 
5525  HeliosDataType type = getObjectDataType(IDs.at(i), object_data);
5526  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
5527  uint R;
5528  getObjectData(IDs.at(i), object_data, R);
5529  if( strcmp(comparator,"<")==0 ){
5530  if( R<threshold ){
5531  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5532  passed_count++;
5533  }
5534  }else if( strcmp(comparator,">")==0 ){
5535  if( R>threshold ){
5536  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5537  passed_count++;
5538  }
5539  }else if( strcmp(comparator,"=")==0 ){
5540  if( R==threshold ){
5541  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5542  passed_count++;
5543  }
5544  }
5545 
5546  }else if(type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT){
5547  float R;
5548  getObjectData(IDs.at(i), object_data, R);
5549 
5550  if( strcmp(comparator,"<")==0 ){
5551  if( R<threshold ){
5552  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5553  passed_count++;
5554  }
5555  }else if( strcmp(comparator,">")==0 ){
5556  if( R>threshold ){
5557  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5558  passed_count++;
5559  }
5560  }else if( strcmp(comparator,"=")==0 ){
5561  if( R==threshold ){
5562  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5563  passed_count++;
5564  }
5565  }
5566 
5567  }else if(type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT){
5568  int R;
5569  getObjectData(IDs.at(i), object_data, R);
5570 
5571  if( strcmp(comparator,"<")==0 ){
5572  if( R<threshold ){
5573  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5574  passed_count++;
5575  }
5576  }else if( strcmp(comparator,">")==0 ){
5577  if( R>threshold ){
5578  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5579  passed_count++;
5580  }
5581  }else if( strcmp(comparator,"=")==0 ){
5582  if( R==threshold ){
5583  output_object_IDs.at(passed_count) = IDs.at(i);
5584  passed_count++;
5585  }
5586  }
5587  }else{
5588  std::cout << "WARNING: Object data not of type UINT, INT, or FLOAT. Filtering for other types not yet supported." << std::endl;
5589  }
5590 
5591 
5592  }
5593  }
5594 
5595  output_object_IDs.resize(passed_count);
5596 
5597  return output_object_IDs;
5598 
5599 }
5600 
5601 void Context::translateObject(uint ObjID, const vec3& shift ){
5602  getObjectPointer(ObjID)->translate(shift);
5603 }
5604 
5605 void Context::translateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, const vec3& shift ){
5606  for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
5607  getObjectPointer(ID)->translate(shift);
5608  }
5609 }
5610 
5611 void Context::rotateObject(uint ObjID, float rot, const char* axis ){
5612  getObjectPointer(ObjID)->rotate(rot,axis);
5613 }
5614 
5615 void Context::rotateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, float rot, const char* axis ){
5616  for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
5617  getObjectPointer(ID)->rotate(rot,axis);
5618  }
5619 }
5620 
5621 void Context::rotateObject(uint ObjID, float rot, const vec3& axis ){
5622  getObjectPointer(ObjID)->rotate(rot,axis);
5623 }
5624 
5625 void Context::rotateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, float rot, const vec3& axis ){
5626  for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
5627  getObjectPointer(ID)->rotate(rot,axis);
5628  }
5629 }
5630 
5631 void Context::rotateObject(uint ObjID, float rot, const vec3& origin, const vec3& axis ){
5632  getObjectPointer(ObjID)->rotate(rot,origin,axis);
5633 }
5634 
5635 void Context::rotateObject( const std::vector<uint>& ObjIDs, float rot, const vec3& origin, const vec3& axis ){
5636  for( uint ID : ObjIDs){
5637  getObjectPointer(ID)->rotate(rot,origin,axis);
5638  }
5639 }
5640 
5641 std::vector<uint> Context::getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs( const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs ) const{
5642 
5643  std::vector<uint> output_UUIDs;
5644 
5645  for(uint i=0;i<ObjIDs.size();i++)
5646  {
5647  CompoundObject* pointer = getObjectPointer(ObjIDs.at(i));
5648  std::vector<uint> current_UUIDs = pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5649  output_UUIDs.insert( output_UUIDs.end(), current_UUIDs.begin(), current_UUIDs.end() );
5650  }
5651  return output_UUIDs;
5652 }
5653 
5654 std::vector<uint> Context::getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs( uint ObjID ) const{
5655 
5656  std::vector<uint> IDs{ObjID};
5657  std::vector<uint> output_UUIDs = getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(IDs);
5658  return output_UUIDs;
5659 }
5660 
5661 helios::ObjectType Context::getObjectType( uint ObjID ) const{
5662  return getObjectPointer(ObjID)->getObjectType();
5663 }
5664 
5665 float Context::getTileObjectAreaRatio(const uint &ObjectID) const{
5666 
5667  if( getObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getObjectType() != OBJECT_TYPE_TILE )
5668  {
5669  std::cerr << "WARNING (getTileObjectAreaRatio): ObjectID " << ObjectID<< " is not a tile object. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5670  return 0.0;
5671 
5672  }else{
5673 
5674  if(!(getObjectPointer(ObjectID)->arePrimitivesComplete())){
5675  std::cerr << "WARNING (getTileObjectAreaRatio): ObjectID " << ObjectID << " is missing primitives. Area ratio calculated is area of non-missing subpatches divided by the area of an individual subpatch." << std::endl;
5676  }
5677 
5678  int2 subdiv = getTileObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getSubdivisionCount();
5679  if(subdiv.x == int(1) && subdiv.y == int(1) )
5680  {
5681  return 1.0;
5682  }else{
5683  float area = getTileObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getArea();
5684  vec2 size = getTileObjectPointer(ObjectID)->getSize();
5685 
5686  float subpatch_area = (size.x/float(subdiv.x))*(size.y/float(subdiv.y));
5687  return area/subpatch_area;
5688  }
5689 
5690  }
5691 }
5692 
5693 std::vector<float> Context::getTileObjectAreaRatio(const std::vector<uint> &ObjectIDs) const {
5694 
5695  std::vector<float> AreaRatios(ObjectIDs.size());
5696  for( uint i=0; i<ObjectIDs.size(); i++ ){
5697  AreaRatios.at(i) = getTileObjectAreaRatio(ObjectIDs.at(i));
5698  }
5699 
5700  return AreaRatios;
5701 }
5702 
5703 void Context::setTileObjectSubdivisionCount(const std::vector<uint> &ObjectIDs, int2 new_subdiv)
5704 {
5705 
5706  //check that all objects are Tile Objects, and get vector of texture files
5707  std::vector<uint> tile_ObjectIDs;
5708  std::vector<uint> textured_tile_ObjectIDs;
5709 
5710 
5711  std::vector<std::string> tex;
5712  // for(uint i=1;i<ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5713  for(uint OBJID : ObjectIDs)
5714  {
5715 
5716  //check if the object ID is a tile object and if it is add it the tile_ObjectIDs vector
5717  if( getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getObjectType() != OBJECT_TYPE_TILE )
5718  {
5719  std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is not a tile object. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5720  }else if(!(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->arePrimitivesComplete())){
5721  std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is missing primitives. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5722  }else{
5723  //test if the tile is textured and push into two different vectors
5724  Patch* p = getPatchPointer_private(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs().at(0));
5725  if( !p->hasTexture() ){ //no texture
5726  tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
5727  }else{ //texture
5728  textured_tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
5729  tex.push_back(p->getTextureFile() );
5730  }
5731  }
5732  }
5733 
5734  //Here just call setSubdivisionCount directly for the non-textured tile objects
5735  for(unsigned int tile_ObjectID : tile_ObjectIDs){
5736 
5737  Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(tile_ObjectID);
5738  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5739 
5740  vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
5741  vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
5742  vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
5743  SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
5744  RGBcolor color = current_object_pointer->getColorRGB();
5745 
5746  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_new = addTile(center, size, rotation, new_subdiv, color );
5747 
5748  for( uint UUID : UUIDs_new ) {
5749  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(tile_ObjectID);
5750  }
5751 
5752  current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(UUIDs_new);
5753  current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
5754  deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
5755  }
5756 
5757  // get a vector of unique texture files that are represented in the input tile objects
5758  sort(tex.begin(), tex.end());
5759  std::vector<std::string>::iterator it;
5760  it = std::unique(tex.begin(),tex.end());
5761  tex.resize( std::distance(tex.begin(),it) );
5762 
5763  //create object templates for all the unique texture files
5764  std::vector<uint> object_templates;
5765  std::vector<std::vector<uint>> template_primitives;
5766  for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
5767  {
5768  //create a template object for the current texture
5769  uint object_template = addTileObject(make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), nullrotation, new_subdiv, tex.at(j).c_str());
5770  object_templates.push_back(object_template);
5771  std::vector<uint> object_primitives = getTileObjectPointer(object_template)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5772  template_primitives.push_back(object_primitives);
5773  }
5774 
5775  //keep loop over objects on the outside, otherwise need to update textured_tile_ObjectIDs vector all the time
5776  //for each textured tile object
5777  for(uint i=0;i<textured_tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5778  {
5779  //get info from current object
5780  Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5781  std::string current_texture_file = current_object_pointer->getTextureFile();
5782 
5783  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5784 
5785  vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
5786  vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
5787  vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
5788  SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
5789 
5790  //for unique textures
5791  for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
5792  {
5793  //if the current tile object has the same texture file as the current unique texture file
5794  if(current_texture_file == tex.at(j))
5795  {
5796  //delete the original object primitives
5797  deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
5798 
5799  //copy the template primitives and create a new tile with them
5800  std::vector<uint> new_primitives = copyPrimitive(template_primitives.at(j));
5801 
5802  // change the objectID for the new primitives
5803  setPrimitiveParentObjectID(new_primitives, textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5804  current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(new_primitives);
5805  current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
5806 
5807  float IM[16];
5808  makeIdentityMatrix(IM);
5809  current_object_pointer->setTransformationMatrix(IM);
5810 
5811  current_object_pointer->scale(make_vec3(size.x, size.y, 1));
5812 
5813  //transform based on original object data
5814  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
5815  current_object_pointer->rotate(-rotation.elevation , "x");
5816  }
5817  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
5818  current_object_pointer->rotate(rotation.azimuth, "z");
5819  }
5820  current_object_pointer->translate(center);
5821 
5822  }
5823  }
5824  }
5825 
5826 
5827  //delete the template (objects and primitives)
5828  deleteObject(object_templates);
5829 
5830 }
5831 
5832 void Context::setTileObjectSubdivisionCount(const std::vector<uint> &ObjectIDs, float area_ratio)
5833 {
5834 
5835  //check that all objects are Tile Objects, and get vector of texture files
5836  std::vector<uint> tile_ObjectIDs;
5837  std::vector<uint> textured_tile_ObjectIDs;
5838 
5839  std::vector<std::string> tex;
5840  // for(uint i=1;i<ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5841  for(uint OBJID : ObjectIDs)
5842  {
5843  //check if the object ID is a tile object and if it is add it the tile_ObjectIDs vector
5844  if( getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getObjectType() != OBJECT_TYPE_TILE )
5845  {
5846  std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is not a tile object. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5847  }else if(!(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->arePrimitivesComplete())){
5848  std::cerr << "WARNING (setTileObjectSubdivisionCount): ObjectID " << OBJID << " is missing primitives. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5849  }else{
5850  //test if the tile is textured and push into two different vectors
5851  Patch* p = getPatchPointer_private(getObjectPointer(OBJID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs().at(0));
5852  if( !p->hasTexture() ){ //no texture
5853  tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
5854  }else{ //texture
5855  textured_tile_ObjectIDs.push_back(OBJID);
5856  tex.push_back(p->getTextureFile() );
5857  }
5858  }
5859  }
5860 
5861  //Here just call setSubdivisionCount directly for the non-textured tile objects
5862  for(uint i=0;i<tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5863  {
5864  Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5865  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5866 
5867  vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
5868  vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
5869  vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
5870  SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
5871  RGBcolor color = current_object_pointer->getColorRGB();
5872 
5873  float tile_area = current_object_pointer->getArea();
5874 
5875  // subpatch dimensions needed to keep the correct ratio and have the solid fraction area = the input area
5876  float subpatch_dimension = sqrtf( tile_area / area_ratio);
5877  float subpatch_per_x = size.x / subpatch_dimension;
5878  float subpatch_per_y = size.y / subpatch_dimension;
5879 
5880  float option_1_AR = (tile_area / (size.x / ceil(subpatch_per_x) * size.y / floor(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
5881  float option_2_AR = (tile_area / (size.x / floor(subpatch_per_x) * size.y / ceil(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
5882 
5883  int2 new_subdiv;
5884  if((int)area_ratio == 1){
5885  new_subdiv = make_int2(1, 1);
5886  }else if(option_1_AR >= option_2_AR){
5887  new_subdiv = make_int2(ceil(subpatch_per_x), floor(subpatch_per_y));
5888  }else{
5889  new_subdiv = make_int2(floor(subpatch_per_x), ceil(subpatch_per_y));
5890  }
5891 
5892 
5893  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_new = addTile(center, size, rotation, new_subdiv, color );
5894 
5895  for( uint UUID : UUIDs_new ) {
5896  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5897  }
5898 
5899  current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(UUIDs_new);
5900  current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
5901  deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
5902  }
5903 
5904  // get a vector of unique texture files that are represented in the input tile objects
5905  sort(tex.begin(), tex.end());
5906  std::vector<std::string>::iterator it;
5907  it = std::unique(tex.begin(),tex.end());
5908  tex.resize( std::distance(tex.begin(),it) );
5909 
5910  //create object templates for all the unique texture files
5911  // the assumption here is that all tile objects with the same texture have the same aspect ratio
5912  //if this is not true then the copying method won't work well because a new template will need to be created for each texture/aspect ratio combination
5913 
5914  std::vector<uint> object_templates;
5915  std::vector<std::vector<uint>> template_primitives;
5916  for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
5917  {
5918  //here we just want to get one tile object with the matching texture
5919  uint ii;
5920  for(uint i=0;i<textured_tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5921  {
5922  //get info from current object
5923  Tile* current_object_pointer_b = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5924  std::string current_texture_file_b = current_object_pointer_b->getTextureFile();
5925  //if the current tile object has the same texture file as the current unique texture file
5926  if(current_texture_file_b == tex.at(j))
5927  {
5928  ii=i;
5929  break;
5930  }
5931  }
5932 
5933  //get info from current object
5934  Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(ii));
5935  vec2 tile_size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
5936  float tile_area = current_object_pointer->getArea();
5937 
5938  // subpatch dimensions needed to keep the correct ratio and have the solid fraction area = the input area
5939  float subpatch_dimension = sqrtf( tile_area / area_ratio);
5940  float subpatch_per_x = tile_size.x / subpatch_dimension;
5941  float subpatch_per_y = tile_size.y / subpatch_dimension;
5942 
5943  float option_1_AR = (tile_area / (tile_size.x / ceil(subpatch_per_x) * tile_size.y / floor(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
5944  float option_2_AR = (tile_area / (tile_size.x / floor(subpatch_per_x) * tile_size.y / ceil(subpatch_per_y))) - area_ratio;
5945 
5946  int2 new_subdiv;
5947  if((int)area_ratio == 1){
5948  new_subdiv = make_int2(1, 1);
5949  }else if(option_1_AR >= option_2_AR){
5950  new_subdiv = make_int2(ceil(subpatch_per_x), floor(subpatch_per_y));
5951  }else{
5952  new_subdiv = make_int2(floor(subpatch_per_x), ceil(subpatch_per_y));
5953  }
5954 
5955  //create a template object for the current texture
5956  uint object_template = addTileObject(make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), nullrotation, new_subdiv, tex.at(j).c_str());
5957  object_templates.push_back(object_template);
5958  std::vector<uint> object_primitives = getTileObjectPointer(object_template)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5959  template_primitives.push_back(object_primitives);
5960  }
5961 
5962  //keep loop over objects on the outside, otherwise need to update textured_tile_ObjectIDs vector all the time
5963  //for each textured tile object
5964  for(uint i=0;i<textured_tile_ObjectIDs.size();i++)
5965  {
5966  //get info from current object
5967  Tile* current_object_pointer = getTileObjectPointer(textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5968  // std::string current_texture_file = getPrimitivePointer_private(current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs().at(0))->getTextureFile();
5969  std::string current_texture_file = current_object_pointer->getTextureFile();
5970  // std::cout << "current_texture_file for ObjID " << textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i) << " = " << current_texture_file << std::endl;
5971  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_old = current_object_pointer->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
5972 
5973  vec2 size = current_object_pointer->getSize();
5974  vec3 center = current_object_pointer->getCenter();
5975  vec3 normal = current_object_pointer->getNormal();
5976  SphericalCoord rotation = cart2sphere(normal);
5977 
5978  //for unique textures
5979  for(uint j=0;j<tex.size();j++)
5980  {
5981  //if the current tile object has the same texture file as the current unique texture file
5982  if(current_texture_file == tex.at(j))
5983  {
5984  //delete the original object primitives
5985  deletePrimitive(UUIDs_old);
5986 
5987  //copy the template primitives and create a new tile with them
5988  std::vector<uint> new_primitives = copyPrimitive(template_primitives.at(j));
5989 
5990  // change the objectID for the new primitives
5991  setPrimitiveParentObjectID(new_primitives, textured_tile_ObjectIDs.at(i));
5992 
5993  int2 new_subdiv = getTileObjectPointer(object_templates.at(j))->getSubdivisionCount();
5994  current_object_pointer->setPrimitiveUUIDs(new_primitives);
5995  current_object_pointer->setSubdivisionCount(new_subdiv);
5996 
5997  float IM[16];
5998  makeIdentityMatrix(IM);
5999  current_object_pointer->setTransformationMatrix(IM);
6000 
6001  current_object_pointer->scale(make_vec3(size.x, size.y, 1));
6002 
6003  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
6004  current_object_pointer->rotate(-rotation.elevation , "x");
6005  }
6006  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
6007  current_object_pointer->rotate(rotation.azimuth, "z");
6008  }
6009  current_object_pointer->translate(center);
6010 
6011  }
6012  }
6013  }
6014 
6015  //delete the template (objects and primitives)
6016  deleteObject(object_templates);
6017 
6018 }
6019 
6020 Tile::Tile(uint a_OID, const std::vector<uint> &a_UUIDs, const int2 &a_subdiv, const char *a_texturefile, helios::Context *a_context) {
6021 
6022  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
6023 
6024  OID = a_OID;
6025  type = helios::OBJECT_TYPE_TILE;
6026  UUIDs = a_UUIDs;
6027  subdiv = a_subdiv;
6028  texturefile = a_texturefile;
6029  context = a_context;
6030 
6031 }
6032 
6033 Tile* Context::getTileObjectPointer(uint ObjID ) const{
6034  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
6035  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTileObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
6036  }
6037  return dynamic_cast<Tile*>(objects.at(ObjID));
6038 }
6039 
6040 helios::vec2 Tile::getSize() const{
6041  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
6042  float l = (vertices.at(1)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
6043  float w = (vertices.at(3)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
6044  return make_vec2(l,w);
6045 }
6046 
6047 vec3 Tile::getCenter() const{
6048 
6049  vec3 center;
6050  vec3 Y;
6051  Y.x = 0.f;
6052  Y.y = 0.f;
6053  Y.z = 0.f;
6054 
6055  center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
6056  center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
6057  center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];
6058 
6059  return center;
6060 
6061 }
6062 
6063 
6064 helios::int2 Tile::getSubdivisionCount() const{
6065  return subdiv;
6066 }
6067 
6068 void Tile::setSubdivisionCount( const helios::int2 &a_subdiv ){
6069  subdiv = a_subdiv;
6070 }
6071 
6072 
6073 std::vector<helios::vec3> Tile::getVertices() const{
6074 
6075  std::vector<helios::vec3> vertices;
6076  vertices.resize(4);
6077 
6078  //subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5*size.x+(float(i)+0.5)*subsize.x,-0.5*size.y+(float(j)+0.5)*subsize.y,0);
6079  //Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
6080  //Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
6081  //Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
6082  //Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
6083 
6084 
6085  vec3 Y[4];
6086  Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
6087  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
6088  Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
6089  Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
6090 
6091  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
6092  vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
6093  vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
6094  vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
6095  }
6096 
6097  // vertices.at(0) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.front() ).at(0);
6098  // vertices.at(1) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x-1 ) ).at(1);
6099  // vertices.at(2) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x*subdiv.y-1 ) ).at(2);
6100  // vertices.at(3) = context->getPrimitiveVertices( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x*subdiv.y-subdiv.x ) ).at(3);
6101 
6102  return vertices;
6103 
6104 }
6105 
6106 vec3 Tile::getNormal() const{
6107 
6108  return context->getPrimitiveNormal( UUIDs.front() );
6109 
6110 }
6111 
6112 std::vector<helios::vec2> Tile::getTextureUV() const{
6113 
6114  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv{ make_vec2(0,0), make_vec2(1,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_vec2(0,1) };
6115 
6116  return uv;
6117 
6118 }
6119 
6120 void Tile::scale(const vec3 &S ){
6121 
6122  float T[16], T_prim[16];
6123  makeScaleMatrix( S, T);
6124  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6125 
6126  for( uint UUID : UUIDs) {
6127 
6128  if (context->doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
6129 
6130  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(UUID, T_prim);
6131  matmult(T, T_prim, T_prim);
6132  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(UUID, T_prim);
6133 
6134  }
6135 
6136  }
6137 
6138 }
6139

6143 
6144  OID = a_OID;
6145  type = helios::OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE;
6146  UUIDs = a_UUIDs;
6147  subdiv = a_subdiv;
6148  texturefile = a_texturefile;
6149  context = a_context;
6150 
6151 }

6154  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
6155  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getSphereObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
6156  }
6157  return dynamic_cast<Sphere*>(objects.at(ObjID));

6159 
6160 float Sphere::getRadius() const{
6161 
6162  vec3 n0(0,0,0), n1(1,0,0);
6163  vec3 n0_T, n1_T;
6164 
6165  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6166  vecmult(transform,n1,n1_T);
6167 
6168  return (n1_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6169 
6170 }
6171 
6172 vec3 Sphere::getCenter() const{
6173 
6174  vec3 center;
6175  vec3 Y;
6176  Y.x = 0.f;
6177  Y.y = 0.f;
6178  Y.z = 0.f;
6179 
6180  center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
6181  center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
6182  center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];
6183 
6184  return center;
6185 
6186 }

6196 void Sphere::scale( float S ){
6197 
6198  float T[16], T_prim[16];
6199  makeScaleMatrix( make_vec3(S,S,S), T);
6200  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6201 
6202  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
6203 
6204  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
6205 
6206  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6207  matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
6208  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6209 
6210  }
6211 
6212  }
6213 
6214 }

6223  nodes = a_nodes;
6224  radius = a_radius;

6239 std::vector<helios::vec3> Tube::getNodes() const{
6240 
6241  std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
6242  nodes_T.resize( nodes.size() );
6243 
6244  for( uint i=0; i<nodes.size(); i++ ){
6245  nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
6246  nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
6247  nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
6248  }
6249 
6250  return nodes_T;
6251 
6252 }
6253 
6254 std::vector<float> Tube::getNodeRadii() const{
6255  std::vector<float> radius_T;
6256  radius_T.resize(radius.size());
6257  for( int i=0; i<radius.size(); i++ ){
6258 
6259  vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(radius.at(i),0,0);
6260  vec3 n0_T, nx_T;
6261 
6262  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6263  vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
6264 
6265  radius_T.at(i) = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6266 
6267  }
6268  return radius_T;
6269 }

6324 vec3 Box::getSize() const{
6325 
6326  vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(1,0,0), ny(0,1,0), nz(0,0,1);
6327 
6328  vec3 n0_T, nx_T, ny_T, nz_T;
6329 
6330  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6331  vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
6332  vecmult(transform,ny,ny_T);
6333  vecmult(transform,nz,nz_T);
6334 
6335  float x = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6336  float y = (ny_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6337  float z = (nz_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6338 
6339  return make_vec3( x, y, z );
6340 
6341 }

6344 
6345  vec3 center;
6346  vec3 Y;
6347  Y.x = 0.f;
6348  Y.y = 0.f;
6349  Y.z = 0.f;
6350 
6351  center.x = transform[0] * Y.x + transform[1] * Y.y + transform[2] * Y.z + transform[3];
6352  center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
6353  center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];
6354 
6355  return center;
6356 
6357 }

6408 vec2 Disk::getSize() const{
6409 
6410  vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(1,0,0), ny(0,1,0);
6411  vec3 n0_T, nx_T, ny_T;
6412 
6413  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6414  vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
6415  vecmult(transform,ny,ny_T);
6416 
6417  float x = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6418  float y = (ny_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6419 
6420  return make_vec2(x,y);
6421 
6422 }

6433  center.y = transform[4] * Y.x + transform[5] * Y.y + transform[6] * Y.z + transform[7];
6434  center.z = transform[8] * Y.x + transform[9] * Y.y + transform[10] * Y.z + transform[11];

6488 Cone::Cone(uint a_OID, const std::vector<uint> &a_UUIDs, const vec3 &a_node0, const vec3 &a_node1, float a_radius0,
6489  float a_radius1, uint a_subdiv, const char *a_texturefile, helios::Context *a_context) {
6490 
6491  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
6492 
6493  OID = a_OID;
6494  type = helios::OBJECT_TYPE_CONE;
6495  UUIDs = a_UUIDs;
6496  subdiv = a_subdiv;
6497  texturefile = a_texturefile;
6498  context = a_context;
6499  nodes = {a_node0, a_node1};
6500  radii = {a_radius0, a_radius1};
6501 
6502 }

6506  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getConeObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
6507  }

6510 
6511 std::vector<helios::vec3> Cone::getNodes() const{
6512 
6513  std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
6514 
6515  nodes_T.resize( 2 );
6516 
6517  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){
6518  nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
6519  nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
6520  nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
6521  }
6522 
6523  return nodes_T;
6524 }
6525 
6526 helios::vec3 Cone::getNode( int number ) const{
6527 
6528  if( number<0 || number>1 ){
6529  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Cone::getNode): node number must be 0 or 1."));
6530  }
6531 
6532  vec3 node_T;
6533 
6534  node_T.x = transform[0] * nodes.at(number).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(number).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(number).z + transform[3];
6535  node_T.y = transform[4] * nodes.at(number).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(number).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(number).z + transform[7];
6536  node_T.z = transform[8] * nodes.at(number).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(number).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(number).z + transform[11];
6537 
6538  return node_T;
6539 }
6540 
6541 std::vector<float> Cone::getNodeRadii() const{
6542  std::vector<float> radii_T;
6543  radii_T.resize(2);
6544  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){
6545 
6546  vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(radii.at(i),0,0);
6547  vec3 n0_T, nx_T;
6548 
6549  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6550  vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
6551 
6552  radii_T.at(i) = (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6553 
6554  }
6555  return radii_T;
6556 }
6557 
6558 float Cone::getNodeRadius( int number ) const{
6559  if( number<0 || number>1 ){
6560  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Cone::getNodeRadius): node number must be 0 or 1."));
6561  }
6562 
6563  vec3 n0(0,0,0), nx(radii.at(number),0,0);
6564  vec3 n0_T, nx_T;
6565 
6566  vecmult(transform,n0,n0_T);
6567  vecmult(transform,nx,nx_T);
6568 
6569  return (nx_T-n0_T).magnitude();
6570 }
6571 
6572 uint Cone::getSubdivisionCount() const{
6573  return subdiv;
6574 }
6575 
6576 void Cone::setSubdivisionCount( uint a_subdiv ){
6577  subdiv = a_subdiv;
6578 }
6579 
6580 helios::vec3 Cone::getAxisUnitVector() const{
6581 
6582  std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
6583  nodes_T.resize( 2 );
6584 
6585  for( uint i=0; i<2; i++ ){
6586  nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
6587  nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
6588  nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
6589  }
6590 
6591  helios::vec3 axis_unit_vector = helios::make_vec3(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z );
6592  float length = powf(powf(axis_unit_vector.x,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.y,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.z,2),0.5);
6593  axis_unit_vector = axis_unit_vector / length;
6594 
6595  return axis_unit_vector;
6596 }
6597 
6598 float Cone::getLength() const{
6599 
6600  std::vector<vec3> nodes_T;
6601  nodes_T.resize( 2);
6602 
6603  for( uint i=0; i<2; i++ ){
6604  nodes_T.at(i).x = transform[0] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[1] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[2] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[3];
6605  nodes_T.at(i).y = transform[4] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[5] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[6] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[7];
6606  nodes_T.at(i).z = transform[8] * nodes.at(i).x + transform[9] * nodes.at(i).y + transform[10] * nodes.at(i).z + transform[11];
6607  }
6608 
6609  float length = powf(powf(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, 2) + powf(nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, 2) + powf(nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z, 2), 0.5);
6610  return length;
6611 }
6612 
6613 void Cone::scaleLength( float S ){
6614 
6615  //get the nodes and radii of the nodes with transformation matrix applied
6616  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodes();
6617  std::vector<float> radii_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodeRadii();
6618 
6619  // calculate the transformed axis unit vector of the cone
6620  vec3 axis_unit_vector = helios::make_vec3(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z );
6621  float length = powf(powf(axis_unit_vector.x,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.y,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.z,2),0.5);
6622  axis_unit_vector = axis_unit_vector / length;
6623 
6624  //translate node 0 back to origin
6625  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(-1.0*nodes_T.at(0));
6626 
6627  //rotate the cone to align with z axis
6628  helios::vec3 z_axis = make_vec3(0,0,1);
6629  //get the axis about which to rotate
6630  vec3 ra = cross( z_axis, axis_unit_vector);
6631  //get the angle to rotate
6632  float dot = axis_unit_vector.x*z_axis.x + axis_unit_vector.y*z_axis.y + axis_unit_vector.z*z_axis.z;
6633  float angle = acos_safe(dot);
6634 
6635  //only rotate if the cone is not alread aligned with the z axis (i.e., angle is not zero. If zero, the axis of rotation is 0,0,0 and we end up with problems)
6636  if(angle != float(0.0)){
6637  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( -1*angle, ra );
6638  }
6639 
6640  // scale the cone in the z (length) dimension
6641  float T[16], T_prim[16];
6642  makeScaleMatrix( make_vec3(1,1,S), T);
6643  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6644  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
6645  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
6646  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6647  matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
6648  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6649  }
6650  }
6651 
6652  //rotate back
6653  if(angle != 0.0){
6654  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( angle, ra );
6655  }
6656 
6657  // //translate back
6658  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(nodes_T.at(0));
6659 
6660 }
6661 
6662 void Cone::scaleGirth( float S ){
6663 
6664  //get the nodes and radii of the nodes with transformation matrix applied
6665  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodes();
6666  std::vector<float> radii_T = context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->getNodeRadii();
6667 
6668  // calculate the transformed axis unit vector of the cone
6669  vec3 axis_unit_vector = helios::make_vec3(nodes_T.at(1).x - nodes_T.at(0).x, nodes_T.at(1).y - nodes_T.at(0).y, nodes_T.at(1).z - nodes_T.at(0).z );
6670  float length = powf(powf(axis_unit_vector.x,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.y,2) + powf(axis_unit_vector.z,2),0.5);
6671  axis_unit_vector = axis_unit_vector / length;
6672 
6673  //translate node 0 back to origin
6674  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(-1.0*nodes_T.at(0));
6675 
6676  //rotate the cone to align with z axis
6677  helios::vec3 z_axis = make_vec3(0,0,1);
6678  //get the axis about which to rotate
6679  vec3 ra = cross( z_axis, axis_unit_vector);
6680  //get the angle to rotate
6681  float dot = axis_unit_vector.x*z_axis.x + axis_unit_vector.y*z_axis.y + axis_unit_vector.z*z_axis.z;
6682  float angle = acos_safe(dot);
6683  //only rotate if the cone is not alread aligned with the z axis (i.e., angle is not zero. If zero, the axis of rotation is 0,0,0 and we end up with problems)
6684  if(angle != float(0.0)){
6685  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( -1*angle, ra );
6686  }
6687 
6688  // scale the cone in the z (length) dimension
6689  float T[16], T_prim[16];
6690  makeScaleMatrix( make_vec3(S,S,1), T);
6691  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6692  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
6693  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUID ) ){
6694  context->getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6695  matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
6696  context->setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix( UUID,T_prim);
6697  }
6698  }
6699 
6700  //rotate back
6701  if(angle != 0.0){
6702  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->rotate( angle, ra );
6703  }
6704 
6705  // //translate back
6706  context->getConeObjectPointer(OID)->translate(nodes_T.at(0));
6707 
6708 }
6709 
6710 uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius ){
6711 
6712  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
6713 
6714  return addSphereObject(Ndivs,center,radius,color);
6715 
6716 }
6717 
6718 uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const RGBcolor &color ){
6719 
6720  if( radius<=0.f ){
6721  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addSphereObject): Radius of sphere must be positive."));
6722  }
6723 
6724  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6725 
6726  float theta;
6727  float dtheta=float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
6728  float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
6729 
6730  //bottom cap
6731  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6732 
6733  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
6734  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6735  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6736 
6737  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
6738 
6739  }
6740 
6741  //top cap
6742  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6743 
6744  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
6745  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6746  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6747 
6748  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v2,v1,v0,color) );
6749 
6750  }
6751 
6752  //middle
6753  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6754  for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
6755 
6756  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6757  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6758  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6759  vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6760 
6761  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
6762  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,color) );
6763 
6764  }
6765  }
6766 
6767  auto* sphere_new = (new Sphere(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, "", this));
6768 
6769  float T[16], transform[16];
6770  sphere_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
6771 
6772  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(radius,radius,radius),T);
6773  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6774 
6775  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
6776  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6777 
6778  sphere_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
6779 
6780  sphere_new->setColor( color );
6781 
6782  for( uint p : UUID){
6783  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
6784  }
6785 
6786  objects[currentObjectID] = sphere_new;
6787  currentObjectID++;
6788  return currentObjectID-1;
6789 
6790 
6791 }
6792 
6793 uint Context::addSphereObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const char* texturefile ){
6794 
6795  if( radius<=0.f ){
6796  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addSphereObject): Radius of sphere must be positive."));
6797  }
6798 
6799  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6800 
6801  float theta;
6802  float dtheta=float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
6803  float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
6804 
6805  //bottom cap
6806  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6807 
6808  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
6809  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6810  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6811 
6812  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
6813  n0.normalize();
6814  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
6815  n1.normalize();
6816  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
6817  n2.normalize();
6818 
6819  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sinf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cosf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6820  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6821  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6822 
6823  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
6824  uv2.x = 1;
6825  }
6826 
6827  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
6828 
6829  }
6830 
6831  //top cap
6832  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6833 
6834  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
6835  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6836  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6837 
6838  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
6839  n0.normalize();
6840  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
6841  n1.normalize();
6842  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
6843  n2.normalize();
6844 
6845  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sin((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cos((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6846  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6847  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6848 
6849  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
6850  uv2.x = 1;
6851  }
6852 
6853  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
6854 
6855  }
6856 
6857  //middle
6858  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6859  for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
6860 
6861  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6862  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6863  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6864  vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6865 
6866  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
6867  n0.normalize();
6868  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
6869  n1.normalize();
6870  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
6871  n2.normalize();
6872  vec3 n3 = v3-center;
6873  n3.normalize();
6874 
6875  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n0.x, -n0.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6876  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6877  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6878  vec2 uv3 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n3.x, -n3.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n3.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
6879 
6880  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
6881  uv2.x = 1;
6882  uv3.x = 1;
6883  }
6884 
6885  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
6886  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,texturefile,uv0,uv2,uv3) );
6887 
6888  }
6889  }
6890 
6891  auto* sphere_new = (new Sphere(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, texturefile, this));
6892 
6893  float T[16], transform[16];
6894  sphere_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
6895 
6896  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(radius,radius,radius),T);
6897  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6898 
6899  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
