6900  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6901 
6902  sphere_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
6903 
6904  for( uint p : UUID){
6905  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
6906  }
6907 
6908  objects[currentObjectID] = sphere_new;
6909  currentObjectID++;
6910  return currentObjectID-1;
6911 
6912 
6913 }
6914 
6915 uint Context::addTileObject(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv) {
6916 
6917  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
6918 
6919  return addTileObject(center,size,rotation,subdiv,color);
6920 }
6921 
6922 uint Context::addTileObject(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
6923 
6924  if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
6925  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Size of tile must be greater than 0."));
6926  }
6927  if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 ){
6928  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Number of tile subdivisions must be greater than 0."));
6929  }
6930 
6931  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6932 
6933  vec2 subsize;
6934  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
6935  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
6936 
6937  vec3 subcenter;
6938 
6939  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
6940  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
6941 
6942  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0.f);
6943 
6944  UUID.push_back( addPatch( subcenter, subsize, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color ) );
6945 
6946  if( rotation.elevation!=0.f ){
6947  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.elevation, "x" );
6948  }
6949  if( rotation.azimuth!=0.f ){
6950  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.azimuth, "z" );
6951  }
6952  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID.back() )->translate( center );
6953 
6954  }
6955  }
6956 
6957  auto* tile_new = (new Tile(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, "", this));
6958 
6959  float T[16], S[16], R[16];
6960 
6961  float transform[16];
6962  tile_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
6963 
6964  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),S);
6965  matmult(S,transform,transform);
6966 
6967  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.elevation,"x",R);
6968  matmult(R,transform,transform);
6969  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.azimuth,"z",R);
6970  matmult(R,transform,transform);
6971 
6972  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
6973  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6974 
6975  tile_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
6976 
6977  tile_new->setColor( color );
6978 
6979  for( uint p : UUID){
6980  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
6981  }
6982 
6983  objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
6984  currentObjectID++;
6985  return currentObjectID-1;
6986 
6987 }
6988 
6989 uint Context::addTileObject(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
6990 
6991  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
6992  std::string fn = texturefile;
6993  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
6994  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
6995  }
6996 
6997  if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
6998  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Size of tile must be greater than 0."));
6999  }
7000  if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 ){
7001  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTileObject): Number of tile subdivisions must be greater than 0."));
7002  }
7003 
7004  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7005 
7006  vec2 subsize;
7007  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
7008  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
7009 
7010  vec3 subcenter;
7011 
7012  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
7013  uv.resize(4);
7014  vec2 uv_sub;
7015  uv_sub.x = 1.f/float(subdiv.x);
7016  uv_sub.y = 1.f/float(subdiv.y);
7017 
7018  addTexture( texturefile );
7019  const std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha;
7020  int2 sz;
7021  if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
7022  alpha = textures.at(texturefile).getTransparencyData();
7023  sz = textures.at(texturefile).getSize();
7024  }
7025 
7026  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
7027  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
7028 
7029  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0.f);
7030 
7031  uv.at(0) = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
7032  uv.at(1) = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
7033  uv.at(2) = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
7034  uv.at(3) = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
7035 
7036  float solid_fraction;
7037  if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
7038  int A = 0;
7039  int At = 0;
7040 
7041  int2 uv_min( floor(uv.at(0).x*(float(sz.x)-1.f)), floor(uv.at(0).y*(float(sz.y)-1.f)) );
7042  int2 uv_max( floor(uv.at(2).x*(float(sz.x)-1.f)), floor(uv.at(2).y*(float(sz.y)-1.f)) );
7043 
7044  assert( uv_min.x>=0 && uv_min.y>=0 && uv_max.x<sz.x && uv_max.y<sz.y );
7045 
7046  for( int jj=uv_min.y; jj<uv_max.y; jj++ ){
7047  for( int ii=uv_min.x; ii<uv_max.x; ii++ ){
7048  At += 1;
7049  if( alpha->at(jj).at(ii) ){
7050  A += 1;
7051  }
7052  }
7053  }
7054  if( At==0 ){
7055  solid_fraction = 0;
7056  }else{
7057  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
7058  }
7059  }else{
7060  solid_fraction = 1.f;
7061  }
7062 
7063  auto* patch_new = (new Patch( texturefile, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
7064 
7065  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
7066 
7067  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
7068  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(subsize.x,subsize.y,1) );
7069 
7070  patch_new->translate( subcenter );
7071 
7072  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
7073  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
7074  }
7075  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
7076  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
7077  }
7078 
7079  patch_new->translate( center );
7080 
7081  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
7082  markGeometryDirty();
7083  currentUUID++;
7084  UUID.push_back(currentUUID-1);
7085 
7086 
7087  }
7088  }
7089 
7090  auto* tile_new = (new Tile(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, texturefile, this));
7091 
7092  float T[16], S[16], R[16];
7093 
7094  float transform[16];
7095  tile_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7096 
7097  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),S);
7098  matmult(S,transform,transform);
7099 
7100  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.elevation,"x",R);
7101  matmult(R,transform,transform);
7102  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.azimuth,"z",R);
7103  matmult(R,transform,transform);
7104 
7105  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
7106  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7107 
7108  tile_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7109 
7110  for( uint p : UUID){
7111  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7112  }
7113 
7114  objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
7115  currentObjectID++;
7116  return currentObjectID-1;
7117 
7118 }
7119 
7120 uint Context::addTubeObject(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius ){
7121 
7122  uint node_count = nodes.size();
7123 
7124  std::vector<RGBcolor> color;
7125  color.resize(node_count);
7126 
7127  for( uint i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){
7128  color.at(i) = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
7129  }
7130 
7131  return addTubeObject(Ndivs,nodes,radius,color);
7132 
7133 }
7134 
7135 uint Context::addTubeObject(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const std::vector<RGBcolor> &color ){
7136 
7137  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
7138 
7139  if( node_count==0 ){
7140  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Node and radius arrays are empty."));
7141  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
7142  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree."));
7143  }else if( node_count!=color.size() ){
7144  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `color' arguments must agree."));
7145  }
7146 
7147  vec3 vec, convec;
7148  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
7149  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
7150  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
7151  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
7152  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
7153  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7154  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
7155  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
7156  }
7157  vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
7158 
7159  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7160  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7161  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7162  }
7163 
7164  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
7165 
7166  if(i==0){
7167  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
7168  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
7169  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
7170  }else if(i==node_count-1){
7171  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
7172  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
7173  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
7174  }else{
7175  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
7176  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
7177  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
7178  }
7179 
7180  float norm;
7181  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
7182  norm=convec.magnitude();
7183  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
7184  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
7185  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
7186  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
7187  norm=nvec.magnitude();
7188  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
7189  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
7190  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
7191 
7192 
7193 
7194  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7195  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
7196  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
7197  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
7198 
7199  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
7200  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
7201  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
7202 
7203  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
7204  }
7205 
7206  }
7207 
7208  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
7209  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7210 
7211  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
7212  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
7213 
7214  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7215  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7216  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
7217 
7218  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7219  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
7220  //}
7221 
7222  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7223  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
7224  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7225 
7226  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7227  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
7228  //}
7229 
7230  }
7231  }
7232 
7233  auto* tube_new = (new Tube(currentObjectID, UUID, nodes, radius, color, Ndivs, "", this));
7234 
7235  float T[16], transform[16];
7236  tube_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7237 
7238  for( uint p : UUID){
7239  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7240  }
7241 
7242  objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
7243  currentObjectID++;
7244  return currentObjectID-1;
7245 
7246 }
7247 
7248 uint Context::addTubeObject(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const char* texturefile ){
7249 
7250  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
7251  std::string fn = texturefile;
7252  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
7253  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTubeObject): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
7254  }
7255 
7256  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
7257 
7258  if( node_count==0 ){
7259  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Node and radius arrays are empty."));
7260  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
7261  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree."));
7262  }
7263 
7264  vec3 vec, convec;
7265  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
7266  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
7267  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
7268  std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
7269  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
7270  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
7271  uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
7272  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7273  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
7274  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
7275  uv.at(j).resize(node_count);
7276  }
7277  vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
7278 
7279  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7280  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7281  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7282  }
7283 
7284  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
7285 
7286  if(i==0){
7287  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
7288  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
7289  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
7290  }else if(i==node_count-1){
7291  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
7292  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
7293  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
7294  }else{
7295  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
7296  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
7297  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
7298  }
7299 
7300  float norm;
7301  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
7302  norm=convec.magnitude();
7303  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
7304  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
7305  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
7306  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
7307  norm=nvec.magnitude();
7308  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
7309  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
7310  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
7311 
7312  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7313  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
7314  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
7315  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
7316 
7317  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
7318  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
7319  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
7320 
7321  uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(node_count-1);
7322  uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
7323 
7324  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
7325  }
7326 
7327  }
7328 
7329  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
7330  vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
7331  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7332 
7333  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
7334  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
7335 
7336  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7337  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7338  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
7339 
7340  uv0 = uv[j][i];
7341  uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
7342  uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
7343 
7344  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7345  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
7346  }
7347 
7348  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7349  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
7350  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7351 
7352  uv0 = uv[j][i];
7353  uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
7354  uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
7355 
7356  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7357  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
7358  }
7359 
7360  }
7361  }
7362 
7363  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
7364 
7365  auto* tube_new = (new Tube(currentObjectID, UUID, nodes, radius, colors, Ndivs, texturefile, this));
7366 
7367  float T[16], transform[16];
7368  tube_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7369 
7370  for( uint p : UUID){
7371  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7372  }
7373 
7374  objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
7375  currentObjectID++;
7376  return currentObjectID-1;
7377 
7378 }
7379 
7380 uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv ){
7381 
7382  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
7383 
7384  return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
7385 }
7386 
7387 uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
7388  return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
7389 }
7390 
7391 uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
7392  return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,texturefile,false);
7393 }
7394 
7395 uint Context::addBoxObject(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color, bool reverse_normals ){
7396 
7397  if( size.x<=0 || size.y<=0 || size.z<=0 ){
7398  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addBoxObject): Size of box must be positive."));
7399  }
7400  if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 || subdiv.z<1 ){
7401  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addBoxObject): Number of box subdivisions must be positive."));
7402  }
7403 
7404  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7405 
7406  vec3 subsize;
7407  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
7408  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
7409  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
7410 
7411  vec3 subcenter;
7412  uint objID;
7413  std::vector<uint> U, U_copy;
7414 
7415  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
7416 
7417  // x-z faces (vertical)
7418 
7419  //right
7420  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7421  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
7422  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7423 
7424  //left
7425  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7426  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
7427  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7428 
7429  // y-z faces (vertical)
7430 
7431  //front
7432  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7433  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,1.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
7434  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7435 
7436  //back
7437  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7438  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
7439  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7440 
7441  // x-y faces (horizontal)
7442 
7443  //top
7444  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7445  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
7446  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7447 
7448  //bottom
7449  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7450  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
7451  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7452 
7453  }else{ //normals point outward
7454 
7455  // x-z faces (vertical)
7456 
7457  //right
7458  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7459  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
7460  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7461 
7462  //left
7463  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7464  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
7465  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7466 
7467  // y-z faces (vertical)
7468 
7469  //front
7470  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7471  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,0.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
7472  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7473 
7474  //back
7475  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7476  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5f*M_PI,1.5f*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
7477  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7478 
7479  // x-y faces (horizontal)
7480 
7481  //top
7482  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7483  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
7484  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7485 
7486  //bottom
7487  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7488  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
7489  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7490 
7491  }
7492 
7493  auto* box_new = (new Box(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, "", this));
7494 
7495  float T[16], transform[16];
7496  box_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7497 
7498  makeScaleMatrix(size,T);
7499  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7500 
7501  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
7502  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7503 
7504  box_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7505 
7506  box_new->setColor( color );
7507 
7508  for( uint p : UUID){
7509  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7510  }
7511 
7512  objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
7513  currentObjectID++;
7514  return currentObjectID-1;
7515 
7516 }
7517 
7518 uint Context::addBoxObject(vec3 center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile, bool reverse_normals ){
7519 
7520  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
7521  std::string fn = texturefile;
7522  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
7523  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addBoxObject): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
7524  }
7525 
7526  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7527 
7528  vec3 subsize;
7529  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
7530  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
7531  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
7532 
7533  vec3 subcenter;
7534  uint objID;
7535  std::vector<uint> U, U_copy;
7536 
7537  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
7538 
7539  // x-z faces (vertical)
7540 
7541  //right
7542  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7543  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7544  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7545 
7546  //left
7547  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7548  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7549  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7550 
7551  // y-z faces (vertical)
7552 
7553  //front
7554  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7555  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7556  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7557 
7558  //back
7559  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7560  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7561  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7562 
7563  // x-y faces (horizontal)
7564 
7565  //top
7566  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7567  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
7568  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7569 
7570  //bottom
7571  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7572  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
7573  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7574 
7575  }else{ //normals point outward
7576 
7577  // x-z faces (vertical)
7578 
7579  //right
7580  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7581  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7582  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7583 
7584  //left
7585  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
7586  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7587  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7588 
7589  // y-z faces (vertical)
7590 
7591  //front
7592  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7593  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7594  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7595 
7596  //back
7597  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
7598  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
7599  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7600 
7601  // x-y faces (horizontal)
7602 
7603  //top
7604  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7605  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
7606  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7607 
7608  //bottom
7609  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
7610  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
7611  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
7612 
7613  }
7614 
7615  auto* box_new = (new Box(currentObjectID, UUID, subdiv, texturefile, this));
7616 
7617  float T[16], transform[16];
7618  box_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7619 
7620  makeScaleMatrix(size,T);
7621  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7622 
7623  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
7624  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7625 
7626  box_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7627 
7628  for( uint p : UUID){
7629  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7630  }
7631 
7632  objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
7633  currentObjectID++;
7634  return currentObjectID-1;
7635 
7636 
7637 }
7638 
7639 uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size ){
7640  return addDiskObject(Ndivs,center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
7641 }
7642 
7643 uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation ){
7644  return addDiskObject(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
7645 }
7646 
7647 uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &color ){
7648  return addDiskObject(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
7649 }
7650 
7651 uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBAcolor &color ){
7652 
7653  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7654  UUID.resize(Ndivs);
7655 
7656  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
7657 
7658  float dtheta = 2.f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
7659 
7660  UUID.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), color );
7661  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
7662  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
7663  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->translate( center );
7664 
7665  }
7666 
7667  auto* disk_new = (new Disk(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, "", this));
7668 
7669  float T[16], transform[16];
7670  disk_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7671 
7672  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),T);
7673  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7674 
7675  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
7676  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7677 
7678  disk_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7679 
7680  disk_new->setColor( color );
7681 
7682  for( uint p : UUID){
7683  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7684  }
7685 
7686  objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
7687  currentObjectID++;
7688  return currentObjectID-1;
7689 
7690 }
7691 
7692 uint Context::addDiskObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const char* texture_file ){
7693 
7694  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
7695  std::string fn = texture_file;
7696  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
7697  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addDiskObject): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
7698  }
7699 
7700  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7701  UUID.resize(Ndivs);
7702 
7703  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
7704 
7705  float dtheta = 2.f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
7706 
7707  UUID.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5,0.5), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(dtheta*float(i))),0.5f*(1.f+sinf(dtheta*float(i)))), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(dtheta*float(i+1))),0.5f*(1.f+sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)))) );
7708  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
7709  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
7710  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID.at(i))->translate( center );
7711 
7712  }
7713 
7714  auto* disk_new = (new Disk(currentObjectID, UUID, Ndivs, texture_file, this));
7715 
7716  float T[16], transform[16];
7717  disk_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7718 
7719  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),T);
7720  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7721 
7722  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
7723  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7724 
7725  disk_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7726 
7727  for( uint p : UUID){
7728  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7729  }
7730 
7731  objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
7732  currentObjectID++;
7733  return currentObjectID-1;
7734 
7735 }
7736 
7737 uint Context::addPolymeshObject(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs ){
7738 
7739  auto* polymesh_new = (new Polymesh(currentObjectID, UUIDs, "", this));
7740 
7741  polymesh_new->setColor( getPrimitivePointer_private( UUIDs.front())->getColor() );
7742 
7743  float T[16], transform[16];
7744  polymesh_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7745 
7746  makeTranslationMatrix( getPrimitivePointer_private( UUIDs.front())->getVertices().front(),T);
7747  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7748 
7749  polymesh_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7750 
7751  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
7752  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7753  }
7754 
7755  objects[currentObjectID] = polymesh_new;
7756  currentObjectID++;
7757  return currentObjectID-1;
7758 
7759 }
7760 
7761 uint Context::addConeObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1 ){
7762 
7763  RGBcolor color;
7764  color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
7765  return addConeObject(Ndivs, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, color);
7766 }
7767 
7768 uint Context::addConeObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, const RGBcolor &color ){
7769 
7770  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
7771  std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
7772 
7773  vec3 vec, convec;
7774  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
7775  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
7776  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
7777  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
7778  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
7779  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7780  xyz.at(j).resize(2);
7781  normal.at(j).resize(2);
7782  }
7783  vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
7784 
7785  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7786  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7787  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7788  }
7789 
7790  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
7791 
7792  if(i==0){
7793  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
7794  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
7795  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
7796  }else if(i==1){
7797  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
7798  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
7799  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
7800  }
7801 
7802  float norm;
7803  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
7804  norm=convec.magnitude();
7805  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
7806  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
7807  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
7808  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
7809  norm=nvec.magnitude();
7810  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
7811  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
7812  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
7813 
7814  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7815  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
7816  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
7817  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
7818 
7819  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
7820  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
7821  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
7822 
7823  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
7824  }
7825 
7826  }
7827 
7828  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
7829  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7830 
7831  for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
7832  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
7833 
7834  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7835  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7836  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
7837 
7838  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
7839 
7840  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7841  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
7842  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7843 
7844  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
7845 
7846  }
7847  }
7848 
7849  auto* cone_new = (new Cone(currentObjectID, UUID, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, Ndivs, "", this));
7850 
7851  float T[16], transform[16];
7852  cone_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7853 
7854  makeTranslationMatrix(nodes.front(),T);
7855  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7856 
7857  cone_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7858 
7859  for( uint p : UUID){
7860  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7861  }
7862 
7863  cone_new->setColor( color );
7864 
7865  objects[currentObjectID] = cone_new;
7866  currentObjectID++;
7867  return currentObjectID-1;
7868 
7869 }
7870 
7871 uint Context::addConeObject(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, const char* texturefile ){
7872 
7873  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
7874  std::string fn = texturefile;
7875  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
7876  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addConeObject): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
7877  }
7878 
7879  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
7880  std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
7881 
7882  vec3 vec, convec;
7883  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
7884  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
7885  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
7886  std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
7887  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
7888  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
7889  uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
7890  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7891  xyz.at(j).resize(2);
7892  normal.at(j).resize(2);
7893  uv.at(j).resize(2);
7894  }
7895  vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
7896 
7897  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7898  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7899  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
7900  }
7901 
7902  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
7903 
7904  if(i==0){
7905  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
7906  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
7907  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
7908  }else if(i==1){
7909  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
7910  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
7911  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
7912  }
7913 
7914  float norm;
7915  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
7916  norm=convec.magnitude();
7917  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
7918  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
7919  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
7920  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
7921  norm=nvec.magnitude();
7922  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
7923  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
7924  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
7925 
7926  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
7927  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
7928  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
7929  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
7930 
7931  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
7932  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
7933  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
7934 
7935  uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(2-1);
7936  uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
7937 
7938  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
7939  }
7940 
7941  }
7942 
7943  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
7944  vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
7945  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7946 
7947  for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
7948  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
7949 
7950  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7951  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7952  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
7953 
7954  uv0 = uv[j][i];
7955  uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
7956  uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
7957 
7958  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7959  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
7960  }
7961 
7962  v0 = xyz[j][i];
7963  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
7964  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
7965 
7966  uv0 = uv[j][i];
7967  uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
7968  uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
7969 
7970  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
7971  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
7972  }
7973 
7974  }
7975  }
7976 
7977  auto* cone_new = (new Cone(currentObjectID, UUID, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, Ndivs, texturefile, this));
7978 
7979  float T[16], transform[16];
7980  cone_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
7981 
7982  makeTranslationMatrix(nodes.front(),T);
7983  matmult(T,transform,transform);
7984 
7985  cone_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
7986 
7987  for( uint p : UUID){
7988  getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
7989  }
7990 
7991  objects[currentObjectID] = cone_new;
7992  currentObjectID++;
7993  return currentObjectID-1;
7994 
7995 }
7996 
7997 std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius ){
7998 
7999  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
8000 
8001  return addSphere(Ndivs,center,radius,color);
8002 
8003 }
8004 
8005 std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const RGBcolor &color ){
8006 
8007  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8008 
8009  float theta;
8010  float dtheta=M_PI/float(Ndivs);
8011  float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
8012 
8013  //bottom cap
8014  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8015 
8016  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
8017  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8018  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8019 
8020  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
8021 
8022  }
8023 
8024  //top cap
8025  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8026 
8027  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
8028  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8029  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8030 
8031  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v2,v1,v0,color) );
8032 
8033  }
8034 
8035  //middle
8036  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8037  for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
8038 
8039  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8040  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8041  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8042  vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8043 
8044  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
8045  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,color) );
8046 
8047  }
8048  }
8049 
8050  return UUID;
8051 
8052 
8053 }
8054 
8055 std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, float radius, const char* texturefile ){
8056 
8057  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
8058  std::string fn = texturefile;
8059  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
8060  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addSphere): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
8061  }
8062 
8063  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8064 
8065  float theta;
8066  float dtheta=M_PI/float(Ndivs);
8067  float dphi=2.0f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
8068 
8069  //bottom cap
8070  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8071 
8072  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
8073  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8074  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8075 
8076  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
8077  n0.normalize();
8078  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
8079  n1.normalize();
8080  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
8081  n2.normalize();
8082 
8083  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sin((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cos((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8084  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8085  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8086 
8087  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
8088  uv2.x = 1;
8089  }
8090 
8091  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
8092 
8093  }
8094 
8095  //top cap
8096  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8097 
8098  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI), 0 ) );
8099  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8100  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5f*float(M_PI)-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8101 
8102  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
8103  n0.normalize();
8104  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
8105  n1.normalize();
8106  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
8107  n2.normalize();
8108 
8109  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( sinf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi), -cosf((float(j)+0.5f)*dphi) )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8110  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8111  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8112 
8113  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
8114  uv2.x = 1;
8115  }
8116 
8117  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
8118 
8119  }
8120 
8121  //middle
8122  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8123  for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
8124 
8125  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8126  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
8127  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8128  vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5f*float(M_PI)+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
8129 
8130  vec3 n0 = v0-center;
8131  n0.normalize();
8132  vec3 n1 = v1-center;
8133  n1.normalize();
8134  vec3 n2 = v2-center;
8135  n2.normalize();
8136  vec3 n3 = v3-center;
8137  n3.normalize();
8138 
8139  vec2 uv0 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n0.x, -n0.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n0.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8140  vec2 uv1 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n1.x, -n1.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n1.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8141  vec2 uv2 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n2.x, -n2.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n2.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8142  vec2 uv3 = make_vec2( 1.f - atan2f( n3.x, -n3.y )/float(2.f*M_PI) - 0.5f, 1.f - n3.z*0.5f - 0.5f );
8143 
8144  if( j==Ndivs-1 ){
8145  uv2.x = 1;
8146  uv3.x = 1;
8147  }
8148 
8149  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,texturefile,uv0,uv1,uv2) );
8150  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,texturefile,uv0,uv2,uv3) );
8151 
8152  }
8153  }
8154 
8155  return UUID;
8156 
8157 
8158 }
8159 
8160 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv ){
8161 
8162  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
8163 
8164  return addTile(center,size,rotation,subdiv,color);
8165 }
8166 
8167 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
8168 
8169  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8170 
8171  vec2 subsize;
8172  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
8173  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
8174 
8175  vec3 subcenter;
8176 
8177  UUID.resize( subdiv.x*subdiv.y );
8178 
8179  size_t t = 0;
8180  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
8181  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
8182 
8183  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0);
8184 
8185  UUID[t] = addPatch( subcenter, subsize, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color );
8186 
8187  if( rotation.elevation!=0.f ){
8188  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID[t] )->rotate( -rotation.elevation, "x" );
8189  }
8190  if( rotation.azimuth!=0.f ){
8191  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID[t] )->rotate( -rotation.azimuth, "z" );
8192  }
8193  getPrimitivePointer_private( UUID[t] )->translate( center );
8194 
8195  t++;
8196 
8197  }
8198  }
8199 
8200  return UUID;
8201 
8202 }
8203 
8204 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile(const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const int2 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
8205 
8206  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
8207  std::string fn = texturefile;
8208  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
8209  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTile): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
8210  }
8211 
8212  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8213 
8214  vec2 subsize;
8215  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
8216  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
8217 
8218  vec3 subcenter;
8219 
8220  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
8221  uv.resize(4);
8222  vec2 uv_sub;
8223  uv_sub.x = 1.f/float(subdiv.x);
8224  uv_sub.y = 1.f/float(subdiv.y);
8225 
8226  addTexture( texturefile );
8227  std::vector<std::vector<bool> > alpha;
8228  int2 sz;
8229  if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
8230  alpha = *textures.at(texturefile).getTransparencyData();
8231  sz = textures.at(texturefile).getSize();
8232  }
8233 
8234  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
8235  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
8236 
8237  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5f*size.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*subsize.x,-0.5f*size.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*subsize.y,0);
8238 
8239  uv[0] = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
8240  uv[1] = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
8241  uv[2] = make_vec2(float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
8242  uv[3] = make_vec2(float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
8243 
8244  float solid_fraction;
8245  if( textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel() ){
8246  int A = 0;
8247  int At = 0;
8248 
8249  int2 uv_min( floor(uv[0].x*float(sz.x-1)), floor(uv[0].y*float(sz.y-1)) );
8250  int2 uv_max( floor(uv[2].x*float(sz.x-1)), floor(uv[2].y*float(sz.y-1)) );
8251 
8252  assert( uv_min.x>=0 && uv_min.y>=0 && uv_max.x<sz.x && uv_max.y<sz.y );
8253 
8254  for( int jj=uv_min.y; jj<uv_max.y; jj++ ){
8255  for( int ii=uv_min.x; ii<uv_max.x; ii++ ){
8256  At += 1;
8257  if( alpha[jj][ii] ){
8258  A += 1;
8259  }
8260  }
8261  }
8262  if( At==0 ){
8263  solid_fraction = 0;
8264  }else{
8265  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
8266  }
8267  }else{
8268  solid_fraction = 1.f;
8269  }
8270 
8271  if( solid_fraction==0.f ){
8272  continue;
8273  }
8274 
8275  auto* patch_new = (new Patch( texturefile, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
8276 
8277  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
8278 
8279  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
8280  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(subsize.x,subsize.y,1) );
8281 
8282  patch_new->translate( subcenter );
8283 
8284  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
8285  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
8286  }
8287  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
8288  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
8289  }
8290 
8291  patch_new->translate( center );
8292 
8293  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
8294  markGeometryDirty();
8295  currentUUID++;
8296  UUID.push_back(currentUUID-1);
8297 
8298 
8299  }
8300  }
8301 
8302  return UUID;
8303 
8304 }
8305 
8306 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius ){
8307 
8308  uint node_count = nodes.size();
8309 
8310  std::vector<RGBcolor> color;
8311  color.resize(node_count);
8312 
8313  for( uint i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){
8314  color.at(i) = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
8315  }
8316 
8317  return addTube(Ndivs,nodes,radius,color);
8318 
8319 }
8320 
8321 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const std::vector<RGBcolor> &color ){
8322 
8323  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
8324 
8325  if( node_count==0 ){
8326  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Node and radius arrays are empty."));
8327  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
8328  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree."));
8329  }else if( node_count!=color.size() ){
8330  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `color' arguments must agree."));
8331  }
8332 
8333  vec3 vec, convec;
8334  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
8335  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
8336  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
8337  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
8338  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
8339  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8340  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
8341  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
8342  }
8343  vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
8344 
8345  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8346  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8347  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8348  }
8349 
8350  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
8351 
8352  if(i==0){
8353  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
8354  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
8355  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
8356  }else if(i==node_count-1){
8357  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
8358  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
8359  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
8360  }else{
8361  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
8362  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
8363  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
8364  }
8365 
8366  float norm;
8367  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
8368  norm=convec.magnitude();
8369  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
8370  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
8371  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
8372  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
8373  norm=nvec.magnitude();
8374  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
8375  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
8376  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
8377 
8378 
8379 
8380  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8381  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
8382  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
8383  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
8384 
8385  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
8386  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
8387  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
8388 
8389  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
8390  }
8391 
8392  }
8393 
8394  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
8395  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8396 
8397  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
8398  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8399 
8400  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8401  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8402  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
8403 
8404  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
8405  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
8406  //}
8407 
8408  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8409  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
8410  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8411 
8412  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
8413  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
8414  //}
8415 
8416  }
8417  }
8418 
8419  return UUID;
8420 
8421 }
8422 
8423 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube(uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> &nodes, const std::vector<float> &radius, const char* texturefile ){
8424 
8425  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
8426  std::string fn = texturefile;
8427  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
8428  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addTube): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
8429  }
8430 
8431  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
8432 
8433  if( node_count==0 ){
8434  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Node and radius arrays are empty."));
8435  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
8436  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree."));
8437  }
8438 
8439  vec3 vec, convec;
8440  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
8441  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
8442  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
8443  std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
8444  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
8445  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
8446  uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
8447  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8448  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
8449  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
8450  uv.at(j).resize(node_count);
8451  }
8452  vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
8453 
8454  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8455  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8456  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8457  }
8458 
8459  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
8460 
8461  if(i==0){
8462  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
8463  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
8464  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
8465  }else if(i==node_count-1){
8466  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
8467  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
8468  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
8469  }else{
8470  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
8471  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
8472  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
8473  }
8474 
8475  float norm;
8476  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
8477  norm=convec.magnitude();
8478  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
8479  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
8480  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
8481  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
8482  norm=nvec.magnitude();
8483  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
8484  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
8485  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
8486 
8487  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8488  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
8489  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
8490  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
8491 
8492  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
8493  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
8494  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
8495 
8496  uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(node_count-1);
8497  uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
8498 
8499  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
8500  }
8501 
8502  }
8503 
8504  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
8505  vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
8506  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8507 
8508  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
8509  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8510 
8511  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8512  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8513  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
8514 
8515  uv0 = uv[j][i];
8516  uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
8517  uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
8518 
8519  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
8520  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
8521  }
8522 
8523  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8524  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
8525  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8526 
8527  uv0 = uv[j][i];
8528  uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
8529  uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
8530 
8531  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
8532  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
8533  }
8534 
8535  }
8536  }
8537 
8538  return UUID;
8539 
8540 }
8541 
8542 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv ){
8543 
8544  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
8545 
8546  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
8547 }
8548 
8549 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color ){
8550  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
8551 }
8552 
8553 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
8554  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,texturefile,false);
8555 }
8556 
8557 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const RGBcolor &color, bool reverse_normals ){
8558 
8559  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8560 
8561  vec3 subsize;
8562  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
8563  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
8564  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
8565 
8566  vec3 subcenter;
8567  std::vector<uint> U;
8568 
8569  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
8570 
8571  // x-z faces (vertical)
8572 
8573  //right
8574  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8575  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
8576  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8577 
8578  //left
8579  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8580  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
8581  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8582 
8583  // y-z faces (vertical)
8584 
8585  //front
8586  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8587  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
8588  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8589 
8590  //back
8591  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8592  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
8593  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8594 
8595  // x-y faces (horizontal)
8596 
8597  //top
8598  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8599  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
8600  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8601 
8602  //bottom
8603  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8604  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
8605  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8606 
8607  }else{ //normals point outward
8608 
8609  // x-z faces (vertical)
8610 
8611  //right
8612  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8613  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
8614  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8615 
8616  //left
8617  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8618  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
8619  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8620 
8621  // y-z faces (vertical)
8622 
8623  //front
8624  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8625  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
8626  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8627 
8628  //back
8629  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8630  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
8631  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8632 
8633  // x-y faces (horizontal)
8634 
8635  //top
8636  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8637  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
8638  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8639 
8640  //bottom
8641  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8642  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
8643  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8644 
8645  }
8646 
8647  return UUID;
8648 
8649 }
8650 
8651 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox(const vec3 &center, const vec3 &size, const int3 &subdiv, const char* texturefile, bool reverse_normals ){
8652 
8653  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
8654  std::string fn = texturefile;
8655  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
8656  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addBox): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
8657  }
8658 
8659  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8660 
8661  vec3 subsize;
8662  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
8663  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
8664  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
8665 
8666  vec3 subcenter;
8667  std::vector<uint> U;
8668 
8669  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
8670 
8671  // x-z faces (vertical)
8672 
8673  //right
8674  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8675  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8676  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8677 
8678  //left
8679  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8680  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8681  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8682 
8683  // y-z faces (vertical)
8684 
8685  //front
8686  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8687  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8688  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8689 
8690  //back
8691  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8692  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8693  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8694 
8695  // x-y faces (horizontal)
8696 
8697  //top
8698  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8699  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
8700  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8701 
8702  //bottom
8703  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8704  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
8705  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8706 
8707  }else{ //normals point outward
8708 
8709  // x-z faces (vertical)
8710 
8711  //right
8712  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8713  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8714  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8715 
8716  //left
8717  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5f*size.y,0);
8718  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8719  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8720 
8721  // y-z faces (vertical)
8722 
8723  //front
8724  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8725  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8726  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8727 
8728  //back
8729  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5f*size.x,0,0);
8730  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
8731  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8732 
8733  // x-y faces (horizontal)
8734 
8735  //top
8736  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8737  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
8738  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8739 
8740  //bottom
8741  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5f*size.z);
8742  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
8743  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
8744 
8745  }
8746 
8747  return UUID;
8748 
8749 }
8750 
8751 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size ){
8752  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
8753 }
8754 
8755 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation ){
8756  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
8757 }
8758 
8759 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &color ){
8760  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
8761 }
8762 
8763 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBAcolor &color ){
8764 
8765  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
8766  UUIDs.resize(Ndivs);
8767 
8768  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
8769 
8770  float dtheta = 2.f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
8771 
8772  UUIDs.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), color );
8773  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
8774  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
8775  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->translate( center );
8776 
8777  }
8778 
8779  return UUIDs;
8780 
8781 }
8782 
8783 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &center, const vec2 &size, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const char* texture_file ){
8784 
8785  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
8786  std::string fn = texture_file;
8787  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
8788  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addDisk): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
8789  }
8790 
8791  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
8792  UUIDs.resize(Ndivs);
8793 
8794  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
8795 
8796  float dtheta = 2.f*float(M_PI)/float(Ndivs);
8797 
8798  UUIDs.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5,0.5), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(dtheta*float(i))),0.5f*(1.f+sinf(dtheta*float(i)))), make_vec2(0.5f*(1.f+cosf(dtheta*float(i+1))),0.5f*(1.f+sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)))) );
8799  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
8800  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
8801  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUIDs.at(i))->translate( center );
8802 
8803  }
8804 
8805  return UUIDs;
8806 
8807 }
8808 
8809 std::vector<uint> Context::addCone(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1 ){
8810 
8811  RGBcolor color;
8812  color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
8813 
8814  return addCone(Ndivs, node0, node1, radius0, radius1, color);
8815 
8816 }
8817 
8818 std::vector<uint> Context::addCone(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, RGBcolor &color ){
8819 
8820  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
8821  std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
8822 
8823  vec3 vec, convec;
8824  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
8825  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
8826  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
8827  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
8828  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
8829  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8830  xyz.at(j).resize(2);
8831  normal.at(j).resize(2);
8832  }
8833  vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
8834 
8835  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8836  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8837  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8838  }
8839 
8840  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
8841 
8842  if(i==0){
8843  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
8844  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
8845  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
8846  }else if(i==1){
8847  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
8848  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
8849  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
8850  }
8851 
8852  float norm;
8853  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
8854  norm=convec.magnitude();
8855  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
8856  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
8857  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
8858  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
8859  norm=nvec.magnitude();
8860  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
8861  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
8862  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
8863 
8864 
8865 
8866  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8867  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
8868  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
8869  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
8870 
8871  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
8872  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
8873  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
8874 
8875  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
8876  }
8877 
8878  }
8879 
8880  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
8881  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8882 
8883  for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
8884  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8885 
8886  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8887  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8888  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
8889 
8890  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
8891 
8892  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8893  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
8894  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8895 
8896  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color ));
8897 
8898 
8899  }
8900  }
8901 
8902  return UUID;
8903 
8904 }
8905 
8906 std::vector<uint> Context::addCone(uint Ndivs, const vec3 &node0, const vec3 &node1, float radius0, float radius1, const char* texturefile ){
8907 
8908  //texture must have type PNG or JPEG
8909  std::string fn = texturefile;
8910  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "png" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "PNG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "jpeg" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPG" && fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "JPEG" ){
8911  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (addCone): Texture file " + fn + " is not PNG or JPEG format.") );
8912  }
8913 
8914  std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes{node0, node1};
8915  std::vector<float> radii{radius0, radius1};
8916 
8917  vec3 vec, convec;
8918  std::vector<float> cfact(Ndivs+1);
8919  std::vector<float> sfact(Ndivs+1);
8920  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
8921  std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
8922  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
8923  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
8924  uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
8925  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8926  xyz.at(j).resize(2);
8927  normal.at(j).resize(2);
8928  uv.at(j).resize(2);
8929  }
8930  vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
8931 
8932  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8933  cfact[j]=cosf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8934  sfact[j]=sinf(2.f*float(M_PI)*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
8935  }
8936 
8937  for( int i=0; i<2; i++ ){ //looping over cone segments
8938 
8939  if(i==0){
8940  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
8941  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
8942  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
8943  }else if(i==1){
8944  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
8945  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
8946  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
8947  }
8948 
8949  float norm;
8950  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
8951  norm=convec.magnitude();
8952  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
8953  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
8954  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
8955  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
8956  norm=nvec.magnitude();
8957  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
8958  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
8959  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
8960 
8961  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
8962  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.x;
8963  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.y;
8964  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radii[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radii[i]*convec.z;
8965 
8966  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
8967  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
8968  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
8969 
8970  uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(2-1);
8971  uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
8972 
8973  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radii[i];
8974  }
8975 
8976  }
8977 
8978  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
8979  vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
8980  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8981 
8982  for( int i=0; i<2-1; i++ ){
8983  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
8984 
8985  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8986  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
8987  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
8988 
8989  uv0 = uv[j][i];
8990  uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
8991  uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
8992 
8993  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
8994  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
8995  }
8996 
8997  v0 = xyz[j][i];
8998  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
8999  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
9000 
9001  uv0 = uv[j][i];
9002  uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
9003  uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
9004 
9005  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
9006  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
9007  }
9008 
9009  }
9010  }
9011 
9012  return UUID;
9013 
9014 }
9015 
9016 void Context::loadPData( pugi::xml_node p, uint UUID ){
9017 
9018  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int")){
9019 
9020  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
9021  std::vector<int> datav;
9022  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
9023  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9024  int tmp;
9025  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
9026  datav.push_back(tmp);
9027  }
9028  }
9029 
9030  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
9031 
9032  if( datav.size()==1 ){
9033  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
9034  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
9035  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
9036  }
9037 
9038  }
9039 
9040  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_uint"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_uint")){
9041 
9042  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
9043  std::vector<uint> datav;
9044  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
9045  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9046  uint tmp;
9047  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
9048  datav.push_back(tmp);
9049  }
9050  }
9051 
9052  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
9053 
9054  if( datav.size()==1 ){
9055  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
9056  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
9057  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_UINT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
9058  }
9059 
9060  }

9063

9078  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){

9109  std::vector<vec2> datav;
9110  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
9111  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9112  std::vector<float> tmp;
9113  tmp.resize(2);
9114  int c = 0;
9115  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
9116  c++;
9117  if( c==2 ){
9118  datav.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
9119  c=0;
9120  }
9121  }
9122  }

9128  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){

9298 void Context::loadOData( pugi::xml_node p, uint ID ){
9299 
9300  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int")){
9301 
9302  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
9303  std::vector<int> datav;
9304  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
9305  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9306  int tmp;
9307  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
9308  datav.push_back(tmp);
9309  }
9310  }
9311 
9312  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
9313 
9314  if( datav.size()==1 ){
9315  setObjectData(ID,label,datav.front());
9316  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
9317  setObjectData(ID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
9318  }
9319 
9320  }
9321 
9322  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_uint"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_uint")){
9323

9325  std::vector<uint> datav;
9326  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
9327  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9328  uint tmp;
9329  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
9330  datav.push_back(tmp);
9331  }
9332  }
9333

9335

9337  setObjectData(ID,label,datav.front());
9338  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){

9340  }
9341 
9342  }
