9541  c=0;
9542  }
9543  }
9544  }
9545 
9546  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
9547 
9548  if( datav.size()==1 ){
9549  setObjectData(ID,label,datav.front());
9550  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
9551  setObjectData(ID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
9552  }
9553 
9554  }
9555 
9556  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_string"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_string")){
9557 
9558  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
9559  std::vector<std::string> datav;
9560  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
9561  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9562  std::string tmp;
9563  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
9564  datav.push_back(tmp);
9565  }
9566  }
9567 
9568  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
9569 
9570  if( datav.size()==1 ){
9571  setObjectData(ID,label,datav.front());
9572  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
9573  setObjectData(ID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_STRING,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
9574  }
9575 
9576  }
9577 
9578 }
9579 
9580 void Context::loadOsubPData( pugi::xml_node p, uint ID ){
9581 
9582  std::vector<uint> prim_UUIDs = getObjectPointer(ID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
9583 
9584  int u;
9585 
9586  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_int"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_int")){
9587 
9588  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9589 
9590  u=0;
9591  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9592 
9593  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9594  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9595  break;
9596  }
9597 
9598  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9599  std::vector<int> datav;
9600  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9601  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9602  int tmp;
9603  while (data_stream >> tmp) {
9604  datav.push_back(tmp);
9605  }
9606  }
9607 
9608  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9609  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9610  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9611  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9612  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_INT, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9613  }
9614  }
9615  u++;
9616  }
9617  }
9618 
9619  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_uint"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_uint")) {
9620 
9621  const char *label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9622 
9623  u=0;
9624  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9625 
9626  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9627  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9628  break;
9629  }
9630 
9631  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9632  std::vector<uint> datav;
9633  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9634  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9635  uint tmp;
9636  while (data_stream >> tmp) {
9637  datav.push_back(tmp);
9638  }
9639  }
9640 
9641  if (doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u))) {
9642  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9643  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9644  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9645  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_UINT, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9646  }
9647  }
9648  u++;
9649  }
9650  }
9651 
9652  for (pugi::xml_node prim_data = p.child("primitive_data_float"); prim_data; prim_data = prim_data.next_sibling("primitive_data_float")){
9653 
9654  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9655 
9656  u = 0;

9660  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;

9694  break;
9695  }

9699  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9700  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9701  double tmp;
9702  while (data_stream >> tmp) {
9703  datav.push_back(tmp);
9704  }
9705  }
9706 
9707  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9708  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9709  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9710  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9711  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9712  }
9713  }
9714  u++;
9715  }

9717

9719 
9720  const char* label = prim_data.attribute("label").value();
9721 
9722  u=0;
9723  for (pugi::xml_node data = prim_data.child("data"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data")) {
9724 
9725  if( u>=prim_UUIDs.size() ){
9726  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): There was a problem with reading object primitive data \"" << label << "\". The number of data values provided does not match the number of primitives contained in this object. Skipping remaining data values." << std::endl;
9727  break;
9728  }
9729 
9730  const char *data_str = data.child_value();
9731  std::vector<vec2> datav;
9732  if (strlen(data_str) > 0) {
9733  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
9734  std::vector<float> tmp;
9735  tmp.resize(2);
9736  int c = 0;
9737  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
9738  c++;
9739  if( c==2 ){
9740  datav.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
9741  c=0;
9742  }
9743  }
9744  }
9745 
9746  if( doesPrimitiveExist(prim_UUIDs.at(u)) ) {
9747  if (datav.size() == 1) {
9748  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, datav.front());
9749  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9750  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9751  }
9752  }
9753  u++;
9754  }
9755  }
9756

9977  } else if (datav.size() > 1) {
9978  setPrimitiveData(prim_UUIDs.at(u), label, HELIOS_TYPE_STRING, datav.size(), &datav[0]);
9979  }
9980  }
9981  u++;
9982  }
9983  }
9984 
9985 }
9986 
9987 std::vector<uint> Context::loadXML( const char* filename, bool quiet ){
9988 
9989  if( !quiet ) {
9990  std::cout << "Loading XML file: " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
9991  }
9992 
9993  std::string fn = filename;
9994  if(fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "xml") {
9995  throw( std::runtime_error("failed.\n File " + fn + " is not XML format.") );
9996  }
9997 
9998  XMLfiles.emplace_back( filename );
9999 
10000  uint ID;
10001  std::vector<uint> UUID;
10002 
10003  // Using "pugixml" parser. See pugixml.org
10004  pugi::xml_document xmldoc;
10005 
10006  //load file
10007  pugi::xml_parse_result result = xmldoc.load_file(filename);
10008 
10009  //error checking
10010  if (!result){
10011  throw( std::runtime_error("failed.\n XML [" + std::string(filename) + "] parsed with errors, attr value: [" + xmldoc.child("node").attribute("attr").value() + "]\nError description: " + result.description() + "\nError offset: " + std::to_string(result.offset) + " (error at [..." + (filename + result.offset) + "]\n"));
10012  }
10013 
10014  pugi::xml_node helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
10015 
10016  if( helios.empty() ){
10017  if( !quiet ) {
10018  std::cout << "failed." << std::endl;
10019  }
10020  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): XML file must have tag '<helios> ... </helios>' bounding all other tags."));
10021  }
10022 
10023  //if primitives are added that belong to an object, store there UUIDs here so that we can make sure their UUIDs are consistent
10024  std::map<uint,std::vector<uint> > object_prim_UUIDs;
10025 
10026  //-------------- TIME/DATE ---------------//
10027 
10028  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("date"); p; p = p.next_sibling("date")){
10029 
10030  pugi::xml_node year_node = p.child("year");
10031  const char* year_str = year_node.child_value();
10032  int year = std::stoi( year_str );
10033 
10034  pugi::xml_node month_node = p.child("month");
10035  const char* month_str = month_node.child_value();
10036  int month = std::stoi( month_str );
10037 
10038  pugi::xml_node day_node = p.child("day");
10039  const char* day_str = day_node.child_value();
10040  int day = std::stoi( day_str );
10041 
10042  setDate( day, month, year );
10043 
10044  }
10045 
10046  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("time"); p; p = p.next_sibling("time")){
10047 
10048  pugi::xml_node hour_node = p.child("hour");
10049  const char* hour_str = hour_node.child_value();
10050  int hour = std::stoi( hour_str );
10051 
10052  pugi::xml_node minute_node = p.child("minute");
10053  const char* minute_str = minute_node.child_value();
10054  int minute = std::stoi( minute_str );
10055 
10056  pugi::xml_node second_node = p.child("second");
10057  const char* second_str = second_node.child_value();
10058  int second = std::stoi( second_str );
10059 
10060  setTime( second, minute, hour );
10061 
10062  }
10063 
10064  //-------------- PATCHES ---------------//
10065  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("patch"); p; p = p.next_sibling("patch")){
10066 
10067  // * Patch Object ID * //
10068  uint objID = 0;
10069  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10070  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10071  if( !oid.empty() ){
10072  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10073  }
10074 
10075  // * Patch Transformation Matrix * //
10076  float transform[16];
10077  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10078 
10079  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10080  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
10081  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10082  }else{
10083  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10084  float tmp;
10085  int i=0;
10086  while( stream >> tmp ){
10087  transform[i] = tmp;
10088  i++;
10089  }
10090  if( i!=16 ){
10091  if( !quiet ) {
10092  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10093  }
10094  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10095  }
10096  }
10097 
10098  // * Patch Texture * //
10099  std::string texture_file;
10100  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10101  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10102  if( texfile.empty() ){
10103  texture_file = "none";
10104  }else{
10105  texture_file = texfile;
10106  }
10107 
10108  // * Patch Texture (u,v) Coordinates * //
10109  std::vector<vec2> uv;
10110  pugi::xml_node uv_node = p.child("textureUV");
10111  const char* texUV = uv_node.child_value();
10112  if( strlen(texUV)>0 ){
10113  std::istringstream uv_stream(texUV);
10114  std::vector<float> tmp;
10115  tmp.resize(2);
10116  int c = 0;
10117  while( uv_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10118  c++;
10119  if( c==2 ){
10120  uv.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
10121  c=0;
10122  }
10123  }
10124  if( c!=0 ){
10125  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain an even number of elements. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10126  uv.resize(0);
10127  }
10128  if( uv.size()!=4 ){
10129  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain four pairs of (u,v) coordinates. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10130  uv.resize(0);
10131  }
10132  }
10133 
10134  // * Patch Diffuse Colors * //
10135  RGBAcolor color;
10136  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10137 
10138  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
10139  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
10140  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
10141  }else{
10142  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10143  }
10144 
10145  // * Add the Patch * //
10146  if( strcmp(texture_file.c_str(),"none")==0 ){
10147  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color );
10148  }else{
10149  if( uv.empty() ){
10150  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture_file.c_str() );
10151  }else{
10152  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture_file.c_str(), 0.5*(uv.at(2)+uv.at(0)), uv.at(2)-uv.at(0) );
10153  }
10154  }
10155  getPrimitivePointer_private(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10156 
10157  if( objID>0 ) {
10158  object_prim_UUIDs[objID].push_back(ID);
10159  }
10160 
10161  UUID.push_back(ID);
10162 
10163  // * Primitive Data * //
10164 
10165  loadPData( p, ID );
10166 
10167  }//end patches
10168 
10169  //-------------- TRIANGLES ---------------//
10170 
10171  //looping over any triangles specified in XML file
10172  for (pugi::xml_node tri = helios.child("triangle"); tri; tri = tri.next_sibling("triangle")){
10173 
10174  // * Triangle Object ID * //
10175  uint objID = 0;
10176  pugi::xml_node objID_node = tri.child("objID");
10177  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10178  if( !oid.empty() ){
10179  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10180  }
10181 
10182  // * Triangle Transformation Matrix * //
10183  float transform[16];
10184  pugi::xml_node transform_node = tri.child("transform");
10185 
10186  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10187  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
10188  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10189  }else{
10190  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10191  float tmp;
10192  int i=0;
10193  while( stream >> tmp ){
10194  transform[i] = tmp;
10195  i++;
10196  }
10197  if( i!=16 ){
10198  if( !quiet ) {
10199  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10200  }
10201  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10202  }
10203  }
10204 
10205  // * Triangle Texture * //
10206  std::string texture_file;
10207  pugi::xml_node texture_node = tri.child("texture");
10208  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10209  if( texfile.empty() ){
10210  texture_file = "none";
10211  }else{
10212  texture_file = texfile;
10213  }
10214 
10215  // * Triangle Texture (u,v) Coordinates * //
10216  std::vector<vec2> uv;
10217  pugi::xml_node uv_node = tri.child("textureUV");
10218  const char* texUV = uv_node.child_value();
10219  if( strlen(texUV)>0 ){
10220  std::istringstream uv_stream(texUV);
10221  std::vector<float> tmp;
10222  tmp.resize(2);
10223  int c = 0;
10224  while( uv_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10225  c++;
10226  if( c==2 ){
10227  uv.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
10228  c=0;
10229  }
10230  }
10231  if( c!=0 ){
10232  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain an even number of elements. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10233  uv.resize(0);
10234  }
10235  if( uv.size()!=3 ){
10236  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for triangle does not contain three pairs of (u,v) coordinates. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10237  uv.resize(0);
10238  }
10239  }
10240 
10241  // * Triangle Diffuse Colors * //
10242  RGBAcolor color;
10243  pugi::xml_node color_node = tri.child("color");
10244 
10245  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
10246  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
10247  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
10248  }else{
10249  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10250  }
10251 
10252  std::vector<vec3> vert_pos;
10253  vert_pos.resize(3);
10254  vert_pos.at(0) = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
10255  vert_pos.at(1) = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
10256  vert_pos.at(2) = make_vec3( 1.f, 1.f, 0.f);
10257 
10258  // * Add the Triangle * //
10259  if( strcmp(texture_file.c_str(),"none")==0 || uv.empty() ){
10260  ID = addTriangle( vert_pos.at(0), vert_pos.at(1), vert_pos.at(2), color );
10261  }else{
10262  ID = addTriangle( vert_pos.at(0), vert_pos.at(1), vert_pos.at(2), texture_file.c_str(), uv.at(0), uv.at(1), uv.at(2) );
10263  }
10264  getPrimitivePointer_private(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10265 
10266  if( objID>0 ) {
10267  object_prim_UUIDs[objID].push_back(ID);
10268  }
10269 
10270  UUID.push_back(ID);
10271 
10272  // * Primitive Data * //
10273 
10274  loadPData( tri, ID );
10275 
10276  }
10277 
10278  //-------------- VOXELS ---------------//
10279  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("voxel"); p; p = p.next_sibling("voxel")){
10280 
10281  // * Voxel Object ID * //
10282  uint objID = 0;
10283  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10284  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10285  if( !oid.empty() ){
10286  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10287  }
10288 
10289  // * Voxel Transformation Matrix * //
10290  float transform[16];
10291  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10292 
10293  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10294  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
10295  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10296  }else{
10297  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10298  float tmp;
10299  int i=0;
10300  while( stream >> tmp ){
10301  transform[i] = tmp;
10302  i++;
10303  }
10304  if( i!=16 ){
10305  if( !quiet ) {
10306  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10307  }
10308  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10309  }
10310  }
10311 
10312  // * Voxel Diffuse Colors * //
10313  RGBAcolor color;
10314  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10315 
10316  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
10317  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
10318  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
10319  }else{
10320  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10321  }
10322 
10323  // * Add the Voxel * //
10324  ID = addVoxel( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(0,0,0), 0, color );
10325  getPrimitivePointer_private(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10326 
10327  if( objID>0 ) {
10328  object_prim_UUIDs[objID].push_back(ID);
10329  }
10330 
10331  UUID.push_back(ID);
10332 
10333  // * Primitive Data * //
10334 
10335  loadPData( p, ID );
10336 
10337  }
10338 
10339  //-------------- COMPOUND OBJECTS ---------------//
10340 
10341  //-------------- TILES ---------------//
10342  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("tile"); p; p = p.next_sibling("tile")) {
10343 
10344  // * Tile Object ID * //
10345  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10346  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10347  uint objID = 0;
10348  if( !oid.empty() ){
10349  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10350  }
10351 
10352  // * Tile Transformation Matrix * //
10353  float transform[16];
10354  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10355 
10356  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10357  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10358  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10359  } else {
10360  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10361  float tmp;
10362  int i = 0;
10363  while (stream >> tmp) {
10364  transform[i] = tmp;
10365  i++;
10366  }
10367  if (i != 16) {
10368  if( !quiet ) {
10369  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10370  }
10371  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10372  }
10373  }
10374 
10375  // * Tile Texture * //
10376  std::string texture_file;
10377  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10378  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10379  if (texfile.empty()) {
10380  texture_file = "none";
10381  } else {
10382  texture_file = texfile;
10383  }
10384 
10385  // * Tile Texture (u,v) Coordinates * //
10386  std::vector<vec2> uv;
10387  pugi::xml_node uv_node = p.child("textureUV");
10388  const char *texUV = uv_node.child_value();
10389  if (strlen(texUV) > 0) {
10390  std::istringstream uv_stream(texUV);
10391  std::vector<float> tmp;
10392  tmp.resize(2);
10393  int c = 0;
10394  while (uv_stream >> tmp.at(c)) {
10395  c++;
10396  if (c == 2) {
10397  uv.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0), tmp.at(1)));
10398  c = 0;
10399  }
10400  }
10401  if (c != 0) {
10402  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for tile does not contain an even number of elements. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10403  uv.resize(0);
10404  }
10405  if (uv.size() != 4) {
10406  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for tile does not contain four pairs of (u,v) coordinates. Skipping..." << std::endl;
10407  uv.resize(0);
10408  }
10409  }
10410 
10411  // * Tile Diffuse Colors * //
10412  RGBAcolor color;
10413  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10414 
10415  const char *color_str = color_node.child_value();
10416  if ( strlen(color_str) != 0) {
10417  color = string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10418  }
10419 
10420  // * Tile Subdivisions * //
10421  int2 subdiv;
10422  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10423  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10424  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10425  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for tile was not provided. Assuming 1x1." << std::endl;
10426  subdiv = make_int2(1,1);
10427  } else {
10428  subdiv = string2int2(subdiv_str);
10429  }
10430 
10431  //Create a dummy patch in order to get the center, size, and rotation based on transformation matrix
10432  Patch patch( make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,0), 0 );
10433  patch.setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10434 
10435  // * Add the Tile * //
10436  if (strcmp(texture_file.c_str(), "none") == 0) {
10437  if( strlen(color_str) == 0 ){
10438  ID = addTileObject(patch.getCenter(), patch.getSize(), cart2sphere(patch.getNormal()), subdiv );
10439  }else {
10440  ID = addTileObject(patch.getCenter(), patch.getSize(), cart2sphere(patch.getNormal()), subdiv, make_RGBcolor(color.r, color.g, color.b));
10441  }
10442  } else {
10443  ID = addTileObject(patch.getCenter(), patch.getSize(), cart2sphere(patch.getNormal()), subdiv, texture_file.c_str());
10444  }
10445 
10446  //if primitives exist that were assigned to this object, delete all primitives that were just created
10447  if( objID>0 && object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID) != object_prim_UUIDs.end() ) {
10448  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID)); // \todo This is fairly inefficient, it would be nice to have a way to do this without having to create and delete a bunch of primitives.
10449  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
10450  }
10451 
10452  // * Tile Sub-Patch Data * //
10453 
10454  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
10455 
10456  // * Tile Object Data * //
10457 
10458  loadOData(p,ID);
10459 
10460 // UUID.push_back(ID);
10461 
10462  }//end tiles
10463 
10464  //-------------- SPHERES ---------------//
10465  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("sphere"); p; p = p.next_sibling("sphere")) {
10466 
10467  // * Sphere Object ID * //
10468  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10469  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10470  uint objID = 0;
10471  if( !oid.empty() ){
10472  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10473  }
10474 
10475  // * Sphere Transformation Matrix * //
10476  float transform[16];
10477  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10478 
10479  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10480  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10481  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10482  } else {
10483  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10484  float tmp;
10485  int i = 0;
10486  while (stream >> tmp) {
10487  transform[i] = tmp;
10488  i++;
10489  }
10490  if (i != 16) {
10491  if( !quiet ) {
10492  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10493  }
10494  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10495  }
10496  }
10497 
10498  // * Sphere Texture * //
10499  std::string texture_file;
10500  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10501  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10502  if (texfile.empty()) {
10503  texture_file = "none";
10504  } else {
10505  texture_file = texfile;
10506  }
10507 
10508  // * Sphere Diffuse Colors * //
10509  RGBAcolor color;
10510  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10511 
10512  const char *color_str = color_node.child_value();
10513  if ( strlen(color_str) != 0) {
10514  color = string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10515  }
10516 
10517  // * Sphere Subdivisions * //
10518  uint subdiv;
10519  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10520  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10521  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10522  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for sphere was not provided. Assuming 5." << std::endl;
10523  subdiv = 5;
10524  } else {
10525  subdiv = std::stoi(subdiv_str);
10526  }
10527 
10528  //Create a dummy sphere in order to get the center and radius based on transformation matrix
10529  std::vector<uint> empty;
10530  Sphere sphere( 0, empty, 3, "", this );
10531  sphere.setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10532 
10533  // * Add the Sphere * //
10534  if (strcmp(texture_file.c_str(), "none") == 0) {
10535  if( strlen(color_str) == 0 ){
10536  ID = addSphereObject( subdiv, sphere.getCenter(), sphere.getRadius() );
10537  }else {
10538  ID = addSphereObject( subdiv, sphere.getCenter(), sphere.getRadius(), make_RGBcolor(color.r, color.g, color.b) );
10539  }
10540  } else {
10541  ID = addSphereObject( subdiv, sphere.getCenter(), sphere.getRadius(), texture_file.c_str());
10542  }
10543 
10544  //if primitives exist that were assigned to this object, delete all primitives that were just created
10545  if( objID>0 && object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID) != object_prim_UUIDs.end() ) {
10546  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID));
10547  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
10548  }
10549 
10550  // * Sphere Sub-Triangle Data * //
10551 
10552  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
10553 
10554  // * Sphere Object Data * //
10555 
10556  loadOData(p,ID);
10557 
10558  }//end spheres
10559 
10560  //-------------- TUBES ---------------//
10561  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("tube"); p; p = p.next_sibling("tube")) {
10562 
10563  // * Tube Object ID * //
10564  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10565  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10566  uint objID = 0;
10567  if( !oid.empty() ){
10568  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10569  }
10570 
10571  // * Tube Transformation Matrix * //
10572  float transform[16];
10573  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10574 
10575  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10576  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10577  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10578  } else {
10579  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10580  float tmp;
10581  int i = 0;
10582  while (stream >> tmp) {
10583  transform[i] = tmp;
10584  i++;
10585  }
10586  if (i != 16) {
10587  if( !quiet ) {
10588  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10589  }
10590  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10591  }
10592  }
10593 
10594  // * Tube Texture * //
10595  std::string texture_file;
10596  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10597  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10598  if (texfile.empty()) {
10599  texture_file = "none";
10600  } else {
10601  texture_file = texfile;
10602  }
10603 
10604  // * Tube Subdivisions * //
10605  uint subdiv;
10606  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10607  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10608  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10609  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for tube was not provided. Assuming 5." << std::endl;
10610  subdiv = 5;
10611  } else {
10612  subdiv = std::stoi(subdiv_str);
10613  }
10614 
10615  // * Tube Nodes * //
10616 
10617  pugi::xml_node nodes_node = p.child("nodes");
10618  const char* nodes_str = nodes_node.child_value();
10619 
10620  std::vector<vec3> nodes;
10621  if (strlen(nodes_str) > 0) {
10622  std::istringstream data_stream(nodes_str);
10623  std::vector<float> tmp;
10624  tmp.resize(3);
10625  int c = 0;
10626  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10627  c++;
10628  if( c==3 ){
10629  nodes.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
10630  c=0;
10631  }
10632  }
10633  }
10634 
10635  // * Tube Radius * //
10636 
10637  pugi::xml_node radii_node = p.child("radius");
10638  const char* radii_str = radii_node.child_value();
10639 
10640  std::vector<float> radii;
10641  if (strlen(radii_str) > 0) {
10642  std::istringstream data_stream(radii_str);
10643  float tmp;
10644  int c = 0;
10645  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
10646  radii.push_back(tmp);
10647  }
10648  }
10649 
10650  // * Tube Color * //
10651 
10652  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10653  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
10654 
10655  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
10656  if (strlen(color_str) > 0) {
10657  std::istringstream data_stream(color_str);
10658  std::vector<float> tmp;
10659  tmp.resize(3);
10660  int c = 0;
10661  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10662  c++;
10663  if( c==3 ){
10664  colors.push_back(make_RGBcolor(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
10665  c=0;
10666  }
10667  }
10668  }
10669 
10670  // * Add the Tube * //
10671  if( texture_file == "none" ) {
10672  ID = addTubeObject(subdiv, nodes, radii, colors);
10673  }else{
10674  ID = addTubeObject(subdiv, nodes, radii, texture_file.c_str());
10675  }
10676 
10677  getObjectPointer(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10678 
10679  //if primitives exist that were assigned to this object, delete all primitives that were just created
10680  if( objID>0 && object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID) != object_prim_UUIDs.end() ) {
10681  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID));
10682  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
10683  }
10684 
10685  // * Tube Sub-Triangle Data * //
10686 
10687  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
10688 
10689  // * tube Object Data * //
10690 
10691  loadOData(p,ID);
10692 
10693  }//end tubes
10694 
10695  //-------------- BOXES ---------------//
10696  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("box"); p; p = p.next_sibling("box")) {
10697 
10698  // * Box Object ID * //
10699  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10700  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10701  uint objID = 0;
10702  if( !oid.empty() ){
10703  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10704  }
10705 
10706  // * Box Transformation Matrix * //
10707  float transform[16];
10708  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10709 
10710  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10711  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10712  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10713  } else {
10714  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10715  float tmp;
10716  int i = 0;
10717  while (stream >> tmp) {
10718  transform[i] = tmp;
10719  i++;
10720  }
10721  if (i != 16) {
10722  if( !quiet ) {
10723  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10724  }
10725  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10726  }
10727  }
10728 
10729  // * Box Texture * //
10730  std::string texture_file;
10731  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10732  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10733  if (texfile.empty()) {
10734  texture_file = "none";
10735  } else {
10736  texture_file = texfile;
10737  }
10738 
10739  // * Box Diffuse Colors * //
10740  RGBAcolor color;
10741  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10742 
10743  const char *color_str = color_node.child_value();
10744  if ( strlen(color_str) != 0) {
10745  color = string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10746  }
10747 
10748  // * Box Subdivisions * //
10749  int3 subdiv;
10750  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10751  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10752  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10753  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for box was not provided. Assuming 1." << std::endl;
10754  subdiv = make_int3(1,1,1);
10755  } else {
10756  subdiv = string2int3(subdiv_str);
10757  }
10758 
10759  //Create a dummy box in order to get the center and size based on transformation matrix
10760  std::vector<uint> empty;
10761  Box box( 0, empty, make_int3(1,1,1), "", this );
10762  box.setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10763 
10764  // * Add the box * //
10765  if (strcmp(texture_file.c_str(), "none") == 0) {
10766  if( strlen(color_str) == 0 ){
10767  ID = addBoxObject( box.getCenter(), box.getSize(), subdiv );
10768  }else {
10769  ID = addBoxObject( box.getCenter(), box.getSize(), subdiv, make_RGBcolor(color.r, color.g, color.b) );
10770  }
10771  } else {
10772  ID = addBoxObject( box.getCenter(), box.getSize(), subdiv, texture_file.c_str());
10773  }
10774 
10775  //if primitives exist that were assigned to this object, delete all primitives that were just created
10776  if( objID>0 && object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID) != object_prim_UUIDs.end() ) {
10777  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID));
10778  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
10779  }
10780 
10781  // * Box Sub-Patch Data * //
10782 
10783  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
10784 
10785  // * Box Object Data * //
10786 
10787  loadOData(p,ID);
10788 
10789  }//end boxes
10790 
10791  //-------------- DISKS ---------------//
10792  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("disk"); p; p = p.next_sibling("disk")) {
10793 
10794  // * Disk Object ID * //
10795  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10796  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10797  uint objID = 0;
10798  if( !oid.empty() ){
10799  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10800  }
10801 
10802  // * Disk Transformation Matrix * //
10803  float transform[16];
10804  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10805 
10806  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10807  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10808  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10809  } else {
10810  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10811  float tmp;
10812  int i = 0;
10813  while (stream >> tmp) {
10814  transform[i] = tmp;
10815  i++;
10816  }
10817  if (i != 16) {
10818  if( !quiet ) {
10819  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10820  }
10821  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10822  }
10823  }
10824 
10825  // * Disk Texture * //
10826  std::string texture_file;
10827  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10828  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10829  if (texfile.empty()) {
10830  texture_file = "none";
10831  } else {
10832  texture_file = texfile;
10833  }
10834 
10835  // * Disk Diffuse Colors * //
10836  RGBAcolor color;
10837  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10838 
10839  const char *color_str = color_node.child_value();
10840  if ( strlen(color_str) != 0) {
10841  color = string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10842  }
10843 
10844  // * Disk Subdivisions * //
10845  uint subdiv;
10846  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10847  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10848  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10849  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for disk was not provided. Assuming 5." << std::endl;
10850  subdiv = 5;
10851  } else {
10852  subdiv = std::stoi(subdiv_str);
10853  }
10854 
10855  //Create a dummy disk in order to get the center and size based on transformation matrix
10856  std::vector<uint> empty;
10857  Disk disk( 0, empty, 1, "", this );
10858  disk.setTransformationMatrix(transform);
10859 
10860  // * Add the disk * //
10861  if (strcmp(texture_file.c_str(), "none") == 0) {
10862  if( strlen(color_str) == 0 ){
10863  ID = addDiskObject( subdiv, disk.getCenter(), disk.getSize() );
10864  }else {
10865  ID = addDiskObject( subdiv, disk.getCenter(), disk.getSize(), nullrotation, make_RGBcolor(color.r, color.g, color.b) );
10866  }
10867  } else {
10868  ID = addDiskObject( subdiv, disk.getCenter(), disk.getSize(), nullrotation, texture_file.c_str());
10869  }
10870 
10871  //if primitives exist that were assigned to this object, delete all primitives that were just created
10872  if( objID>0 && object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID) != object_prim_UUIDs.end() ) {
10873  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID));
10874  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
10875  }
10876 
10877  // * Disk Sub-Triangle Data * //
10878 
10879  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
10880 
10881  // * Disk Object Data * //
10882 
10883  loadOData(p,ID);
10884 
10885  }//end disks
10886 
10887  //-------------- CONES ---------------//
10888  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("cone"); p; p = p.next_sibling("cone")) {
10889 
10890  // * Cone Object ID * //
10891  pugi::xml_node objID_node = p.child("objID");
10892  std::string oid = deblank(objID_node.child_value());
10893  uint objID = 0;
10894  if( !oid.empty() ){
10895  objID = std::stoi( oid );
10896  }
10897 
10898  // * Cone Transformation Matrix * //
10899  float transform[16];
10900  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
10901 
10902  const char *transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
10903  if (strlen(transform_str) == 0) {
10904  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10905  } else {
10906  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
10907  float tmp;
10908  int i = 0;
10909  while (stream >> tmp) {
10910  transform[i] = tmp;
10911  i++;
10912  }
10913  if (i != 16) {
10914  if( !quiet ) {
10915  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
10916  }
10917  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
10918  }
10919  }
10920 
10921  // * Cone Texture * //
10922  std::string texture_file;
10923  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
10924  std::string texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
10925  if (texfile.empty()) {
10926  texture_file = "none";
10927  } else {
10928  texture_file = texfile;
10929  }
10930 
10931  // * Cone Diffuse Colors * //
10932  RGBAcolor color;
10933  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
10934 
10935  const char *color_str = color_node.child_value();
10936  if ( strlen(color_str) != 0) {
10937  color = string2RGBcolor(color_str);
10938  }
10939 
10940  // * Cone Subdivisions * //
10941  uint subdiv;
10942  pugi::xml_node subdiv_node = p.child("subdivisions");
10943  const char* subdiv_str = subdiv_node.child_value();
10944  if (strlen(subdiv_str) == 0) {
10945  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): Number of subdivisions for cone was not provided. Assuming 5." << std::endl;
10946  subdiv = 5;
10947  } else {
10948  subdiv = std::stoi(subdiv_str);
10949  }
10950 
10951  // * Cone Nodes * //
10952 
10953  pugi::xml_node nodes_node = p.child("nodes");
10954  const char* nodes_str = nodes_node.child_value();
10955 
10956  std::vector<vec3> nodes;
10957  if (strlen(nodes_str) > 0) {
10958  std::istringstream data_stream(nodes_str);
10959  std::vector<float> tmp;
10960  tmp.resize(3);
10961  int c = 0;
10962  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10963  c++;
10964  if( c==3 ){
10965  nodes.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
10966  break;
10967  }
10968  }
10969  if( c!=3 ){
10970  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Loading of cone failed. Cone end nodes must be specified as pairs of 3 x,y,z coordinates."));
10971  }
10972  c = 0;
10973  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
10974  c++;
10975  if( c==3 ){
10976  nodes.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
10977  break;
10978  }
10979  }
10980  if( c!=3 ){
10981  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Loading of cone failed. Cone end nodes must be specified as pairs of 3 x,y,z coordinates."));
10982  }
10983  }
10984 
10985  // * Cone Radius * //
10986 
10987  pugi::xml_node radii_node = p.child("radius");
10988  const char* radii_str = radii_node.child_value();
10989 
10990  std::vector<float> radii(2);
10991  if (strlen(radii_str) > 0) {
10992  std::istringstream data_stream(radii_str);
10993  data_stream >> radii.at(0);
10994  data_stream >> radii.at(1);
10995  }
10996 
10997  // * Add the Cone * //
10998  if( texture_file == "none" ){
10999  ID = addConeObject( subdiv, nodes.at(0), nodes.at(1), radii.at(0), radii.at(1), make_RGBcolor(color.r,color.g,color.b));
11000  }else {
11001  ID = addConeObject(subdiv, nodes.at(0), nodes.at(1), radii.at(0), radii.at(1), texture_file.c_str());
11002  }
11003 
11004  getObjectPointer(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
11005 
11006  //if primitives exist that were assigned to this object, delete all primitives that were just created
11007  if( objID>0 && object_prim_UUIDs.find(objID) != object_prim_UUIDs.end() ) {
11008  deletePrimitive(getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ID));
11009  getObjectPointer(ID)->setPrimitiveUUIDs(object_prim_UUIDs.at(objID));
11010  }
11011 
11012  // * Cone Sub-Triangle Data * //
11013 
11014  loadOsubPData(p,ID);
11015 
11016  // * Cone Object Data * //
11017 
11018  loadOData(p,ID);
11019 
11020  }//end cones
11021 
11022  //-------------- GLOBAL DATA ---------------//
11023 
11024  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int")){
11025 
11026  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11027  std::vector<int> datav;
11028  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11029  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11030  int tmp;
11031  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
11032  datav.push_back(tmp);
11033  }
11034  }
11035 
11036  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11037 
11038  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11039  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11040  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11041  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11042  }
11043 
11044  }
11045 
11046  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_uint"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_uint")){
11047 
11048  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11049  std::vector<uint> datav;
11050  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11051  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11052  uint tmp;
11053  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
11054  datav.push_back(tmp);
11055  }
11056  }
11057 
11058  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11059 
11060  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11061  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11062  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11063  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_UINT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11064  }
11065 
11066  }
11067 
11068  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_float"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_float")){
11069 
11070  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11071  std::vector<float> datav;
11072  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11073  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11074  float tmp;
11075  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
11076  datav.push_back(tmp);
11077  }
11078  }
11079 
11080  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11081 
11082  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11083  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11084  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11085  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11086  }
11087 
11088  }
11089 
11090  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_double"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_double")){
11091 
11092  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11093  std::vector<double> datav;
11094  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11095  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11096  double tmp;
11097  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
11098  datav.push_back(tmp);
11099  }
11100  }
11101 
11102  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11103 
11104  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11105  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11106  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11107  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11108  }
11109 
11110  }
11111 
11112  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_vec2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_vec2")){
11113 
11114  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11115  std::vector<vec2> datav;
11116  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11117  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11118  std::vector<float> tmp;
11119  tmp.resize(2);
11120  int c = 0;
11121  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
11122  c++;
11123  if( c==2 ){
11124  datav.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
11125  c=0;
11126  }
11127  }
11128  }
11129 
11130  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11131 
11132  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11133  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11134  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11135  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11136  }
11137 
11138  }
11139 
11140  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_vec3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_vec3")){
11141 
11142  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11143  std::vector<vec3> datav;
11144  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11145  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11146  std::vector<float> tmp;
11147  tmp.resize(3);
11148  int c = 0;
11149  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
11150  c++;
11151  if( c==3 ){
11152  datav.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
11153  c=0;
11154  }
11155  }
11156  }
11157 
11158  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
11159 
11160  if( datav.size()==1 ){
11161  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11162  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11163  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11164  }
11165 
11166  }
11167

11172  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){

11175  tmp.resize(4);

11177  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
11178  c++;
11179  if( c==4 ){
11180  datav.push_back(make_vec4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
11181  c=0;
11182  }
11183  }
11184  }

11200  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){

11235  if( c==3 ){
11236  datav.push_back(make_int3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
11237  c=0;
11238  }

11253 
11254  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11255  std::vector<int4> datav;
11256  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11257  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11258  std::vector<int> tmp;
11259  tmp.resize(4);
11260  int c = 0;
11261  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
11262  c++;
11263  if( c==4 ){
11264  datav.push_back(make_int4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
11265  c=0;

11268  }

11274  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11275  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11276  }
11277 
11278  }
11279 
11280  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_string"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_string")){
11281 
11282  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
11283  std::vector<std::string> datav;
11284  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
11285  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
11286  std::string tmp;
11287  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
11288  datav.push_back(tmp);
11289  }
11290  }
11291

11293
