11295  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
11296  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
11297  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_STRING,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
11298  }
11299 
11300  }
11301 
11302  //-------------- TIMESERIES DATA ---------------//
11303  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("timeseries"); p; p = p.next_sibling("timeseries")){
11304 
11305  const char* label = p.attribute("label").value();
11306 
11307  for (pugi::xml_node d = p.child("datapoint"); d; d = d.next_sibling("datapoint")){
11308 
11309  Time time;
11310  pugi::xml_node time_node = d.child("time");
11311  const char* time_str = time_node.child_value();
11312  if( strlen(time_str)>0 ){
11313  int3 time_ = string2int3(time_str);
11314  if( time_.x<0 || time_.x>23 ){
11315  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid hour of " + std::to_string(time_.x) + " given in timeseries. Hour must be positive and not greater than 23."));
11316  }else if( time_.y<0 || time_.y>59 ){
11317  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid minute of " + std::to_string(time_.y) + " given in timeseries. Minute must be positive and not greater than 59."));
11318  }else if( time_.z<0 || time_.z>59 ){
11319  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid second of " + std::to_string(time_.z) + " given in timeseries. Second must be positive and not greater than 59."));
11320  }
11321  time = make_Time(time_.x, time_.y,time_.z);
11322  }else{
11323  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): No time was specified for timeseries datapoint."));
11324  }
11325 
11326  Date date;
11327  bool date_flag=false;
11328 
11329  pugi::xml_node date_node = d.child("date");
11330  const char* date_str = date_node.child_value();
11331  if( strlen(date_str)>0 ){
11332  int3 date_ = string2int3(date_str);
11333  if( date_.x<1 || date_.x>31 ){
11334  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid day of month " + std::to_string(date_.x) + " given in timeseries. Day must be greater than zero and not greater than 31."));
11335  }else if( date_.y<1 || date_.y>12 ){
11336  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid month of " + std::to_string(date_.y) + " given in timeseries. Month must be greater than zero and not greater than 12."));
11337  }else if( date_.z<1000 || date_.z>10000 ){
11338  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid year of " + std::to_string(date_.z) + " given in timeseries. Year should be in YYYY format."));
11339  }
11340  date = make_Date(date_.x, date_.y, date_.z );
11341  date_flag=true;
11342  }
11343 
11344  pugi::xml_node Jdate_node = d.child("dateJulian");
11345  const char* Jdate_str = Jdate_node.child_value();
11346  if( strlen(Jdate_str)>0 ){
11347  int2 date_ = string2int2(Jdate_str);
11348  if( date_.x<1 || date_.x>366 ){
11349  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid Julian day of year " + std::to_string(date_.x) + " given in timeseries. Julian day must be greater than zero and not greater than 366."));
11350  }else if( date_.y<1000 || date_.y>10000 ){
11351  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): Invalid year of " + std::to_string(date_.y) + " given in timeseries. Year should be in YYYY format."));
11352  }
11353  date = Julian2Calendar( date_.x, date_.y );
11354  date_flag=true;
11355  }
11356 
11357  if( !date_flag ){
11358  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): No date was specified for timeseries datapoint."));
11359  }
11360 
11361  float value;
11362  pugi::xml_node value_node = d.child("value");
11363  const char* value_str = value_node.child_value();
11364  if( strlen(value_str)>0 ){
11365  value = std::stof(value_str);
11366  }else{
11367  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadXML): No value was specified for timeseries datapoint."));
11368  }
11369 
11370  addTimeseriesData(label,value,date,time);
11371 
11372  }
11373 
11374  }
11375 
11376  if( !quiet ) {
11377  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
11378  }
11379 
11380  return UUID;
11381 
11382 }
11383 
11384 std::vector<std::string> Context::getLoadedXMLFiles() {
11385  return XMLfiles;
11386 }
11387 
11388 void Context::writeDataToXMLstream( const char* data_group, const std::vector<std::string> &data_labels, void* ptr, std::ofstream &outfile ) const{
11389 
11390  for(const auto& label : data_labels ) {
11391 
11392  size_t dsize;
11393  HeliosDataType dtype;
11394 
11395  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11396  dsize = ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveDataSize(label.c_str());
11397  dtype = ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveDataType(label.c_str());
11398  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11399  dsize = ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectDataSize(label.c_str());
11400  dtype = ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectDataType(label.c_str());
11401  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "global") == 0) {
11402  dsize = getGlobalDataSize(label.c_str());
11403  dtype = getGlobalDataType(label.c_str());
11404  } else {
11405  throw( std::runtime_error( "ERROR (writeDataToXMLstream): unknown data group argument of " + std::string(data_group) + ". Must be one of primitive, object, or global."));
11406  }
11407 
11408  if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_UINT) {
11409  outfile << "\t<data_uint label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11410  std::vector<uint> data;
11411  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11412  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11413  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11414  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11415  } else {
11416  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11417  }
11418  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11419  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
11420  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11421  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11422  }
11423  }
11424  outfile << "</data_uint>" << std::endl;
11425  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_INT) {
11426  outfile << "\t<data_int label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11427  std::vector<int> data;
11428  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11429  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11430  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11431  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11432  } else {
11433  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11434  }
11435  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11436  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
11437  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11438  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11439  }
11440  }
11441  outfile << "</data_int>" << std::endl;
11442  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT) {
11443  outfile << "\t<data_float label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11444  std::vector<float> data;
11445  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11446  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11447  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11448  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11449  } else {
11450  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11451  }
11452  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11453  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
11454  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11455  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11456  }
11457  }
11458  outfile << "</data_float>" << std::endl;
11459  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE) {
11460  outfile << "\t<data_double label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11461  std::vector<double> data;
11462  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11463  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11464  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11465  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11466  } else {
11467  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11468  }
11469  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11470  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
11471  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11472  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11473  }
11474  }
11475  outfile << "</data_double>" << std::endl;
11476  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2) {
11477  outfile << "\t<data_vec2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11478  std::vector<vec2> data;
11479  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11480  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11481  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11482  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11483  } else {
11484  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11485  }
11486  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11487  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << std::flush;
11488  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11489  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11490  }
11491  }
11492  outfile << "</data_vec2>" << std::endl;
11493  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3) {
11494  outfile << "\t<data_vec3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11495  std::vector<vec3> data;
11496  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11497  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11498  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11499  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11500  } else {
11501  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11502  }
11503  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11504  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << std::flush;
11505  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11506  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11507  }
11508  }
11509  outfile << "</data_vec3>" << std::endl;
11510  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4) {
11511  outfile << "\t<data_vec4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11512  std::vector<vec4> data;
11513  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11514  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11515  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11516  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11517  } else {
11518  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11519  }
11520  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11521  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << " " << data.at(j).w
11522  << std::flush;
11523  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11524  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11525  }
11526  }
11527  outfile << "</data_vec4>" << std::endl;
11528  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_INT2) {
11529  outfile << "\t<data_int2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11530  std::vector<int2> data;
11531  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11532  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11533  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11534  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11535  } else {
11536  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11537  }
11538  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11539  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << std::flush;
11540  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11541  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11542  }
11543  }
11544  outfile << "</data_int2>" << std::endl;
11545  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_INT3) {
11546  outfile << "\t<data_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11547  std::vector<int3> data;
11548  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11549  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11550  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11551  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11552  } else {
11553  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11554  }
11555  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11556  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << std::flush;
11557  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11558  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11559  }
11560  }
11561  outfile << "</data_int3>" << std::endl;
11562  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_INT4) {
11563  outfile << "\t<data_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11564  std::vector<int4> data;
11565  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11566  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11567  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11568  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11569  } else {
11570  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11571  }
11572  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11573  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << " " << data.at(j).w
11574  << std::flush;
11575  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11576  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11577  }
11578  }
11579  outfile << "</data_int4>" << std::endl;
11580  } else if (dtype == HELIOS_TYPE_STRING) {
11581  outfile << "\t<data_string label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
11582  std::vector<std::string> data;
11583  if (strcmp(data_group, "primitive") == 0) {
11584  ((Primitive *) ptr)->getPrimitiveData(label.c_str(), data);
11585  } else if (strcmp(data_group, "object") == 0) {
11586  ((CompoundObject *) ptr)->getObjectData(label.c_str(), data);
11587  } else {
11588  getGlobalData(label.c_str(), data);
11589  }
11590  for (int j = 0; j < data.size(); j++) {
11591  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
11592  if (j != data.size() - 1) {
11593  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11594  }
11595  }
11596  outfile << "</data_string>" << std::endl;
11597  }
11598 
11599  }
11600 
11601 }
11602 
11603 void Context::writeXML( const char* filename, bool quiet ) const{
11604 
11605  if( !quiet ) {
11606  std::cout << "Writing XML file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
11607  }
11608 
11609  std::ofstream outfile;
11610  outfile.open(filename);
11611 
11612  outfile << "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>\n\n";
11613 
11614  outfile << "<helios>\n\n";
11615 
11616  // -- time/date -- //
11617 
11618  Date date = getDate();
11619 
11620  outfile << " <date>" << std::endl;
11621 
11622  outfile << "\t<day>" << date.day << "</day>" << std::endl;
11623  outfile << "\t<month>" << date.month << "</month>" << std::endl;
11624  outfile << "\t<year>" << date.year << "</year>" << std::endl;
11625 
11626  outfile << " </date>" << std::endl;
11627 
11628  Time time = getTime();
11629 
11630  outfile << " <time>" << std::endl;
11631 
11632  outfile << "\t<hour>" << time.hour << "</hour>" << std::endl;
11633  outfile << "\t<minute>" << time.minute << "</minute>" << std::endl;
11634  outfile << "\t<second>" << time.second << "</second>" << std::endl;
11635 
11636  outfile << " </time>" << std::endl;
11637 
11638  // -- primitives -- //
11639 
11640  for(auto primitive : primitives){
11641 
11642  uint p = primitive.first;
11643 
11644  Primitive* prim = getPrimitivePointer_private(p);
11645 
11646  uint parent_objID = prim->getParentObjectID();
11647 
11648  RGBAcolor color = prim->getColorRGBA();
11649 
11650  std::string texture_file = prim->getTextureFile();
11651 
11652  std::vector<std::string> pdata = prim->listPrimitiveData();
11653 
11654  if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
11655  outfile << " <patch>" << std::endl;
11656  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
11657  outfile << " <triangle>" << std::endl;
11658  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
11659  outfile << " <voxel>" << std::endl;
11660  }
11661 
11662  outfile << "\t<UUID>" << p << "</UUID>" << std::endl;
11663 
11664  if( parent_objID>0 ){
11665  outfile << "\t<objID>" << parent_objID << "</objID>" << std::endl;
11666  }
11667 
11668  outfile << "\t<color>" << color.r << " " << color.g << " " << color.b << " " << color.a << "</color>" << std::endl;
11669  if( prim->hasTexture() ){
11670  outfile << "\t<texture>" << texture_file << "</texture>" << std::endl;
11671  }
11672 
11673  if( !pdata.empty() ){
11674  writeDataToXMLstream( "primitive", pdata, prim, outfile );
11675  }
11676 
11677  //Patches
11678  if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
11679 
11680  Patch* patch = getPatchPointer_private(p);
11681  float transform[16];
11682  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11683 
11684  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11685  for(float i : transform){
11686  outfile << i << " ";
11687  }
11688  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11689  std::vector<vec2> uv = patch->getTextureUV();
11690  if( !uv.empty() ){
11691  outfile << "\t<textureUV>" << std::flush;
11692  for( int i=0; i<uv.size(); i++ ){
11693  outfile << uv.at(i).x << " " << uv.at(i).y << std::flush;
11694  if( i!=uv.size()-1 ){
11695  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11696  }
11697  }
11698  outfile << "</textureUV>" << std::endl;
11699  }
11700  outfile << " </patch>" << std::endl;
11701 
11702  //Triangles
11703  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
11704 
11705  float transform[16];
11706  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11707 
11708  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11709  for(float i : transform){
11710  outfile << i << " ";
11711  }
11712  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11713 
11714  std::vector<vec2> uv = getTrianglePointer_private(p)->getTextureUV();
11715  if( !uv.empty() ){
11716  outfile << "\t<textureUV>" << std::flush;
11717  for( int i=0; i<uv.size(); i++ ){
11718  outfile << uv.at(i).x << " " << uv.at(i).y << std::flush;
11719  if( i!=uv.size()-1 ){
11720  outfile << " " << std::flush;
11721  }
11722  }
11723  outfile << "</textureUV>" << std::endl;
11724  }
11725  outfile << " </triangle>" << std::endl;
11726 
11727  //Voxels
11728  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
11729 
11730  float transform[16];
11731  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11732 
11733  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11734  for(float i : transform){
11735  outfile << i << " ";
11736  }
11737  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11738 
11739  outfile << " </voxel>" << std::endl;
11740 
11741  }
11742 
11743  }
11744 
11745  // -- objects -- //
11746 
11747  for( const auto &object : objects ){
11748 
11749  uint o = object.first;
11750 
11751  CompoundObject* obj = object.second;
11752 
11753  RGBAcolor color = obj->getColorRGBA();
11754 
11755  std::string texture_file = obj->getTextureFile();
11756 
11757  std::vector<std::string> odata = obj->listObjectData();
11758 
11759 // std::vector<uint> prim_UUIDs = obj->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
11760 
11761  if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_TILE ){
11762  outfile << " <tile>" << std::endl;
11763  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_BOX ){
11764  outfile << " <box>" << std::endl;
11765  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_CONE ){
11766  outfile << " <cone>" << std::endl;
11767  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_DISK ){
11768  outfile << " <disk>" << std::endl;
11769  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE ){
11770  outfile << " <sphere>" << std::endl;
11771  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE ){
11772  outfile << " <tube>" << std::endl;
11773  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH ){
11774  outfile << " <polymesh>" << std::endl;
11775  }
11776 
11777  outfile << "\t<objID>" << o << "</objID>" << std::endl;
11778  if( !(obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE) ){
11779  outfile << "\t<color>" << color.r << " " << color.g << " " << color.b << " " << color.a << "</color>" << std::endl;
11780  }
11781  if( obj->hasTexture() ){
11782  outfile << "\t<texture>" << texture_file << "</texture>" << std::endl;
11783  }
11784 
11785 // outfile << "\t<UUIDs>" << std::endl;
11786 // for( uint UUID : prim_UUIDs ){
11787 // outfile << "\t\t" << UUID << std::endl;
11788 // }
11789 // outfile << "\t</UUIDs>" << std::endl;
11790 
11791  if( !odata.empty() ){
11792  writeDataToXMLstream( "object", odata, obj, outfile );
11793  }
11794 
11795  std::vector<std::string> pdata_labels;
11796  std::vector<HeliosDataType> pdata_types;
11797  std::vector<uint> primitiveUUIDs = obj->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
11798  for( uint UUID : primitiveUUIDs ){
11799  std::vector<std::string> labels = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->listPrimitiveData();
11800  for( int i=0; i<labels.size(); i++ ){
11801  if( find(pdata_labels.begin(),pdata_labels.end(),labels.at(i)) == pdata_labels.end() ){
11802  pdata_labels.push_back(labels.at(i));
11803  pdata_types.push_back(getPrimitiveDataType(UUID,labels.at(i).c_str()));
11804  }
11805  }
11806  }
11807  for( size_t l=0; l<pdata_labels.size(); l++ ) {
11808  if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ) {
11809  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_float " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11810  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11811  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11812  std::vector<float> data;
11813  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11814  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11815  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11816  outfile << data.at(i) << std::flush;
11817  }
11818  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11819  }
11820  }
11821  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_float>" << std::endl;
11822  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ) {
11823  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_double " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11824  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11825  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11826  std::vector<double> data;
11827  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11828  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11829  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11830  outfile << data.at(i) << std::flush;
11831  }
11832  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11833  }
11834  }
11835  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_double>" << std::endl;
11836  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ) {
11837  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_uint " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11838  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11839  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11840  std::vector<uint> data;
11841  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11842  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11843  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11844  outfile << data.at(i) << std::flush;
11845  }
11846  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11847  }
11848  }
11849  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_uint>" << std::endl;
11850  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ) {
11851  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_int " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11852  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11853  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11854  std::vector<int> data;
11855  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11856  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11857  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11858  outfile << data.at(i) << std::flush;
11859  }
11860  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11861  }
11862  }
11863  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_int>" << std::endl;
11864  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ) {
11865  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_int2 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11866  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11867  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11868  std::vector<int2> data;
11869  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11870  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11871  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11872  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << std::flush;
11873  }
11874  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11875  }
11876  }
11877  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_int2>" << std::endl;
11878  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ) {
11879  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_int3 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11880  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11881  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11882  std::vector<int3> data;
11883  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11884  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11885  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11886  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << " " << data.at(i).z << std::flush;
11887  }
11888  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11889  }
11890  }
11891  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_int3>" << std::endl;
11892  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ) {
11893  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_int4 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11894  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11895  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11896  std::vector<int4> data;
11897  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11898  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11899  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11900  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << " " << data.at(i).z << " " << data.at(i).w << std::flush;
11901  }
11902  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11903  }
11904  }
11905  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_int4>" << std::endl;
11906  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ) {
11907  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_vec2 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11908  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11909  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11910  std::vector<vec2> data;
11911  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11912  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11913  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11914  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << std::flush;
11915  }
11916  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11917  }
11918  }
11919  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_vec2>" << std::endl;
11920  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ) {
11921  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_vec3 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11922  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11923  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11924  std::vector<vec3> data;
11925  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11926  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11927  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11928  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << " " << data.at(i).z << std::flush;
11929  }
11930  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11931  }
11932  }
11933  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_vec3>" << std::endl;
11934  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ) {
11935  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_vec4 " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11936  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11937  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11938  std::vector<vec4> data;
11939  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11940  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11941  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11942  outfile << data.at(i).x << " " << data.at(i).y << " " << data.at(i).z << " " << data.at(i).w << std::flush;
11943  }
11944  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11945  }
11946  }
11947  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_vec4>" << std::endl;
11948  }else if( pdata_types.at(l)==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ) {
11949  outfile << "\t<primitive_data_string " << "label=\"" << pdata_labels.at(l) << "\">" << std::endl;
11950  for (size_t p = 0; p < primitiveUUIDs.size(); p++) {
11951  if (doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str())) {
11952  std::vector<std::string> data;
11953  getPrimitiveData(primitiveUUIDs.at(p), pdata_labels.at(l).c_str(), data);
11954  outfile << "\t\t<data label=\"" << p << "\"> " << std::flush;
11955  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); i++) {
11956  outfile << data.at(i) << std::flush;
11957  }
11958  outfile << " </data>" << std::endl;
11959  }
11960  }
11961  outfile << "\t</primitive_data_string>" << std::endl;
11962  }
11963 
11964 
11965  }
11966 
11967  //Tiles
11968  if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_TILE ){
11969 
11970  Tile* tile = getTileObjectPointer(o);
11971 
11972  float transform[16];
11973  tile->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11974 
11975  int2 subdiv = tile->getSubdivisionCount();
11976  outfile << "\t<subdivisions>" << subdiv.x << " " << subdiv.y << "</subdivisions>" << std::endl;
11977 
11978  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11979  for(float i : transform){
11980  outfile << i << " ";
11981  }
11982  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11983 
11984  outfile << " </tile>" << std::endl;
11985 
11986  //Spheres
11987  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE ){
11988 
11989  Sphere* sphere = getSphereObjectPointer(o);
11990 
11991  float transform[16];
11992  sphere->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
11993 
11994  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
11995  for(float i : transform){
11996  outfile << i << " ";
11997  }
11998  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
11999 
12000  uint subdiv = sphere->getSubdivisionCount();
12001  outfile << "\t<subdivisions> " << subdiv << " </subdivisions>" << std::endl;
12002 
12003  outfile << " </sphere>" << std::endl;
12004 
12005  //Tubes
12006  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE ) {
12007 
12008  Tube *tube = getTubeObjectPointer(o);
12009 
12010  float transform[16];
12011  tube->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
12012 
12013  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
12014  for (float i: transform) {
12015  outfile << i << " ";
12016  }
12017  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
12018 
12019  uint subdiv = tube->getSubdivisionCount();
12020  outfile << "\t<subdivisions> " << subdiv << " </subdivisions>" << std::endl;
12021 
12022  std::vector<vec3> nodes = tube->getNodes();
12023  std::vector<float> radius = tube->getNodeRadii();
12024 
12025  assert(nodes.size() == radius.size());
12026  outfile << "\t<nodes> " << std::endl;
12027  for (int i = 0; i < nodes.size(); i++) {
12028  outfile << "\t\t" << nodes.at(i).x << " " << nodes.at(i).y << " " << nodes.at(i).z << std::endl;
12029  }
12030  outfile << "\t</nodes> " << std::endl;
12031  outfile << "\t<radius> " << std::endl;
12032  for (int i = 0; i < radius.size(); i++) {
12033  outfile << "\t\t" << radius.at(i) << std::endl;
12034  }
12035  outfile << "\t</radius> " << std::endl;
12036 
12037  if( texture_file.empty() ) {
12038  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors = tube->getNodeColors();
12039 
12040  outfile << "\t<color> " << std::endl;
12041  for (int i = 0; i < colors.size(); i++) {
12042  outfile << "\t\t" << colors.at(i).r << " " << colors.at(i).g << " " << colors.at(i).b << std::endl;
12043  }
12044  outfile << "\t</color> " << std::endl;
12045 
12046  }
12047 
12048  outfile << " </tube>" << std::endl;
12049 
12050  //Boxes
12051  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_BOX ) {
12052 
12053  Box *box = getBoxObjectPointer(o);
12054 
12055  float transform[16];
12056  box->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
12057 
12058  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
12059  for (float i: transform) {
12060  outfile << i << " ";
12061  }
12062  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
12063 
12064  int3 subdiv = box->getSubdivisionCount();
12065  outfile << "\t<subdivisions> " << subdiv.x << " " << subdiv.y << " " << subdiv.z << " </subdivisions>" << std::endl;
12066 
12067  outfile << " </box>" << std::endl;
12068 
12069  //Disks
12070  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_DISK ) {
12071 
12072  Disk *disk = getDiskObjectPointer(o);
12073 
12074  float transform[16];
12075  disk->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
12076 
12077  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
12078  for (float i: transform) {
12079  outfile << i << " ";
12080  }
12081  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
12082 
12083  uint subdiv = disk->getSubdivisionCount();
12084  outfile << "\t<subdivisions> " << subdiv << " </subdivisions>" << std::endl;
12085 
12086  outfile << " </disk>" << std::endl;
12087 
12088  //Cones
12089  }else if( obj->getObjectType()==OBJECT_TYPE_CONE ) {
12090 
12091  Cone *cone = getConeObjectPointer(o);
12092 
12093  float transform[16];
12094  cone->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
12095 
12096  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
12097  for (float i: transform) {
12098  outfile << i << " ";
12099  }
12100  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
12101 
12102  uint subdiv = cone->getSubdivisionCount();
12103  outfile << "\t<subdivisions> " << subdiv << " </subdivisions>" << std::endl;
12104 
12105  std::vector<vec3> nodes = cone->getNodes();
12106  std::vector<float> radius = cone->getNodeRadii();
12107 
12108  assert(nodes.size() == radius.size());
12109  outfile << "\t<nodes> " << std::endl;
12110  for (int i = 0; i < nodes.size(); i++) {
12111  outfile << "\t\t" << nodes.at(i).x << " " << nodes.at(i).y << " " << nodes.at(i).z << std::endl;
12112  }
12113  outfile << "\t</nodes> " << std::endl;
12114  outfile << "\t<radius> " << std::endl;
12115  for (int i = 0; i < radius.size(); i++) {
12116  outfile << "\t\t" << radius.at(i) << std::endl;
12117  }
12118  outfile << "\t</radius> " << std::endl;
12119 
12120  outfile << " </cone>" << std::endl;
12121 
12122  }
12123 
12124  }
12125 
12126 
12127  // -- global data -- //
12128 
12129  for(const auto & iter : globaldata){
12130  std::string label = iter.first;
12131  GlobalData data = iter.second;
12132  HeliosDataType type = data.type;
12133  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
12134  outfile << " <globaldata_uint label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12135  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12136  outfile << data.global_data_uint.at(i) << std::flush;
12137  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12138  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12139  }
12140  }
12141  outfile << "</globaldata_uint>" << std::endl;
12142  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
12143  outfile << " <globaldata_int label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12144  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12145  outfile << data.global_data_int.at(i) << std::flush;
12146  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12147  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12148  }
12149  }
12150  outfile << "</globaldata_int>" << std::endl;
12151  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
12152  outfile << " <globaldata_float label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12153  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12154  outfile << data.global_data_float.at(i) << std::flush;
12155  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12156  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12157  }
12158  }
12159  outfile << "</globaldata_float>" << std::endl;
12160  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
12161  outfile << " <globaldata_double label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12162  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12163  outfile << data.global_data_double.at(i) << std::flush;
12164  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12165  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12166  }
12167  }
12168  outfile << "</globaldata_double>" << std::endl;
12169  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
12170  outfile << " <globaldata_vec2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12171  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12172  outfile << data.global_data_vec2.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec2.at(i).y << std::flush;
12173  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12174  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12175  }
12176  }
12177  outfile << "</globaldata_vec2>" << std::endl;
12178  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
12179  outfile << " <globaldata_vec3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12180  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12181  outfile << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).y << " " << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).z << std::flush;
12182  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12183  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12184  }
12185  }
12186  outfile << "</globaldata_vec3>" << std::endl;
12187  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
12188  outfile << " <globaldata_vec4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12189  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12190  outfile << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).y << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).z << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).w << std::flush;
12191  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12192  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12193  }
12194  }
12195  outfile << "</globaldata_vec4>" << std::endl;
12196  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
12197  outfile << " <globaldata_int2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12198  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12199  outfile << data.global_data_int2.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int2.at(i).y << std::flush;
12200  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12201  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12202  }
12203  }
12204  outfile << "</globaldata_int2>" << std::endl;
12205  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
12206  outfile << " <globaldata_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12207  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12208  outfile << data.global_data_int3.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int3.at(i).y << data.global_data_int3.at(i).z << std::flush;
12209  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12210  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12211  }
12212  }
12213  outfile << "</globaldata_int3>" << std::endl;
12214  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
12215  outfile << " <globaldata_int4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12216  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12217  outfile << data.global_data_int4.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int4.at(i).y << data.global_data_int4.at(i).z << data.global_data_int4.at(i).w << std::flush;
12218  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12219  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12220  }
12221  }
12222  outfile << "</globaldata_int4>" << std::endl;
12223  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
12224  outfile << " <globaldata_string label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
12225  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
12226  outfile << data.global_data_string.at(i) << std::flush;
12227  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
12228  outfile << " " << std::flush;
12229  }
12230  }
12231  outfile << "</globaldata_string>" << std::endl;
12232  }
12233 
12234  }
12235 
12236  // -- timeseries -- //
12237 
12238  for(const auto & iter : timeseries_data){
12239 
12240  std::string label = iter.first;
12241 
12242  std::vector<float> data = iter.second;
12243  std::vector<double> dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label);
12244 
12245  assert( data.size()==dateval.size() );
12246 
12247  outfile << " <timeseries label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::endl;
12248 
12249  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size(); i++ ){
12250 
12251  Date a_date = queryTimeseriesDate( label.c_str(), i );
12252  Time a_time = queryTimeseriesTime( label.c_str(), i );
12253 
12254  outfile << "\t<datapoint>" << std::endl;
12255 
12256  outfile << "\t <date>" << a_date.day << " " << a_date.month << " " << a_date.year << "</date>" << std::endl;
12257 
12258  outfile << "\t <time>" << a_time.hour << " " << a_time.minute << " " << a_time.second << "</time>" << std::endl;
12259 
12260  outfile << "\t <value>" << data.at(i) << "</value>" << std::endl;
12261 
12262  outfile << "\t</datapoint>" << std::endl;
12263  }
12264 
12265  outfile << " </timeseries>" << std::endl;
12266 
12267  }
12268 
12269  // ----------------- //
12270 
12271  outfile << "\n</helios>\n";
12272 
12273  outfile.close();
12274 
12275  if( !quiet ) {
12276  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
12277  }
12278 }
12279 
12280 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height ){
12281  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_RGBcolor(0,0,1) );
12282 }
12283 
12284 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height, const SphericalCoord &rotation ){
12285  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, rotation, make_RGBcolor(0,0,1) );
12286 }
12287 
12288 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height, const RGBcolor &default_color ){
12289  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), default_color );
12290 }
12291 
12292 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &default_color ){
12293 
12294  std::cout << "Reading PLY file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
12295 
12296  std::string fn = filename;
12297  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "ply" ) {
12298  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadPLY): File " + fn + " is not PLY format.") );
12299  }
12300 
12301  std::string line, prop;
12302 
12303  uint vertexCount=0, faceCount=0;
12304 
12305  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
12306  std::vector<std::vector<int> > faces;
12307  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
12308  std::vector<std::string> properties;
12309 
12310  bool ifColor=false;
12311 
12312  std::ifstream inputPly;
12313  inputPly.open(filename);
12314 
12315  if (!inputPly.is_open()) {
12316  throw( std::runtime_error("Couldn't open " + std::string(filename) ));
12317  }
12318 
12319  //--- read header info -----//
12320 
12321  //first line should always be 'ply'
12322  inputPly>>line;
12323  if( strcmp("ply",line.c_str())!=0 ){
12324  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadPLY): " + std::string(filename) + " is not a PLY file."));
12325  }
12326 
12327  //read format
12328  inputPly>>line;
12329  if( strcmp("format",line.c_str())!=0 ){
12330  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadPLY): could not determine data format of " + std::string(filename) ));
12331  }
12332 
12333  inputPly>>line;
12334  if( strcmp("ascii",line.c_str())!=0 ){
12335  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadPLY): Only ASCII data types are supported."));
12336  }
12337 
12338  while(strcmp("end_header",line.c_str())!=0){
12339 
12340  inputPly>>line;
12341 
12342  if( strcmp("comment",line.c_str())==0 ){
12343  getline(inputPly, line);
12344  }
12345  else if( strcmp("element",line.c_str())==0 ){
12346 
12347  inputPly>>line;
12348 
12349  if( strcmp("vertex",line.c_str())==0 ){
12350  inputPly>>vertexCount;
12351  }else if( strcmp("face",line.c_str())==0 ){
12352  inputPly>>faceCount;
12353  }
12354 
12355 
12356  }else if( strcmp("property",line.c_str())==0 ){
12357 
12358  inputPly>>line; //type
12359 
12360  if( strcmp("list",line.c_str())!=0 ){
12361 
12362  inputPly>>prop; //value
12363  properties.push_back(prop);
12364 
12365  }
12366 
12367  }
12368 
12369 
12370  }
12371 
12372  for(auto & propertie : properties){
12373  if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"red")==0 ){
12374  ifColor = true;
12375  }
12376  }
12377  std::cout<< "forming " << faceCount << " triangles..." << std::flush;
12378 
12379  vertices.resize(vertexCount);
12380  colors.resize(vertexCount);
12381  faces.resize(faceCount);
12382 
12383 
12384  //--- read vertices ----//
12385 
12386  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
12387 
12388  for(auto & propertie : properties){
12389  if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"x")==0 ){ //Note: permuting x,y,z to match our coordinate system (z-vertical instead of y-vertical)
12390  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).y;
12391  }else if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"y")==0 ){
12392  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).z;
12393  }else if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"z")==0 ){
12394  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).x;
12395  }else if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"red")==0 ){
12396  inputPly >> colors.at(row).r;
12397  colors.at(row).r /= 255.f;
12398  }else if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"green")==0 ){
12399  inputPly >> colors.at(row).g;
12400  colors.at(row).g /= 255.f;
12401  }else if( strcmp(propertie.c_str(),"blue")==0 ){
12402  inputPly >> colors.at(row).b;
12403  colors.at(row).b /= 255.f;
12404  // }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"alpha")==0 ){
12405  // inputPly >> colors.at(row).a;
12406  }else{
12407  inputPly >> line;
12408  }
12409  }
12410 
12411  }
12412 
12413  //determine bounding box
12414 
12415  vec3 boxmin = make_vec3(10000,10000,10000);
12416  vec3 boxmax = make_vec3(-10000,-10000,-10000);
12417 
12418  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
12419 
12420  if(vertices.at(row).x < boxmin.x ){
12421  boxmin.x = vertices.at(row).x;
12422  }
12423  if(vertices.at(row).y < boxmin.y ){
12424  boxmin.y = vertices.at(row).y;
12425  }
12426  if(vertices.at(row).z < boxmin.z ){
12427  boxmin.z = vertices.at(row).z;
12428  }
12429 
12430  if(vertices.at(row).x > boxmax.x ){
12431  boxmax.x = vertices.at(row).x;
12432  }
12433  if(vertices.at(row).y > boxmax.y ){
12434  boxmax.y = vertices.at(row).y;
12435  }
12436  if(vertices.at(row).z > boxmax.z ){
12437  boxmax.z = vertices.at(row).z;
12438  }
12439 
12440  }
12441 
12442  //center PLY object at `origin' and scale to have height `height'
12443  float scl = height/(boxmax.z-boxmin.z);
12444  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
12445  vertices.at(row).z -= boxmin.z;
12446 
12447  vertices.at(row).x *= scl;
12448  vertices.at(row).y *= scl;
12449  vertices.at(row).z *= scl;
12450 
12451  vertices.at(row) = rotatePoint(vertices.at(row),rotation) + origin;
12452  }
12453 
12454  //--- read faces ----//
12455 
12456  uint v, ID;
12457  std::vector<uint> UUID;
12458  for( uint row=0; row<faceCount; row++ ){
12459 
12460  inputPly >> v;
12461 
12462  faces.at(row).resize(v);
12463 
12464  for( uint i=0; i<v; i++ ){
12465  inputPly >> faces.at(row).at(i);
12466  }
12467 
12468  //Add triangles to context
12469 
12470  for( uint t=2; t<v; t++ ){
12471 
12472  RGBcolor color;
12473  if( ifColor ){
12474  color = colors.at(faces.at(row).front());
12475  }else{
12476  color = default_color;
12477  }
12478 
12479  vec3 v0 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).front());
12480  vec3 v1 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).at(t-1));
12481  vec3 v2 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).at(t));
12482 
12483  if( (v0-v1).magnitude()==0 || (v0-v2).magnitude()==0 || (v1-v2).magnitude()==0 ){
12484  continue;
12485  }
12486 
12487  ID = addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color );
12488 
12489  UUID.push_back(ID);
12490 
12491  }
12492 
12493  }
12494 
12495  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
12496 
12497  return UUID;
12498 
12499 }
12500 
12501 void Context::writePLY( const char* filename ) const{
12502 
12503  std::ofstream PLYfile;
12504  PLYfile.open(filename);
12505 
12506  PLYfile << "ply" << std::endl << "format ascii 1.0" << std::endl << "comment HELIOS generated" << std::endl;
12507 
12508  std::vector<int3> faces;
12509  std::vector<vec3> verts;
12510  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
12511 
12512  size_t vertex_count = 0;
12513 
12514  for(auto primitive : primitives){
12515 
12516  uint p = primitive.first;
12517 
12518  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
12519  PrimitiveType type = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getType();
12520  RGBcolor C = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getColor();
12521  C.scale(255.f);
12522 
12523  if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
12524 
12525  faces.push_back( make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count+1, (int)vertex_count+2 ) );
12526  for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
12527  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
12528  colors.push_back( C );
12529  vertex_count ++;
12530  }
12531 
12532  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
12533 
12534  faces.push_back( make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count+1, (int)vertex_count+2 ) );
12535  faces.push_back( make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count+2, (int)vertex_count+3 ) );
12536  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
12537  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
12538  colors.push_back( C );
12539  vertex_count ++;
12540  }
12541 
12542  }
12543 
12544  }
12545 
12546  PLYfile << "element vertex " << verts.size() << std::endl;
12547  PLYfile << "property float x" << std::endl << "property float y" << std::endl << "property float z" << std::endl;
12548  PLYfile << "property uchar red" << std::endl << "property uchar green" << std::endl << "property uchar blue" << std::endl;
12549  PLYfile << "element face " << faces.size() << std::endl;
12550  PLYfile << "property list uchar int vertex_indices" << std::endl << "end_header" << std::endl;
12551 
12552  for( size_t v=0; v<verts.size(); v++ ){
12553  PLYfile << verts.at(v).x << " " << verts.at(v).y << " " << verts.at(v).z << " " << round(colors.at(v).r) << " " << round(colors.at(v).g) << " " << round(colors.at(v).b) << std::endl;
12554  }
12555 
12556  for(auto & face : faces){
12557  PLYfile << "3 " << face.x << " " << face.y << " " << face.z << std::endl;
12558  }
12559 
12560  PLYfile.close();
12561 
12562 
12563 }
12564 
12565 std::vector<uint> Context::loadOBJ(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &default_color ){
12566  return loadOBJ(filename,origin,height,rotation,default_color,"ZUP");
12567 }
12568 
12569 std::vector<uint> Context::loadOBJ(const char* filename, const vec3 &origin, float height, const SphericalCoord &rotation, const RGBcolor &default_color, const char* upaxis ){
12570 
12571  std::cout << "Reading OBJ file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
12572 
12573  std::string fn = filename;
12574  if( fn.substr(fn.find_last_of(".") + 1) != "obj" ) {
12575  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadOBJ): File " + fn + " is not OBJ format.") );
12576  }
12577 
12578  if( strcmp(upaxis,"XUP") != 0 && strcmp(upaxis,"YUP") != 0 && strcmp(upaxis,"ZUP") != 0 ){
12579  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadOBJ): Up axis of " + std::string(upaxis) + " is not valid. Should be one of 'XUP', 'YUP', or 'ZUP'."));
12580  }
12581 
12582  std::string line, prop;
12583 
12584  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
12585  std::vector<vec2> texture_uv;
12586  std::map<std::string,std::vector<std::vector<int> > > face_inds, texture_inds;
12587 
12588  std::map<std::string,std::string> material_textures;
12589 
12590  std::vector<uint> UUID;
12591 
12592  std::ifstream inputOBJ, inputMTL;
12593  inputOBJ.open(filename);
12594 
12595  if (!inputOBJ.is_open()) {
12596  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadOBJ): Couldn't open " + std::string(filename) ));
12597  }
12598 
12599  //determine the base file path for 'filename'
12600  std::string fstring = filename;
12601  std::string filebase;
12602  for( size_t i=fstring.size()-1; i>=0; i-- ){
12603  if( strncmp(&fstring[i],"/",1)==0 ){
12604  for( int ii=0; ii<=i; ii++ ){
12605  filebase.push_back(fstring.at(ii));
12606  }
12607  break;
12608  }
12609  }
12610 
12611  //determine bounding box
12612  float boxmin = 100000;
12613  float boxmax = -100000;
12614 
12615  std::string current_material = "none";
12616 
12617  while( inputOBJ.good() ){
12618 
12619  inputOBJ>>line;
12620 
12621  // ------- COMMENTS --------- //
12622  if( strcmp("#",line.c_str())==0 ){
12623  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12624 
12625  // ------- MATERIAL LIBRARY ------- //
12626  }else if( strcmp("mtllib",line.c_str())==0 ){
12627  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12628  std::string material_file = deblank(line.c_str());
12629  material_textures = loadMTL( filebase, material_file );
12630 
12631  // ------- VERTICES --------- //
12632  }else if( strcmp("v",line.c_str())==0 ){
12633  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12634  //parse vertices into points
12635  vec3 verts(string2vec3(line.c_str()));
12636  vertices.emplace_back(verts);
12637 
12638  if(verts.z < boxmin ){
12639  boxmin = verts.z;
12640  }
12641  if(verts.z > boxmax ){
12642  boxmax = verts.z;
12643  }
12644 
12645  // ------- TEXTURE COORDINATES --------- //
12646  }else if( strcmp("vt",line.c_str())==0 ){
12647  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12648  //parse coordinates into uv
12649  vec2 uv(string2vec2(line.c_str()));
12650  texture_uv.emplace_back(uv);
12651 
12652  // ------- MATERIALS --------- //
12653  }else if( strcmp("usemtl",line.c_str())==0 ){
12654  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12655  current_material = line;
12656 
12657  // ------- FACES --------- //
12658  }else if( strcmp("f",line.c_str())==0 ){
12659  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12660  //parse face vertices
12661  std::istringstream stream(line);
12662  std::string tmp, digitf, digitu;
12663  std::vector<int> f, u;
12664  while( stream.good() ){
12665 
12666  stream >> tmp;
12667 
12668  digitf="";
12669  int ic = 0;
12670  for(char i : tmp){
12671  if( isdigit(i) ){
12672  digitf.push_back( i );
12673  ic++;
12674  }else{
12675  break;
12676  }
12677  }
12678 
12679  digitu="";
12680  for( int i=ic+1; i<tmp.size(); i++ ){
12681  if( isdigit(tmp[i]) ){
12682  digitu.push_back( tmp[i] );
12683  }else{
12684  break;
12685  }
12686  }
12687 
12688  if( !digitf.empty() && !digitu.empty() ){
12689  f.push_back( std::stoi(digitf) );
12690  u.push_back( std::stoi(digitu) );
12691  }
12692 
12693  }
12694  face_inds[current_material].push_back(f);
12695  texture_inds[current_material].push_back(u);
12696 
12697  // ------ OTHER STUFF --------- //
12698  }else{
12699  getline(inputOBJ, line);
12700  }
12701  }
12702 
12703  float scl = height/(boxmax-boxmin);
12704 
12705  for(std::map<std::string,std::vector<std::vector<int> > >::const_iterator iter = face_inds.begin(); iter != face_inds.end(); ++iter){
12706 
12707  std::string material = iter->first;
12708  std::string texture;
12709  if( material_textures.find(material)!=material_textures.end() ){
12710  texture = material_textures.at(material);
12711  }
12712 
12713  for( size_t i=0; i<face_inds.at(material).size(); i++ ){
12714 
12715  for( uint t=2; t<face_inds.at(material).at(i).size(); t++ ){
12716 
12717  RGBcolor color = default_color;
12718 
12719  vec3 v0 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(material).at(i).at(0)-1);
12720  vec3 v1 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(material).at(i).at(t-1)-1);
12721  vec3 v2 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(material).at(i).at(t)-1);
12722 
12723  if( (v0-v1).magnitude()==0 || (v0-v2).magnitude()==0 || (v1-v2).magnitude()==0 ){
12724  continue;
12725  }
12726 
12727  if( strcmp(upaxis,"YUP")==0 ){
12728  v0 = rotatePointAboutLine(v0,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
12729  v1 = rotatePointAboutLine(v1,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
12730  v2 = rotatePointAboutLine(v2,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
12731  }
12732 
12733  v0 = rotatePoint(v0,rotation);
12734  v1 = rotatePoint(v1,rotation);
12735  v2 = rotatePoint(v2,rotation);
12736 
12737  uint ID;
12738  if( !texture.empty() && !texture_inds.at(material).at(i).empty() ){//has texture
12739 
12740  if( t<texture_inds.at(material).at(i).size() ){
12741  int iuv0 = texture_inds.at(material).at(i).at(0)-1;
12742  int iuv1 = texture_inds.at(material).at(i).at(t-1)-1;
12743  int iuv2 = texture_inds.at(material).at(i).at(t)-1;
12744 
12745  ID = addTriangle( origin+v0*scl, origin+v1*scl, origin+v2*scl, texture.c_str(), texture_uv.at(iuv0), texture_uv.at(iuv1), texture_uv.at(iuv2) );
12746 
12747  vec3 normal = getPrimitivePointer_private(ID)->getNormal();
12748 
12749  }
12750  }else{
12751  ID = addTriangle( origin+v0*scl, origin+v1*scl, origin+v2*scl, color );
12752  }
12753 
12754  UUID.push_back(ID);
12755 
12756  }
12757  }
12758  }
12759 
12760  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
12761 
12762  return UUID;
12763 
12764 }
12765 
12766 std::map<std::string, std::string> Context::loadMTL(const std::string &filebase, const std::string &material_file ){
12767 
12768  std::ifstream inputMTL;
12769 
12770  std::string file = material_file;
12771 
12772  //first look for mtl file using path given in obj file
12773  inputMTL.open(file.c_str());
12774  if( !inputMTL.is_open() ){
12775  //if that doesn't work, try looking in the same directry where obj file is located
12776  file = filebase+file;
12777  file.erase( remove( file.begin(), file.end(), ' ' ), file.end() );
12778  for( size_t i=file.size()-1; i>=0; i-- ){
12779  if( strcmp(&file.at(i),"l")==0 ){
12780  break;
12781  }else{
12782  file.erase(file.begin()+(int)i);
12783  }
12784  }
12785  if( file.empty() ){
12786  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadMTL): Material file does not have correct file extension (.mtl)."));
12787  }
12788  inputMTL.open( file.c_str() );
12789  if( !inputMTL.is_open() ){
12790  throw(std::runtime_error("ERROR (loadMTL): Material file " + std::string(file) + " given in .obj file cannot be found."));
12791  }
12792  }
12793 
12794  std::map<std::string, std::string> material_textures;
12795 
12796  std::string line;
12797 
12798  inputMTL>>line;
12799 
12800  while( inputMTL.good() ){
12801 
12802  if( strcmp("#",line.c_str())==0 ){ //comments
12803  getline(inputMTL, line);
12804  inputMTL>>line;
12805  }else if( strcmp("newmtl",line.c_str())==0 ){ //material library
12806  getline(inputMTL, line);
12807  std::string material_name = line;
12808  material_textures[material_name] = "";
12809 
12810  //std::cout << "Found a material library: " << material_name << std::endl;
12811 
12812  while( strcmp("newmtl",line.c_str())!=0 && inputMTL.good() ){
12813 
12814  if( strcmp("map_a",line.c_str())==0 ){
12815  getline(inputMTL, line);
12816  }else if( strcmp("map_Ka",line.c_str())==0 ){
12817  getline(inputMTL, line);
12818  }else if( strcmp("map_Kd",line.c_str())==0 ){
12819  getline(inputMTL, line);
12820 
12821  std::istringstream stream(line);
12822  std::string tmp;
12823  while( stream.good() ){
12824  stream >> tmp;
12825  int e = (int)tmp.size();
12826  if( (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"n",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"p",1)==0 ) || (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"p",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"j",1)==0 ) || (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"e",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"p",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-4],"j",1)==0 ) ){
12827 
12828  std::string texturefile = tmp;
12829  std::ifstream tfile;
12830 
12831  //first look for texture file using path given in mtl file
12832  tfile.open(texturefile.c_str());
12833  if( !tfile.is_open() ){
12834  //if that doesn't work, try looking in the same directry where obj file is located
12835  tfile.close();
12836  texturefile = filebase+texturefile;
12837  tfile.open( texturefile.c_str() );
12838  if( !tfile.is_open() ){
12839  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadOBJ): Texture file " << texturefile << " given in .mtl file cannot be found." << std::endl;
12840  }
12841  }
12842  tfile.close();
12843 
12844  material_textures[material_name] = texturefile;
12845  }
12846  }
12847 
12848  }else if( strcmp("map_Ks",line.c_str())==0 ){
12849  getline(inputMTL, line);
12850  }else{
12851  getline(inputMTL, line);
12852  }
12853 
12854  inputMTL>>line;
12855  }
12856 
12857  }else{
12858  getline(inputMTL, line);
12859  inputMTL>>line;
12860  }
12861  }
12862 
12863  return material_textures;
12864 
12865 }
12866 
12867 void Context::writeOBJ( const char* filename ) const{
12868 
12869  //To-Do list for OBJ writer
12870  // - image files need to be copied to the location where the .obj file is being written otherwise they won't be found.
12871  // - should parse "filename" to check that extension is .obj, and remove .obj extension when appending .mtl for material file.
12872  // - it would make more sense to write patches as quads rather than two triangles
12873 
12874  std::cout << "Writing OBJ file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
12875  std::ofstream file;
12876 
12877  char objfilename[50];
12878  sprintf(objfilename, "%s.obj", filename);
12879  file.open(objfilename);
12880 
12881  file << "# Helios generated OBJ File" << std::endl;
12882  file << "# baileylab.ucdavis.edu/software/helios" << std::endl;
12883  file << "mtllib " << filename << ".mtl" << std::endl;
12884  std::vector < int3 > faces;
12885  std::vector < vec3 > verts;
12886  std::vector < vec2 > uv;
12887  std::vector < int3 > uv_inds;
12888  std::vector < std::string > texture_list;
12889  std::vector < RGBcolor > colors;
12890  size_t vertex_count = 1; //OBJ files start indices at 1
12891  size_t uv_count = 1;
12892 
12893  for (auto primitive : primitives) {
12894 
12895  uint p = primitive.first;
12896 
12897  std::vector < vec3 > vertices = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getVertices();
12898  PrimitiveType type = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getType();
12899  RGBcolor C = getPrimitivePointer_private(p)->getColor();
12900 
12901  if (type == PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE) {
12902 
12903  faces.push_back(make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count + 1, (int)vertex_count + 2));
12904  colors.push_back(C);
12905  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
12906  verts.push_back(vertices.at(i));
12907  vertex_count++;
12908  }
12909 
12910  std::vector < vec2 > uv_v = getTrianglePointer_private(p)->getTextureUV();
12911  if (getTrianglePointer_private(p)->hasTexture()) {
12912  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3( (int)uv_count, (int)uv_count + 1, (int)uv_count + 2));
12913  texture_list.push_back(getTrianglePointer_private(p)->getTextureFile());
12914  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
12915  uv.push_back( uv_v.at(i) );
12916  uv_count++;
12917  }
12918  } else {
12919  texture_list.emplace_back("");
12920  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3(-1, -1, -1));
12921  }
12922 
12923  } else if (type == PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH) {
12924  faces.push_back(make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count + 1, (int)vertex_count + 2));
12925  faces.push_back(make_int3( (int)vertex_count, (int)vertex_count + 2, (int)vertex_count + 3));
12926  colors.push_back(C);
12927  colors.push_back(C);
12928  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
12929  verts.push_back(vertices.at(i));
12930  vertex_count++;
12931  }
12932  std::vector < vec2 > uv_v;
12933  std::string texturefile;
12934  uv_v = getPatchPointer_private(p)->getTextureUV();
12935  texturefile = getPatchPointer_private(p)->getTextureFile();
12936 
12937  if (getPatchPointer_private(p)->hasTexture()) {
12938  texture_list.push_back(texturefile);
12939  texture_list.push_back(texturefile);
12940  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3( (int)uv_count, (int)uv_count + 1, (int)uv_count + 2));
12941  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3( (int)uv_count, (int)uv_count + 2, (int)uv_count + 3));
12942  if (uv_v.empty()) { //default (u,v)
12943  uv.push_back( make_vec2(0, 1) );
12944  uv.push_back( make_vec2(1, 1) );
12945  uv.push_back( make_vec2(1, 0) );
12946  uv.push_back( make_vec2(0, 0) );
12947  uv_count += 4;
12948  } else { //custom (u,v)
12949  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
12950  uv.push_back( uv_v.at(i) );
12951  uv_count++;
12952  }
12953  }
12954  } else {
12955  texture_list.emplace_back("");
12956  texture_list.emplace_back("");
12957  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3(-1, -1, -1));
12958  uv_inds.push_back(make_int3(-1, -1, -1));
12959  }
12960  }
12961  }
12962 
12963  assert(uv_inds.size() == faces.size());
12964  assert(texture_list.size() == faces.size());
12965  assert(colors.size() == faces.size());
12966 
12967  for (auto & vert : verts) {
12968  file << "v " << vert.x << " " << vert.y << " " << vert.z << std::endl;
12969  }
12970 
12971  for (auto & v : uv) {
12972  file << "vt " << v.x << " " << v.y << std::endl;
12973  }
12974 
12975  std::string current_texture;
12976  int material_count = 1;
12977  std::vector < size_t > exsit_mtl_list;
12978 
12979  current_texture = texture_list.at(0);
12980  file << "usemtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
12981  material_count++;
12982  exsit_mtl_list.push_back(0);
12983 
12984  if (uv_inds.at(0).x < 0) {
12985  file << "f " << faces.at(0).x << " " << faces.at(0).y << " "
12986  << faces.at(0).z << std::endl;
12987  } else {
12988  //assert( uv_inds.at(f).x <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).y <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).z <= uv.size() );
12989  file << "f " << faces.at(0).x << "/" << uv_inds.at(0).x << " "
12990  << faces.at(0).y << "/" << uv_inds.at(0).y << " " << faces.at(0).z
12991  << "/" << uv_inds.at(0).z << std::endl;
12992  }
12993 
12994  for (size_t f = 1; f < faces.size(); f++) {
12995 
12996  if (current_texture != texture_list.at(f)) {
12997  bool mtl_exist_flag = false;
12998  size_t mtl_index = 0;
12999  size_t mtl_index_f = 0;
13000  for (size_t index = 0; index < exsit_mtl_list.size(); index++) {
13001  if (texture_list.at(f) == texture_list.at(exsit_mtl_list[index])) {
13002  mtl_exist_flag = true;
13003  mtl_index = index;
13004  mtl_index_f = exsit_mtl_list[index];
13005  break;
13006  }
13007  }
13008 
13009  if (mtl_exist_flag) {
13010  current_texture = texture_list.at(mtl_index_f);
13011  file << "usemtl material" << (mtl_index + 1) << std::endl; //we plus 1 here as we index mtl from 1 instead of 0 in the file.
13012  } else {
13013  current_texture = texture_list.at(f);
13014  file << "usemtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
13015  material_count++;
13016  exsit_mtl_list.push_back(f);
13017  }
13018  }
13019 
13020  if (uv_inds.at(f).x < 0) {
13021  file << "f " << faces.at(f).x << " " << faces.at(f).y << " "
13022  << faces.at(f).z << std::endl;
13023  } else {
13024  //assert( uv_inds.at(f).x <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).y <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).z <= uv.size() );
13025  file << "f " << faces.at(f).x << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).x << " "
13026  << faces.at(f).y << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).y << " " << faces.at(f).z
13027  << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).z << std::endl;
13028  }
13029  }
13030  file.close();
13031 
13032  char mtlfilename[50];
13033  sprintf(mtlfilename, "%s.mtl", filename);
13034  file.open(mtlfilename);
13035 
13036  current_texture = "";
13037  material_count = 1;
13038  RGBcolor current_color = make_RGBcolor(0.010203, 0.349302, 0.8372910);
13039  std::vector < size_t > exsit_mtl_list2;
13040 
13041  if (texture_list.at(0).empty()) { //has no texture
13042  if (current_color.r != colors.at(0).r && current_color.g != colors.at(0).g
13043  && current_color.b != colors.at(0).b) { //new color
13044  current_texture = texture_list.at(0);
13045  current_color = colors.at(0);
13046  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
13047  file << "Ka " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " "
13048  << current_color.b << std::endl;
13049  file << "Kd " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " "
13050  << current_color.b << std::endl;
13051  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
13052  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
13053  }
13054  }
13055 
13056  else {
13057  current_texture = texture_list.at(0);
13058  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
13059  file << "Ka 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
13060  file << "Kd 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
13061  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
13062  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
13063  file << "map_Ka " << current_texture << std::endl;
13064  file << "map_Kd " << current_texture << std::endl;
13065  file << "map_d " << current_texture << std::endl;
13066  }
13067 
13068  material_count++;
13069  exsit_mtl_list2.push_back(0);
13070 
13071  for (size_t f = 1; f < faces.size(); f++) {
13072  bool mtl_exist_flag = false;
13073  size_t mtl_index = 0;
13074  size_t mtl_index_f = 0;
13075  for (size_t index = 0; index < exsit_mtl_list2.size(); index++) {
13076  if ( !(texture_list.at(f) != texture_list.at(exsit_mtl_list2.at(index)))) {
13077  mtl_exist_flag = true;
13078  mtl_index = index;
13079  mtl_index_f = exsit_mtl_list2[index];
13080  break;
13081  }
13082  }
13083  if ( !mtl_exist_flag) {
13084 
13085  if (texture_list.at(f).empty()) {
13086  if (current_color.r != colors.at(f).r
13087  && current_color.g != colors.at(f).g
13088  && current_color.b != colors.at(f).b) { //new color
13089 
13090  current_texture = texture_list.at(f);
13091  current_color = colors.at(f);
13092  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
13093  file << "Ka " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " "
13094  << current_color.b << std::endl;
13095  file << "Kd " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " "
13096  << current_color.b << std::endl;
13097  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
13098  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
13099  material_count++;
13100  }
13101  } else {
13102  current_texture = texture_list.at(f);
13103  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
13104  file << "Ka 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
13105  file << "Kd 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
13106  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
13107  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
13108  file << "map_Ka " << current_texture << std::endl;
13109  file << "map_Kd " << current_texture << std::endl;
13110  file << "map_d " << current_texture << std::endl;
13111  material_count++;
13112  exsit_mtl_list2.push_back(f);
13113  }
13114 
13115  }
13116  }
13117  file.close();
13118  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
13119 }
13120 
13121 void Context::writePrimitiveData( std::string filename, const std::vector<std::string> &column_format, bool print_header ) const{
13122  writePrimitiveData(filename,column_format,getAllUUIDs(),print_header);
13123 }
13124 
13125 void Context::writePrimitiveData( std::string filename, const std::vector<std::string> &column_format, const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, bool print_header ) const{
13126 
13127  std::ofstream file(filename);
13128 
13129  if( print_header ){
13130  for( const auto &label : column_format ) {
13131  file << label << " ";
13132  }
13133  file.seekp(-1, std::ios_base::end);
13134  file << "\n";
13135  }
13136 
13137  bool uuidexistswarning = false;
13138  bool dataexistswarning = false;
13139  bool datatypewarning = false;
13140 
13141  for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
13142  if( !doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
13143  uuidexistswarning=true;
13144  continue;
13145  }
13146  for( const auto &label : column_format ) {
13147  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID,label.c_str()) ){
13148  dataexistswarning=true;
13149  file << 0 << " ";
13150  continue;
13151  }
13152  HeliosDataType type = getPrimitiveDataType( UUID, label.c_str() );
13153  if( type == HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
13154  int data;
13155  getPrimitiveData( UUID, label.c_str(), data );
13156  file << data << " ";
13157  }else if( type == HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ) {
13158  uint data;
13159  getPrimitiveData(UUID, label.c_str(), data);
13160  file << data << " ";
13161  }else if( type == HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ) {
13162  float data;
13163  getPrimitiveData(UUID, label.c_str(), data);
13164  file << data << " ";
13165  }else if( type == HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ) {
13166  double data;
13167  getPrimitiveData(UUID, label.c_str(), data);
13168  file << data << " ";
13169  }else if( type == HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ) {
13170  std::string data;
13171  getPrimitiveData(UUID, label.c_str(), data);
13172  file << data << " ";
13173  }else{
13174  datatypewarning=true;
13175  file << 0 << " ";
13176  }
13177  }
13178  file.seekp(-1, std::ios_base::end);
13179  file << "\n";
13180  }
13181 
13182  if( uuidexistswarning ){
13183  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::writePrimitiveData): Vector of UUIDs passed to writePrimitiveData() function contained UUIDs that do not exist, which were skipped." << std::endl;
13184  }
13185  if( dataexistswarning ){
13186  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::writePrimitiveData): Primitive data requested did not exist for one or more primitives. A default value of 0 was written in these cases." << std::endl;
13187  }
13188  if( datatypewarning ){
13189  std::cerr << "WARNING (Context::writePrimitiveData): Only scalar primitive data types (uint, int, float, and double) are supported for this function. A column of 0's was written in these cases." << std::endl;
13190  }
13191 
13192  file.close();
13193 
13194 }
13195 
13196 
13197 
13198 Context::~Context(){
13199 
13200  for(auto & primitive : primitives){
13201  Primitive* prim = getPrimitivePointer_private(primitive.first);
13202  delete prim;
13203  }
13204 
13205  for(auto & object : objects){
13206  CompoundObject* obj = getObjectPointer(object.first);
13207  delete obj;
13208  }
13209 
13210 }
13211 
13212 PrimitiveType Context::getPrimitiveType(uint UUID) const {
13213  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getType();
13214 }
13215 
13216 void Context::setPrimitiveParentObjectID(uint UUID, uint objID){
13217  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(objID);
13218 }
13219 
13220 void Context::setPrimitiveParentObjectID(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, uint objID) {
13221  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
13222  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setParentObjectID(objID);
13223  }
13224 }
13225 
13226 uint Context::getPrimitiveParentObjectID(uint UUID) const {
13227  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getParentObjectID();
13228 }

13230 float Context::getPrimitiveArea(uint UUID) const {
13231  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getArea();
13232 }
13233 
13234 void Context::getPrimitiveBoundingBox( uint UUID, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const{
13235  std::vector<uint> UUIDs{UUID};
13236  getPrimitiveBoundingBox( UUIDs, min_corner, max_corner );
13237 }
13238 
13239 void Context::getPrimitiveBoundingBox( const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const{
13240 
13241  uint p=0;
13242  for( uint UUID : UUIDs ){
13243 
13244  if ( !doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
13245  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPrimitiveBoundingBox): Primitive with UUID of " + std::to_string(UUID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
13246  }
13247 
13248  const std::vector<vec3> &vertices = getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
13249 
13250  if( p==0 ){
13251  min_corner = vertices.front();
13252  max_corner = min_corner;
13253  p++;
13254  continue;
13255  }
13256 
13257  for ( const vec3 &vert : vertices ){
13258  if ( vert.x<min_corner.x ){
13259  min_corner.x = vert.x;
13260  }
13261  if ( vert.y<min_corner.y ){
13262  min_corner.y = vert.y;
13263  }
13264  if ( vert.z<min_corner.z ){
13265  min_corner.z = vert.z;
13266  }
13267  if ( vert.x>max_corner.x ){
13268  max_corner.x = vert.x;
13269  }
13270  if ( vert.y>max_corner.y ){
13271  max_corner.y = vert.y;
13272  }
13273  if ( vert.z>max_corner.z ){
13274  max_corner.z = vert.z;
13275  }
13276  }
13277 
13278  p++;
13279  }
13280 }
13281 
13282 helios::vec3 Context::getPrimitiveNormal(uint UUID) const {
13283  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getNormal();
13284 }
13285

13292 }
13293 
13294 void Context::setPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs, float (&T)[16] ) {
13295  for( uint UUID : UUIDs){
13296  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->setTransformationMatrix(T);
13297  }
13298 }
