13337 std::string Context::getPrimitiveTextureFile( uint UUID ) const{
13338  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile();
13339 }
13340 
13341 helios::int2 Context::getPrimitiveTextureSize( uint UUID ) const{
13342  std::string texturefile = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile();
13343  if( !texturefile.empty() && textures.find(texturefile)!=textures.end() ){
13344  return textures.at(texturefile).getSize();
13345  }
13346  return make_int2(0,0);
13347 }
13348 
13349 std::vector<helios::vec2> Context::getPrimitiveTextureUV( uint UUID ) const{
13350  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureUV();
13351 }
13352 
13353 bool Context::primitiveTextureHasTransparencyChannel( uint UUID ) const{
13354  std::string texturefile = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile();
13355  if( !texturefile.empty() && textures.find(texturefile)!=textures.end() ){
13356  return textures.at(texturefile).hasTransparencyChannel();
13357  }
13358  return false;
13359 }
13360 
13361 const std::vector<std::vector<bool>> * Context::getPrimitiveTextureTransparencyData(uint UUID ) const{
13362  if(primitiveTextureHasTransparencyChannel(UUID) ){
13363  const std::vector<std::vector<bool> > *data = textures.at(getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getTextureFile()).getTransparencyData();
13364  return data;
13365  }else{
13366  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getPrimitiveTransparencyData): Texture transparency data does not exist for primitive " + std::to_string(UUID) + ".") );
13367  }
13368 }
13369 
13370 void Context::overridePrimitiveTextureColor( uint UUID ){
13371  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->overrideTextureColor();
13372 };
13373 
13374 void Context::usePrimitiveTextureColor( uint UUID ){
13375  getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->useTextureColor();
13376 };
13377 
13378 bool Context::isPrimitiveTextureColorOverridden( uint UUID ) const{
13379  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->isTextureColorOverridden();
13380 }
13381 
13382 float Context::getPrimitiveSolidFraction( uint UUID ) const{
13383  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->getSolidFraction();
13384 }
13385 
13386 void Context::printPrimitiveInfo(uint UUID) const{
13387 
13388  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
13389  std::cout << "Info for UUID " << UUID << std::endl;
13390  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
13391 
13392  PrimitiveType type = getPrimitiveType(UUID);
13393  std::string stype;
13394  if( type == 0){
13395  stype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
13396  }else if(type == 1){
13397  stype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
13398  }else if(type == 2){
13399  stype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL";
13400  }
13401 
13402  std::cout << "Type: " << stype << std::endl;
13403  std::cout << "Parent ObjID: " << getPrimitiveParentObjectID(UUID) << std::endl;
13404  std::cout << "Surface Area: " << getPrimitiveArea(UUID) << std::endl;
13405  std::cout << "Normal Vector: " << getPrimitiveNormal(UUID) << std::endl;
13406 
13407  if(type == PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH)
13408  {
13409  std::cout << "Patch Center: " << getPatchCenter(UUID) << std::endl;
13410  std::cout << "Patch Size: " << getPatchSize(UUID) << std::endl;
13411 
13412  }else if(type == PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL){
13413 
13414  std::cout << "Voxel Center: " << getVoxelCenter(UUID) << std::endl;
13415  std::cout << "Voxel Size: " << getVoxelSize(UUID) << std::endl;
13416  }
13417 
13418  std::vector<vec3> primitive_vertices = getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
13419  std::cout << "Vertices: " << std::endl;
13420  for(uint i=0; i<primitive_vertices.size();i++)
13421  {
13422  std::cout << " " << primitive_vertices.at(i) << std::endl;
13423  }
13424 
13425  float T[16];
13426  getPrimitiveTransformationMatrix(UUID, T);
13427  std::cout << "Transform: " << std::endl;
13428  std::cout << " " << T[0] << " " << T[1] << " " << T[2] << " " << T[3] << std::endl;
13429  std::cout << " " << T[4] << " " << T[5] << " " << T[6] << " " << T[7] << std::endl;
13430  std::cout << " " << T[8] << " " << T[9] << " " << T[10] << " " << T[11] << std::endl;
13431  std::cout << " " << T[12] << " " << T[13] << " " << T[14] << " " << T[15] << std::endl;
13432 
13433  std::cout << "Color: " << getPrimitiveColor(UUID) << std::endl;
13434  std::cout << "Texture File: " << getPrimitiveTextureFile(UUID) << std::endl;
13435  std::cout << "Texture Size: " << getPrimitiveTextureSize(UUID) << std::endl;
13436  std::cout << "Texture UV: " << std::endl;
13437  std::vector<vec2> uv = getPrimitiveTextureUV(UUID);
13438  for(uint i=0; i<uv.size();i++)
13439  {
13440  std::cout << " " << uv.at(i) << std::endl;
13441  }
13442 
13443  std::cout << "Texture Transparency: " << primitiveTextureHasTransparencyChannel(UUID) << std::endl;
13444  std::cout << "Color Overridden: " << isPrimitiveTextureColorOverridden(UUID) << std::endl;
13445  std::cout << "Solid Fraction: " << getPrimitiveSolidFraction(UUID) << std::endl;
13446 
13447 
13448  std::cout << "Primitive Data: " << std::endl;
13449  // Primitive* pointer = getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID);
13450  std::vector<std::string> pd = listPrimitiveData(UUID);
13451  for(uint i=0; i<pd.size();i++)
13452  {
13453  uint dsize = getPrimitiveDataSize(UUID, pd.at(i).c_str());
13454  HeliosDataType dtype = getPrimitiveDataType(UUID, pd.at(i).c_str());
13455  std::string dstype;
13456 
13457  if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
13458  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT";
13459  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
13460  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_UINT";
13461  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
13462  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT";
13463  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
13464  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE";
13465  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
13466  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2";
13467  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
13468  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3";
13469  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
13470  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4";
13471  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
13472  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT2";
13473  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
13474  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT3";
13475  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
13476  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT4";
13477  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
13478  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_STRING";
13479  }else{
13480  assert(false);
13481  }
13482 
13483 
13484  std::cout << " " << "[name: " << pd.at(i) << ", type: " << dstype << ", size: " << dsize << "]:" << std::endl;
13485 
13486 
13487  if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
13488  std::vector<int> pdata;
13489  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13490  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13491  {
13492  if(j < 10){
13493  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13494  }else{
13495  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13496  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13497  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13498  break;
13499  }
13500 
13501  }
13502  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
13503  std::vector<uint> pdata;
13504  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13505  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13506  {
13507  if(j < 10){
13508  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13509  }else{
13510  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13511  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13512  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13513  break;
13514  }
13515 
13516  }
13517  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
13518  std::vector<float> pdata;
13519  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13520  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13521  {
13522  if(j < 10){
13523  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13524  }else{
13525  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13526  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13527  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13528  break;
13529  }
13530 
13531  }
13532  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
13533  std::vector<double> pdata;
13534  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13535  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13536  {
13537  if(j < 10){
13538  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13539  }else{
13540  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13541  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13542  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13543  break;
13544  }
13545 
13546  }
13547  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
13548  std::vector<vec2> pdata;
13549  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13550  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13551  {
13552  if(j < 10){
13553  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13554  }else{
13555  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13556  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13557  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13558  break;
13559  }
13560 
13561  }
13562  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
13563  std::vector<vec3> pdata;
13564  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13565  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13566  {
13567  if(j < 10){
13568  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13569  }else{
13570  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13571  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13572  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13573  break;
13574  }
13575 
13576  }
13577  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
13578  std::vector<vec4> pdata;
13579  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13580  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13581  {
13582  if(j < 10){
13583  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13584  }else{
13585  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13586  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13587  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13588  break;
13589  }
13590 
13591  }
13592  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
13593  std::vector<int2> pdata;
13594  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13595  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13596  {
13597  if(j < 10){
13598  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13599  }else{
13600  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13601  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13602  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13603  break;
13604  }
13605 
13606  }
13607  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
13608  std::vector<int3> pdata;
13609  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13610  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13611  {
13612  if(j < 10){
13613  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13614  }else{
13615  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13616  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13617  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13618  break;
13619  }
13620 
13621  }
13622  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
13623  std::vector<int4> pdata;
13624  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13625  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13626  {
13627  if(j < 10){
13628  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13629  }else{
13630  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13631  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13632  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13633  break;
13634  }
13635 
13636  }
13637  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
13638  std::vector<std::string> pdata;
13639  getPrimitiveData( UUID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13640  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13641  {
13642  if(j < 10){
13643  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13644  }else{
13645  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13646  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13647  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13648  break;
13649  }
13650 
13651  }
13652  }else{
13653  assert(false);
13654  }
13655 
13656  }
13657  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
13658 }
13659 
13660 void Context::printObjectInfo(uint ObjID) const{
13661 
13662  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
13663  std::cout << "Info for ObjID " << ObjID << std::endl;
13664  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
13665 
13666  ObjectType otype = getObjectType(ObjID);
13667  std::string ostype;
13668  if( otype == 0){
13669  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_TILE";
13670  }else if(otype == 1){
13671  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE";
13672  }else if(otype == 2){
13673  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE";
13674  }else if(otype == 3){
13675  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_BOX";
13676  }else if(otype == 4){
13677  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_DISK";
13678  }else if(otype == 5){
13679  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH";
13680  }else if(otype == 6){
13681  ostype = "OBJECT_TYPE_CONE";
13682  }
13683 
13684  std::cout << "Type: " << ostype << std::endl;
13685  std::cout << "Object Bounding Box Center: " << getObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
13686  std::cout << "One-sided Surface Area: " << getObjectArea(ObjID) << std::endl;
13687 
13688  std::cout << "Primitive Count: " << getObjectPrimitiveCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13689 
13690  if(areObjectPrimitivesComplete(ObjID))
13691  {
13692  std::cout << "Object Primitives Complete" << std::endl;
13693  }else{
13694  std::cout << "Object Primitives Incomplete" << std::endl;
13695  }
13696 
13697  std::cout << "Primitive UUIDs: " << std::endl;
13698  std::vector<uint> primitive_UUIDs = getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ObjID);
13699  for(uint i=0; i<primitive_UUIDs.size();i++)
13700  {
13701  if(i < 5){
13702  PrimitiveType ptype = getPrimitiveType(primitive_UUIDs.at(i));
13703  std::string pstype;
13704  if( ptype == 0){
13705  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
13706  }else if(ptype == 1){
13707  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
13708  }
13709  std::cout << " " << primitive_UUIDs.at(i) << " (" << pstype << ")" << std::endl;
13710  }else{
13711  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13712  PrimitiveType ptype = getPrimitiveType(primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-2));
13713  std::string pstype;
13714  if( ptype == 0){
13715  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
13716  }else if(ptype == 1){
13717  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
13718  }
13719  std::cout << " " << primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-2) << " (" << pstype << ")" << std::endl;
13720  ptype = getPrimitiveType(primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-1));
13721  if( ptype == 0){
13722  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH";
13723  }else if(ptype == 1){
13724  pstype = "PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE";
13725  }
13726  std::cout << " " << primitive_UUIDs.at(primitive_UUIDs.size()-1) << " (" << pstype << ")" << std::endl;
13727  break;
13728  }
13729  }
13730 
13731  if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_TILE)
13732  {
13733  std::cout << "Tile Center: " << getTileObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
13734  std::cout << "Tile Size: " << getTileObjectSize(ObjID) << std::endl;
13735  std::cout << "Tile Subdivision Count: " << getTileObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13736  std::cout << "Tile Normal: " << getTileObjectNormal(ObjID) << std::endl;
13737 
13738  std::cout << "Tile Texture UV: " << std::endl;
13739  std::vector<vec2> uv = getTileObjectTextureUV(ObjID);
13740  for(uint i=0; i<uv.size();i++)
13741  {
13742  std::cout << " " << uv.at(i) << std::endl;
13743  }
13744 
13745  std::cout << "Tile Vertices: " << std::endl;
13746  std::vector<vec3> primitive_vertices = getTileObjectVertices(ObjID);
13747  for(uint i=0; i<primitive_vertices.size();i++)
13748  {
13749  std::cout << " " << primitive_vertices.at(i) << std::endl;
13750  }
13751 
13752 
13753  }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE){
13754 
13755  std::cout << "Sphere Center: " << getSphereObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
13756  std::cout << "Sphere Radius: " << getSphereObjectRadius(ObjID) << std::endl;
13757  std::cout << "Sphere Subdivision Count: " << getSphereObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13758 
13759  }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE){
13760 
13761  std::cout << "Tube Subdivision Count: " << getTubeObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13762  std::cout << "Tube Nodes: " << std::endl;
13763  std::vector<vec3> nodes = getTubeObjectNodes(ObjID);
13764  for(uint i=0; i<nodes.size();i++)
13765  {
13766  if(i < 10){
13767  std::cout << " " << nodes.at(i) << std::endl;
13768  }else{
13769  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13770  std::cout << " " << nodes.at(nodes.size()-2) << std::endl;
13771  std::cout << " " << nodes.at(nodes.size()-1) << std::endl;
13772  break;
13773  }
13774  }
13775  std::cout << "Tube Node Radii: " << std::endl;
13776  std::vector<float> noderadii = getTubeObjectNodeRadii(ObjID);
13777  for(uint i=0; i<noderadii.size();i++)
13778  {
13779  if(i < 10){
13780  std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(i) << std::endl;
13781  }else{
13782  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13783  std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(noderadii.size()-2) << std::endl;
13784  std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(noderadii.size()-1) << std::endl;
13785  break;
13786  }
13787  }
13788  std::cout << "Tube Node Colors: " << std::endl;
13789  std::vector<helios::RGBcolor> nodecolors = getTubeObjectNodeColors(ObjID);
13790  for(uint i=0; i<nodecolors.size();i++)
13791  {
13792  if(i < 10){
13793  std::cout << " " << nodecolors.at(i) << std::endl;
13794  }else{
13795  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13796  std::cout << " " << nodecolors.at(nodecolors.size()-2) << std::endl;
13797  std::cout << " " << nodecolors.at(nodecolors.size()-1) << std::endl;
13798  break;
13799  }
13800  }
13801 
13802  }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_BOX){
13803 
13804  std::cout << "Box Center: " << getBoxObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
13805  std::cout << "Box Size: " << getBoxObjectSize(ObjID) << std::endl;
13806  std::cout << "Box Subdivision Count: " << getBoxObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13807 
13808  }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_DISK){
13809 
13810  std::cout << "Disk Center: " << getDiskObjectCenter(ObjID) << std::endl;
13811  std::cout << "Disk Size: " << getDiskObjectSize(ObjID) << std::endl;
13812  std::cout << "Disk Subdivision Count: " << getDiskObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13813 
13814  // }else if(type == OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH){
13815  // nothing for now
13816 
13817  }else if(otype == OBJECT_TYPE_CONE){
13818 
13819  std::cout << "Cone Length: " << getConeObjectLength(ObjID) << std::endl;
13820  std::cout << "Cone Axis Unit Vector: " << getConeObjectAxisUnitVector(ObjID) << std::endl;
13821  std::cout << "Cone Subdivision Count: " << getConeObjectSubdivisionCount(ObjID) << std::endl;
13822  std::cout << "Cone Nodes: " << std::endl;
13823  std::vector<vec3> nodes = getConeObjectNodes(ObjID);
13824  for(uint i=0; i<nodes.size();i++)
13825  {
13826  std::cout << " " << nodes.at(i) << std::endl;
13827  }
13828  std::cout << "Cone Node Radii: " << std::endl;
13829  std::vector<float> noderadii = getConeObjectNodeRadii(ObjID);
13830  for(uint i=0; i<noderadii.size();i++)
13831  {
13832  std::cout << " " << noderadii.at(i) << std::endl;
13833  }
13834  }
13835 
13836 
13837  float T[16];
13838  getObjectTransformationMatrix(ObjID, T);
13839  std::cout << "Transform: " << std::endl;
13840  std::cout << " " << T[0] << " " << T[1] << " " << T[2] << " " << T[3] << std::endl;
13841  std::cout << " " << T[4] << " " << T[5] << " " << T[6] << " " << T[7] << std::endl;
13842  std::cout << " " << T[8] << " " << T[9] << " " << T[10] << " " << T[11] << std::endl;
13843  std::cout << " " << T[12] << " " << T[13] << " " << T[14] << " " << T[15] << std::endl;
13844 
13845  std::cout << "RGB Color: " << getObjectColorRGB(ObjID) << std::endl;
13846  std::cout << "RGBA Color: " << getObjectColorRGBA(ObjID) << std::endl;
13847  std::cout << "Texture File: " << getObjectTextureFile(ObjID) << std::endl;
13848 
13849  std::cout << "Object Data: " << std::endl;
13850  // Primitive* pointer = getPrimitivePointer_private(ObjID);
13851  std::vector<std::string> pd = listObjectData(ObjID);
13852  for(uint i=0; i<pd.size();i++)
13853  {
13854  uint dsize = getObjectDataSize(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str());
13855  HeliosDataType dtype = getObjectDataType(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str());
13856  std::string dstype;
13857 
13858  if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
13859  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT";
13860  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
13861  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_UINT";
13862  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
13863  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT";
13864  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
13865  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE";
13866  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
13867  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2";
13868  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
13869  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3";
13870  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
13871  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4";
13872  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
13873  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT2";
13874  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
13875  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT3";
13876  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
13877  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_INT4";
13878  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
13879  dstype = "HELIOS_TYPE_STRING";
13880  }else{
13881  assert(false);
13882  }
13883 
13884 
13885  std::cout << " " << "[name: " << pd.at(i) << ", type: " << dstype << ", size: " << dsize << "]:" << std::endl;
13886 
13887 
13888  if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
13889  std::vector<int> pdata;
13890  getObjectData( ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13891  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13892  {
13893  if(j < 10){
13894  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13895  }else{
13896  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13897  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13898  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13899  break;
13900  }
13901 
13902  }
13903  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
13904  std::vector<uint> pdata;
13905  getObjectData( ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13906  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13907  {
13908  if(j < 10){
13909  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13910  }else{
13911  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13912  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13913  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13914  break;
13915  }
13916 
13917  }
13918  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
13919  std::vector<float> pdata;
13920  getObjectData( ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13921  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13922  {
13923  if(j < 10){
13924  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13925  }else{
13926  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13927  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13928  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13929  break;
13930  }
13931 
13932  }
13933  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
13934  std::vector<double> pdata;
13935  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13936  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13937  {
13938  if(j < 10){
13939  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13940  }else{
13941  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13942  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13943  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13944  break;
13945  }
13946 
13947  }
13948  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
13949  std::vector<vec2> pdata;
13950  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13951  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13952  {
13953  if(j < 10){
13954  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13955  }else{
13956  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13957  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13958  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13959  break;
13960  }
13961 
13962  }
13963  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
13964  std::vector<vec3> pdata;
13965  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13966  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13967  {
13968  if(j < 10){
13969  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13970  }else{
13971  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13972  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13973  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13974  break;
13975  }
13976 
13977  }
13978  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
13979  std::vector<vec4> pdata;
13980  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13981  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13982  {
13983  if(j < 10){
13984  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
13985  }else{
13986  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
13987  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
13988  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
13989  break;
13990  }
13991 
13992  }
13993  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
13994  std::vector<int2> pdata;
13995  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
13996  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
13997  {
13998  if(j < 10){
13999  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
14000  }else{
14001  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
14002  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
14003  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
14004  break;
14005  }
14006 
14007  }
14008  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
14009  std::vector<int3> pdata;
14010  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
14011  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
14012  {
14013  if(j < 10){
14014  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
14015  }else{
14016  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
14017  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-2) << std::endl;
14018  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(dsize-1) << std::endl;
14019  break;
14020  }
14021 
14022  }
14023  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
14024  std::vector<int4> pdata;
14025  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
14026  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
14027  {
14028  if(j < 10){
14029  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
14030  }else{
14031  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
14032  break;
14033  }
14034 
14035  }
14036  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
14037  std::vector<std::string> pdata;
14038  getObjectData(ObjID, pd.at(i).c_str(), pdata );
14039  for(uint j=0; j<dsize;j++)
14040  {
14041  if(j < 10){
14042  std::cout << " " << pdata.at(j) << std::endl;
14043  }else{
14044  std::cout << " ..." << std::endl;
14045  break;
14046  }
14047 
14048  }
14049  }else{
14050  assert(false);
14051  }
14052 
14053  }
14054  std::cout << "-------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
14055 }
14056 
14057 CompoundObject* Context::getObjectPointer_private( uint ObjID ) const{
14058  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
14059  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
14060  }
14061  return objects.at(ObjID);
14062 }

14078  RGBAcolor color = getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->getColorRGBA();
14079  return make_RGBcolor( color.r, color.g, color.b );

14140 void Context::getObjectBoundingBox( uint ObjID, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const {
14141  std::vector<uint> ObjIDs{ObjID};
14142  getObjectBoundingBox(ObjIDs,min_corner,max_corner);
14143 }
14144 
14145 void Context::getObjectBoundingBox( const std::vector<uint> &ObjIDs, vec3 &min_corner, vec3 &max_corner ) const{
14146 
14147  uint o=0;
14148  for( uint ObjID : ObjIDs ) {
14149 
14150  if ( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end()){
14151  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getObjectBoundingBox): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
14152  }
14153 
14154  const std::vector<uint> &UUIDs = objects.at(ObjID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
14155 
14156  uint p=0;
14157  for (uint UUID: UUIDs) {
14158 
14159  const std::vector<vec3> &vertices = getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
14160 
14161  if( p==0 && o==0 ){
14162  min_corner = vertices.front();
14163  max_corner = min_corner;
14164  p++;
14165  continue;
14166  }
14167 
14168  for (const vec3 &vert: vertices) {
14169  if (vert.x < min_corner.x) {
14170  min_corner.x = vert.x;
14171  }
14172  if (vert.y < min_corner.y) {
14173  min_corner.y = vert.y;
14174  }
14175  if (vert.z < min_corner.z) {
14176  min_corner.z = vert.z;
14177  }
14178  if (vert.x > max_corner.x) {
14179  max_corner.x = vert.x;
14180  }
14181  if (vert.y > max_corner.y) {
14182  max_corner.y = vert.y;
14183  }
14184  if (vert.z > max_corner.z) {
14185  max_corner.z = vert.z;
14186  }
14187  }
14188  }
14189 
14190  o++;
14191  }
14192 
14193 }
14194 
14195 std::vector<std::string> Context::listObjectData(uint ObjID) const{
14196  return getObjectPointer_private(ObjID)->listObjectData();
14197 }
14198 
14199 std::vector<std::string> Context::listPrimitiveData(uint UUID) const{
14200  return getPrimitivePointer_private(UUID)->listPrimitiveData();
14201 }
14202 
14203 Tile* Context::getTileObjectPointer_private(uint ObjID ) const{
14204  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
14205  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTileObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
14206  }else if( objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType()!=OBJECT_TYPE_TILE ){
14207  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getTileObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " is not a Tile Object.") );
14208  }
14209  return dynamic_cast<Tile*>(objects.at(ObjID));
14210 }
14211 
14212 Sphere* Context::getSphereObjectPointer_private(uint ObjID ) const{
14213  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
14214  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getSphereObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " does not exist in the Context."));
14215  }else if( objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType()!=OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE ){
14216  throw( std::runtime_error("ERROR (getSphereObjectPointer): ObjectID of " + std::to_string(ObjID) + " is not a Sphere Object.") );
14217  }
14218  return dynamic_cast<Sphere*>(objects.at(ObjID));
14219 }
